column1: "MST_SPHERES_230003_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Once there was a country that witnessed a shower of stars. Their fall is said to have led to the blooming of flowers in the desert
column2: and even the purification of toxic lakes. Thereafter the king sent his men to every region in the land to investigate this phenomenon. They found what was apparently a fraction of one of the fallen stars
column3: and its composition and shape were made of minerals unknown to the region. Believing it to be a gift from the gods
column4: the king placed the stone upon his crown
column5: and established a peaceful reign that would last for over 18 generations."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_230103_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Once there was a knight who would carry this flag with him to every battle. According to a legend inscribed on a stone fragment
column2: whenever the knight raised his flag beams of light would shine down from the heavens
column3: and those following him into battle would be led to victory by the great power and courage it granted them. The whereabouts of this flag were unknown until a certain piece of information was found claiming that a disciple had taken possession of it. Without any further details
column4: however
column5: that claim remains disputable."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_230203_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This candlestick is believed to have been made by a cynical Summoner who was exploring an unknown world. The magical undying flame burning from its wick guarded its owner from evil
column2: providing generations of Summoners with hope and protection with its light. Its abilities have been upgraded overtime
column3: however
column4: now rendering it able to guard both its owner and those surrounding him or her as well."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_230303_LONGDESCRIPTION":"General Vadom was known as a determined and courageous warrior
column2: who according to legend
column3: created this protective gem to enhance his vitality. With justice and fairness as his personal code
column4: Vadom despised assassinations and dark rumors
column5: and was never afraid of a confrontation. No matter the situation
column6: he never turned his back on this enemies
column7: which inspired a great sense of morale in his troops. He is said to have been resurrected countless times whilst fighting on the frontlines."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This blade was made by the swordsmith Sorgel
column2: who played an active part in the war against gods. Swords by Sorgel were known for their excellent balance between hardness and sharpness
column3: as well as their durable construction. Among all of his works
column4: the Famous Blade is the most well-known
column5: it's said that even the Emperor of the Agni Empire longed to have it be his."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30001_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Another sword made by the swordsmith Sorgel
column2: who played an active part in the war against gods. The Holy Blade is said to have been crafted using the Sorgel's most refined techniques
column3: therefore it was said to possess a power pure enough to vanquish evil. However
column4: ironically many swordsmen fought over it due to its reputation
column5: and in the end
column6: Sorgel sealed the Holy Blade to prevent a war over it."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30002_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Sorgel
column2: the famed swordsmith
column3: had forged countless brilliant swords
column4: but none of them could protect his family when the gods attacked. His misery and fury towards the gods led to the birth of a god-slaying magic sword. The cursed Beast Blade exudes an icy aura that can send even the most powerful of gods to the netherworld."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30003_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The swordsmith Sorgel went through great pains to forge this precious blade. Strengthened sword in hand
column2: he went after a powerful dragon that had hidden itself deep within the mountains. Unwavering
column3: he took on the dragon's fiery breath
column4: using its white hot flames to further temper his blade. The blade created so skillfully using the dragon's flames is said to be able to tear any who come against it to pieces."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30004_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Swordsmith Zergel knew that the god that rules over all blacksmiths was in the gods' army headquarters
column2: and just like when he stole his master's techniques by simply watching him in his young age
column3: he sneaked into the place to take a peek at god's techniques. But even when the blacksmith god with a single covered eye noticed Zergel's intrusion
column4: Zergel just forced a smile and showed him his smithing techniques. After barely escaping with his life
column5: Zergel returned with a sword he had forged himself.  It had the power to slay both man and god."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30005_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Swordsmith Zergel
column2: who had stolen the techniques of the blacksmith god
column3: began to create divine swords one after the other. One day while working
column4: he found the first sword he had ever forged in the back of his shop. Seeing the half-finished
column5: novice sword he had made in his youth
column6: he decided to go back to his origins and forge the sword anew with the techniques he had learned from the god. This sword called Magnarave was the one that made Zergel's reputation
column7: but it is said that he never parted with it while he still lived. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30006_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The blades that the sword smith Zergel used to create during his search towards innovative techniques were usually always well balanced and effective. Only this particular sword was so extremely heavy that not many could use it. However
column2: one of those people lifted the sword without any effort
column3: and was asked to take care of it. It is said that Zergel referred to this warrior as \"the one chosen by the gods\" to wield this bisecting sword."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30007_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A sword born from the anguish the blacksmith Ekzerg felt after losing his beloved to an assault by the gods. Forged from materials found in a city which had been destroyed by the gods
column2: some say that furious voices can be heard cursing the gods when holding the blade close to one's ears. The destructive power of this sword is such that it consumes a person's heart
column3: filling it with fierce hatred."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30008_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There was once a long dispute between two small countries which was to be decided by a duel between their two best warriors. Some gods that heard of the duel looked forward to the event by trying to guess the victor. However
column2: one of the gods favored one of the warriors over the other
column3: and so it bestowed a divine shield upon him. Having learned of this
column4: a blacksmith god declared such an act as unfair
column5: and thus forged a shining sword for the other warrior to wield."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A standard shield used by soldiers of the Titan race. Tailored for the Titans
column2: the size and weight of it is extraordinary. Though normal humans aren't able to hold it
column3: its thick armor is said to be able to block even powerful attacks from the Titans
column4: and would prove to be a valuable asset on the battlefield if only one could actually wield it. Records of the Giant Shield can be found in the historical archives of the Titan race."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30101_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A shield used by the Dragon Knight Balgeos. It's said to be crafted from a dragon scale that was given to Balgeos as a token of friendship when he met a dragon. The shield possesses the defensive strength of a dragon and likely wouldn't suffer even a scratch from the slash of a regular sword. After Balgeos died
column2: the Dragon Seal was put up in the Sama Kingdom Knight's Court."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30102_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A legendary shield said to have been crafted by Rau Reik
column2: a simple swordsmith
column3: upon speaking with a goddess during his travels. It's said that those who use the shield receive protection from the goddess
column4: and never suffer arrow wounds on the battlefield. Legends also say that the shield picks its owner
column5: and those who have not gained the recognition of the goddess can never lay their hands on it no matter how hard they try."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30103_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The sun and the moon
column2: shining upon the people in harmony during those fleeting moments between night and day. There exists a shield which was forged in these precious moments. Though it took decades of bathing in the magic given off by the sun and moon's simultaneous ascensions to complete
column3: it's said that it could protect it's user from any manner of attack."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30104_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Many sacred items that were granted to the people from the gods laid dormant in the La Veda Republic. The King Shield Divatin was also one of those items
column2: previously owned by a wise ruler before it was offered to a temple. To protect the people
column3: as a king he continued to stand in the front lines to repel attacks
column4: and it is said that his survival of over 100 battles and his incredible longevity was all thanks to the great divine protection of this shield."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30105_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Weapons were prohibited when granted an audience in the Bariura Empire. It is said that there was once a desperate assassin who tried to hide a weapon within his own body. However
column2: a cavalry leader with a shield on his hand recognized the assassin
column3: and without a moment to lose
column4: shot the assassin to death full of arrows
column5: and the assassination attempt was thwarted. From that moment on
column6: this shield came to be used as a tool for condemnation
column7: with its punishment provided by the emperor's archers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30106_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This ultimate shield is said to be the last and the best masterpiece of a legendary armor craftsman. Its true power was witnessed in the battlefield during the war against the Gods. It guarded its wielder effectively against everything
column2: including the downpour of arrows from the gods
column3: the sharpest spears that could pierce armor
column4: and the fierce charge of powerful divine beasts. The durability of the shield impressed the gods in the battlefield so much that a blacksmith god purposely put himself in the front lines just to glance at it with his very own eyes."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30107_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A shield granted to humans long ago by the gods. Legends say that owning it was proof of a person's status as ruler of the world
column2: but that it was only bestowed upon the being who mas meant to represent a particular era. Its surface
column3: although having been used in battle thousands of times
column4: remains as beautiful and sparkling as ever. In mythical times
column5: legends tell of the hero Oldesekt owning this shield
column6: a name often used to still refer to it. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30108_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Some historical accounts left behind tell of a duel between two small countries which were trying to reach a conclusion to their long war with each other. This shield is said to have been made for this legendary duel
column2: though no record exists of where it was made
column3: or who forged it. Some rumors say that it was bestowed upon one of the warriors who prayed to his favorite goddess before he went to battle
column4: but the truth remains unknown."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There is an extremely rare white branch that grows deep in the forest. It can grow on any type of tree
column2: and holds a strong magical power that has a healing effect on all lifeforms around it. The White Cane is made from this white branch. Just like the white branch
column3: the White Cane is white in appearance and retains its healing powers
column4: boosting the recovery rate of those who wield it."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30201_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The Sentry Cane is a wand used by the high wizards of the ancient La Veda Republic that was destroyed by the gods. It holds the power of spirits of light and wind
column2: and enhances the powers of wizards. It's said that its powers played a vital role in healing the soldiers wounded in battle."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30202_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A cane used by Ladeltia
column2: a lady who was cited as being a saint in many historic records. It's said that miracles happened whenever she raised her cane. Among the many tales of her
column3: the most well-known of all is of a village where an epidemic broke out and many feared of even getting close to it
column4: but she was able to enter in and instantly cleanse the place and its people."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30203_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Robel Adams prayed endlessly to the heavens for a miracle to save his illness-stricken wife. Rain or shine
column2: he visited the temple every day
column3: until one day
column4: he received a staff from the heavens above. Waving the staff over his wife
column5: Robel was able to slowly heal her of her affliction. After she fully recovered
column6: Robel and his wife spent the rest of their lives traveling the world in search of others they could heal."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30204_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There was once a man who implored for a miracle from the gods in order to bring his daughter back to life. The gods explained that it was against nature to revive the deceased
column2: so the man broke every taboo possible
column3: seeking hidden knowledge to pursue his goal. It was then when he finally created the Godly Staff
column4: which instead of bringing forth miracles
column5: was only capable of awakening a person's hidden life force. Perhaps a miracle is not something that humans can bring forth after all. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30205_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This staff from another world has the power to grant miracles to those who pledge their life to it. However
column2: it is said that if this pledge is broken even once
column3: the owner shall suffer the Seven Misfortunes and Eight Pains
column4: as well as meet the terrifying eyes of death. The staff is named after the goddess of another world
column5: and is said to bring forth both fortune and misfortune equally."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30206_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An old staff that was found by a boy and his younger sister inside the water well of a town. Though the children stated they could hear voices coming from the cane
column2: adults around them thought of it as a regular
column3: dirty old stick
column4: and decided to throw it away. Hearing the voice ask them to leave town
column5: the two of them complied and left by themselves. As they walked being led by the cane
column6: a thunderous sound came from it
column7: and a brightly blazing flame dyed the night sky red. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30207_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A staff said to have been made by the earth goddess Rakneshi from her own bones. Possessing many powers connected to the flow of life
column2: many believe that its gifts not only affects humans
column3: but the environment as well. The tales of a saint using this staff to convert a deserted wasteland into a verdant meadow
column4: and to cleanse a poisonous lake until it was crystal clear and full of life anew are very famous in Elgaia."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30208_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A staff meant to guide the people by prolonging the life of the monarch who possesses it
column2: and thus keeping the ruled class from starvation. However
column3: the person the gods decided to bestow the staff upon happened to be none other than the emperor of the nation of Bariura
column4: an empire known throughout history for its long obsession with war. Regardless of whether the successors of the emperor lived for a short or long time after him
column5: they all waged war incessantly either way. This led the staff to lose its initial purpose
column6: and is still the source of much scholarly discussion today."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Visitors from different worlds came to Grand Gaia and left behind many stories
column2: among them were those concerning a race known as spirits. They were far more resilient than humans
column3: and to a point people feared them. Despite this
column4: the blacksmith Gavallian crafted an armor modelled after them. Its menacing look
column5: despite its functionality
column6: gained it negative reviews
column7: but its name along with its creator's soon spread far and wide."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30301_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The Qilin
column2: a mythical beast that only exists in fairy tales
column3: was said to have control over life. This armor
column4: named after the Qilin
column5: is said to enhancing it's wearer's vitality. Although it's a well-known piece of armor
column6: its creator is still a mystery. There are many stories about its origin
column7: some claiming it was a gift from heaven
column8: with others saying it once belonged to visitors from another world."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30302_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The Holy Robe is said to rouse and maximize one's primeval survival instincts. Records say the robe was knitted by the cleric Emeldia in order to change the mind of a man who attempted suicide. Those who wear the Holy Robe are spared from death
column2: though not from their injuries
column3: so they're forced to endure their self-inflicted pain uttil they eventually give up on the thought of dying."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30303_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There once was a swordsman known as Lediver Max. Though his skills as a swordsman were average
column2: he had far more stamina than anyone else. It is said that those who fought against him feared him for how much damage he could take
column3: many hopelessly giving up. It is said that the armor he wore
column4: as covered in scars as it was
column5: continued to shine brightly. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30304_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There was once a battle against a beast that brought calamity to the Sama Kingdom. Some of the magicians who witnessed this battle were so impressed by the armor of the ice beast as it grew thicker while it was damaged
column2: that they risked their lives to uncover its secrets. However
column3: humans were unable to reproduce this power from the gods
column4: and its research was shut down prematurely. Nonetheless
column5: one of the techniques created during this process gave birth to this incredibly hard and rare armor."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30305_LONGDESCRIPTION":"In mythical times
column2: there was once a beast whose fur grew harder depending on the radiance of the moonlight. The fur would be hardest on nights when the moon was full
column3: making it impermeable to damage from weapons made by the gods themselves. This pelt was collected from that beast during a full moon
column4: and made into armor by the time of the new moon. Its rigidness is unfathomable
column5: but how to collect this pelt
column6: and its manufacturing process
column7: still remain a total mystery."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30306_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There was a soldier who was invited to the underworld while he still lived. He used dark magic to exterminate the dead bodies walking around
column2: including their ring leader
column3: and thus was summoned by the king of the underworld. The soldier felt somewhat uneasy fighting endless hordes of the unliving
column4: but the armor given to him by the king of the underworld had magic powers hidden within it that gave the soldier limitless amount of strength
column5: like an immortal being. This strength would remain with him until his task was completed."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30307_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A strong piece of armor forged by the otherworldly technique expert Garnan
column2: from the Atharva Republic
column3: under the orders of general Pell Intyz whilst in an expedition together. When Pell tried on the armor he was delighted to find out that his vitality had been greatly increased
column4: but was disappointed that Garnan was unable to improve the armor's actual defense. It is said that from then on the general sought to improve the armor's abilities."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30308_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There was once a high ranking god who became interested in the things that humans produced. Though imperfect
column2: he admired the effort they put into their trades and decided to fool around by trying to make a piece of armor himself. The armor he made shone brightly
column3: and its special powers prevented it from suffering any damage
column4: or even being destroyed. One could say that this amazing piece or armor was born from the boredom of a god."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A battle axe that belonged to Mariudeth who was said to be the strongest man in the Agni Empire. This axe is so large that a regular human can't even lift it. However
column2: it's said that when Mariudeth swung the axe
column3: he could slice even a Titan in two. After Mariudeth's death
column4: magicians examined the axe but found no trace of magic
column5: proving it to be just a huge axe."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30401_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An axe that belonged to the evil Lord Magress. It was sent to Grand Gaia when the the war with the humans was lost. Its impressive power is said to shatter one's soul in a single attack. However
column2: it was sealed away in a treasure vault for many years as it was just too powerful for humans to wield. The Magical Axe surfaced late in the great war with the gods."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_30402_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This axe harbors a cruel desire to stain red with blood all those it comes across. It also carries with it great power. The power to unlock its wielder's hidden potential and fulfill their deepest desires. Stained crimson red and long without a soul
column2: its unending dedication to fulfilling its own desires has led to it being called the \"Havoc Axe.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There is a unique set of swords known as katanas which were brought to Grand Gaia by a visitor from another world
column2: having since gained the attention of swordsmen everywhere. The sharpest among these
column3: one with Muramasa engraved in it
column4: is so sharp even a fly that landed on its edge would be sliced in two. It's said that the Muramasa is bewitchingly powerful
column5: urging its wielder to fight."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31001_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A large sword said to be made in the image of a blade that emerged from the tail of an eight-headed dragon spoken of in otherworldly tales. Though it doesn't compare to the original
column2: it still boasts powerful abilities. However
column3: much like any reproduction it lacks stamina and cannot be used for long periods of time. There are some who even say that it is not a mere reproduction
column4: and was in fact built as a catalyst which draws the actual force from which it was created from the other world."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31002_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A sword modeled after one spoken of in otherworldly tales that was said to have vanquished a mythical eight-headed dragon. Oddly enough
column2: however
column3: it was made in Grand Gaia
column4: and its shape is long and double-edged. This suggests that maybe someone came from the otherworld and produced swords there. However
column5: since these items are copies
column6: their effects are only active for a short period of time."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There was once a prime minister named Darvanshel in the Sama Kingdom. Despite being a civil officer
column2: to the dismay of his people he always carried a shield. However
column3: one day the King of Sama was attacked by an assasin while out hunting. At that moment
column4: Darvanshel threw himself
column5: together with his shield
column6: in front of the King
column7: saving his life. This was always his shield's purpose."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31101_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Though taunted as being a coward
column2: it was Prime Minister Darvahnshel with his shield that saved the king from an assassination attempt. In praising his loyalty and wisdom
column3: the King of the Sama Kingdom bestowed him with a new shield
column4: upon which he requested that Darvahnshel give it a name. Appreciative of not just how sturdy it looked but also how beautiful it was
column5: without hesitation he gave it the name of his wife. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31102_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There was a goddess who
column2: though cruel and short tempered
column3: cherished humans. This shield holds a great amount of power
column4: but
column5: not unlike the goddess's temper
column6: its effective time period is short. Also according to the goddess
column7: if one bearing the shield should perish in battle
column8: they would return once again manifested in pain and agony. One has no choice but to test this theory
column9: as no one knows whether or not the goddess speaks the truth."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The Bariula Empire was destroyed by the gods
column2: leaving behind its legacy of being home to its enchanted weapons and armor. The Death Scythe was among these pieces
column3: with the special ability to draw from its wielder's strength in times of danger
column4: using it to boost its power. Records say that it was forged in the shape of a sickle because the Empress of that time prefered weapons."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31201_LONGDESCRIPTION":""
"MST_SPHERES_31300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A pearl with the power to heal injured lifeforms
column2: found deep in the forests at the eastern end of the Principality of Vriksha. It's said that the pearl comes from millenial trees which infuse their vitality into these pearls in order to protect the creatures of the forest. Creatures who have been healed by their powers are eternally grateful to those magnificent trees."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31301_LONGDESCRIPTION":""
"MST_SPHERES_31400_LONGDESCRIPTION":""
"MST_SPHERES_31401_LONGDESCRIPTION":""
"MST_SPHERES_31500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This axe has seen the deaths of several owners
column2: each of whom took a great liking to its power and used it with great care. Through these countless deaths
column3: the lifeless Death Axe came to be known as an omen of darkness. Its dark powers enhance its user
column4: though there is always the chance it will outlive him."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A dagger with a button hidden in its hilt
column2: which when pressed fills its blade with poison. Originally designed as a weapon for weaker swordsmen
column3: its ease of use made it a popular choice of weapon among assasins as well. The user can freely change the type of poison embedded in it
column4: thus veteran assasins often carry several Poison Shivs containing varied poisons."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31601_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An improved version of the short bladed Poison Shiv. With increased power split up into two blades
column2: it is now easier to deal a venomous strike on one's opponent. However
column3: as a result of requiring both hands to wield
column4: this weapon considerably restricts its wielder otherwise. The ability to wield these knives freely is the sign of a skilled assassin. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31602_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A concealed lethal weapon made from poisonous miasma. It is most commonly found within a particular flower
column2: hence the origin of its name. This weapon which is not meant to incapacitate foes
column3: but kill them
column4: has a very potent effect. Therefore
column5: when using it one must be very aware of their surroundings
column6: taking such things as wind speed and direction in mind. Only the most skilled assassins can handle such a dangerous weapon."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A magic gun developed in the ancient Atalva Republilc
column2: inspired by a gun belonging to a visitor from another world. Black magic was cast on it so that it inflicts the weak status on its victims. Originally designed for hunting down large demons
column3: its functionality turned out to be effective on all species and thus was used in a wide range of situations. Its only flaw is how long it takes to make ammunition for it."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31701_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A large demonic projectile weapon based on a modified Demon Rifle. The Atharva Republic
column2: upon achieving the ability to produce mass quantities of arms fused with dark weakening magic
column3: began the development of a weapon with increased firepower and rapid-fire capabilities
column4: the Death Cannon. After countless experiences
column5: the final result was an outstanding weapon capable of much more than simply supporting its comrades. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31702_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A gun created by the Republic of Atharva in its search to explore the possibilities of firearms. It was used to aide allies against monsters during missions
column2: but it was originally created for the purpose of subjugating monsters. Because of this
column3: its ability for rapid-fire was quite impressive. However
column4: the gigantic size of the barrel and the huge amounts of ammunition required to fire this gun were considered quite the problem
column5: and thus it had very few admirers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Macheid was a doctor who strived to save as many people as he could. He helped countless patients who fell sick and got injured on the battle field. Unfortunately
column2: even he was tempted to throw in the towel when the gods attacked. Those he saved were soon taken in the blink of an eye. When he finally recovered from this despair
column3: he put all his knowledge into making a terrifying weapon which could infect its victim with a terrible disease."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31801_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Granloyd
column2: as the arms department head
column3: was torn over his responsibilities in improving his countries weapons in time for the inevitable battle it would face
column4: and caring for his father who had fallen ill. Spending his days frustrated by his inability to carry out both duties
column5: he stumbled upon a pike in his father's room. Taking up the dusty pike
column6: he then realized exactly what it was he was meant to do. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31802_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A lance that had been pierced into bedrock since ancient times. It is said that when the hero Agaron pulled it out
column2: the color of its point had changed to an emerald tone. Any person injured by this lance would fall ill in a matter of days
column3: ultimately leading to their death. Recent research has discovered that an unknown virus had probably established its colony at the tip of the lance
column4: giving the impression that it was mere corrosion. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Designed with an unusually shaped tip
column2: this spear is said to drive those who land their eyes on it mad. Because of this
column3: those who face the spear must put forth extra effort in avoiding it which quickly tires them out. The Beast Spear's origins are unknown
column4: but it's rumoured that it was crafted based on the knowledge of experienced soldiers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31901_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There was a general who was especially skilled at wielding the Beast Spear. Having accomplished many great deeds while wielding this spear
column2: the general was bestowed a special lance in thanks of his service. This lance was both crooked and oddly balanced for what it was. Because of this
column3: those on the receiving end perceived it as slow moving
column4: though in that very instant its blade would have already pierced deep into their body. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_31902_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The beloved spear of a war general who defeated the leader of a numerous troop of enemies. This weapon
column2: which he referred to as the \"Dark Spear
column3: \" may look like a regular spear
column4: but the blade at its point is actually very finely serrated. Due to this
column5: those injured by this spear would suffer of irregular pain and cuts very difficult to heal in nature. Most people who met the end of this weapon lost their lives in the process."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_32000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"In the Bariula Empire
column2: before the gods destroyed it
column3: there were many cases of innocents being executed. Ragu Blaze
column4: the wielder of the Cursed Sabre
column5: was said to be one of them
column6: but his extraordinary magic powers set him apart. At the brink of execution he set a curse which enveloped the executioner's sword
column7: resulting in the birth of a Cursed Sabre."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_32001_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The Cursed Sabre which had been used in Ragu Blaze's execution was afterwards wielded by the one who had carried out the execution. A rumor has also spread that after all the bloodshed this blade had seen
column2: it was soon able to absorb its user's emotions. Getting word of this
column3: imperial leaders decided to seal the sword away
column4: but upon checking the armory it was nowhere to be found. Around the same time a sinister-looking man brandishing a long sword appeared in the empire. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_32002_LONGDESCRIPTION":"After the execution of Ragu Blaze
column2: an assassin appeared in a certain province
column3: imitating the same execution through a series of murders. After the criminal was captured
column4: he is said to have claimed to be the \"heir of Ragu Blaze's curse
column5: along with his sword.\" To this day the relationship between these incidents and the curse of Ragu Blaze remains unclear
column6: but records state that after the execution of the criminal
column7: the blade he used for his crimes was sealed away for a very long time."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_32100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"In the lands of the ancient Atarva Republic
column2: there was a canyon that experienced thunderstorms year-round. There was only a single man willing to brave the danger there in attempts to forge his legendary bow. The bow he crafted could absorb lightning
column3: embedding it into its arrows
column4: inflicting paralysis with its powerful lightning bolt force."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_32101_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The bow craftsman who created the Thunder Bow secluded himself in a canyon in order to research a new bow. Then one night while visiting a forest to collect material for arrows
column2: he was struck by lightning. He raised up an arrow which split the lightning in two
column3: and upon realizing he was safe he was overcome with happiness. He had infused his arrow with magical powers. At last he had both a bow and arrow infused with the power of thunder."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_32102_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Once there was a bow maker who traveled to various countries in order to create more bows. Whilst climbing the mountain where the thunder god is said to have been deified
column2: a strange man suddenly appeared and challenged him to a bow and arrow duel. After their fierce competition
column3: the bow maker won by a very slight margin
column4: but before he knew it the strange man had disappeared
column5: leaving behind nothing but his bow. Having the power to store electricity
column6: this bow is said to paralyze the enemies it pierces with its arrows."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_32200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A special robe developed in the Bariula Empire that the gods violently destroyed. It usually takes the form of a shield
column2: but once equipped it absorbs the power of its user and a magic veil forms and envelopes the user's body. The veil protects and boosts the user's defence against all attacks. However
column3: mass producing it proved to be difficult
column4: making it a rare item that only a few institutions in the Empire could own."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_32201_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A special cloth that is regarded as a national treasure of the destroyed Agni Empire. It usually takes the form of a shield
column2: but when the royal spell is chanted
column3: it transforms into an impenetrable armor around the user's body. It's said that this special armor exudes incredible power
column4: reducing damage received from physical attacks by swords
column5: arrows
column6: magic and even curses
column7: though few have witnessed its actual form."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_32202_LONGDESCRIPTION":""

"MST_SPHERES_32300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A typical talisman that increases poison resistance. The anti-poison modus operandi is displayed in the center of the crystal.

Anti-Poison Modus Operandi
\"Divert all poison from me!\""

"MST_SPHERES_32301_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A talisman that is very strong against Poison.
The crystal in the center is made from a combination of anti-Poison materials.

Revised Anti-Poison Modus Operandi
\"Block my enemy's poison!\""

"MST_SPHERES_32400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A typical talisman that increases weak resistance. The anti-weak modus operandi is displayed in the center of the crystal.

Anti-Weakening Modus Operandi
\"May light bring vitality!\""

"MST_SPHERES_32401_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A talisman that is very strong against Weak.
The crystal in the center is made from a combination of anti-Weak materials.

Revised Anti-Weak Modus Operandi
\"Let light be my armor!\""

"MST_SPHERES_32500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A typical talisman that increases sick resistance. The anti-sick modus operandi is displayed in the center of the crystal.

Anti-Disease Modus Operandi
\"Cleanse and purge ill from me!\""

"MST_SPHERES_32501_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A talisman that is very strong against Sick.
The crystal in the center is made from a combination of anti-Sick materials.

Revised Anti-Sick Modus Operandi
\"Release my inner purity!\""

"MST_SPHERES_32600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A typical talisman that increases injury resistance. The anti-injury modus operandi is displayed in the center of the crystal.

Anti-Injury Modus Operandi
\"Hustle! Hustle! Hustle!\""

"MST_SPHERES_32601_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A talisman that is very strong against Injury.
The crystal in the center is made from a combination of anti-Injury materials.

Revised Anti-Injury Modus Operandi
\"Fight! Fight! Fight!\""

"MST_SPHERES_32700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A typical talisman that increases curse resistance. The anti-curse modus operandi is displayed in the center of the crystal.

Anti-Curse Modus Operandi
\"Shiny barrier
column2: fend off evil!\""

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_32701_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A talisman that is very strong against Curse.
The crystal in the center is made from a combination of anti-Curse materials.

Revised Anti-Curse Modus Operandi
\"Impenetrable wall
column2: block off all evil!\""

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_32800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A typical talisman that increases paralysis resistance. The anti-paralysis modus operandi is displayed in the center of the crystal.

Anti-Paralysis Modus Operandi
\"Chase off uninvited vermin!\""

"MST_SPHERES_32801_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A talisman that is very strong against Paralysis.
The crystal in the center is made from a combination of anti-Paralysis materials.

Revised Anti-Paralysis Modus Operandi
\"Away numbness
column2: let lose my flowing spirit!\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_32900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"When the Star Blade was born
column2: it was little more than a common long sword. However
column3: it is said that through numerous battles the blade produced a celestial glow
column4: unlocking a hidden power from within the swordsman who wielded it. For that reason it came to be known as the Star Blade
column5: but after the swordsman met his fate
column6: from that point forward no one who wielded it was able to unleash it's heavenly glow. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_33000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"When the gods invaded the land of humans many people were too afraid to take action. However
column2: among those people existed the Six Heroes who sought victory through a series of small scale battles. Their crest of victory was spread throughout the lands
column3: encouraging people everywhere. Later it would be carried onto every battlefield
column4: becoming a source of inspiration for soldiers. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_33001_LONGDESCRIPTION":"As the end of the battle with the gods drew near
column2: the Agni Empire slowly became aware of their inevitable defeat. As this fear spread spread from commander
column3: to soldier
column4: to peasant
column5: and the empire was in the grips of panic
column6: it was the queen at the time who raised her flag and inspired the people. The queen's firm resilience reminded the people of the sanctity of their humanity
column7: and was the force behind their final counterattack."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_33002_LONGDESCRIPTION":""
"MST_SPHERES_33400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Long ago
column2: there was a great commander known as Ares
column3: a man whose presence alone granted him both the energy of his troops
column4: and the fear of his enemies. His aim was to use his power to bring victory without battle
column5: and it's this motivation he put into making his crest. It is told that when this crest was raised
column6: enemy troops would flee in fear of their own inferiority. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_33500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A unique robe with the special ability to soak up the last remaining vitality of fallen enemies. Though it looks similar to robes worn by sorcerers from the long lost Bariula Empire
column2: there is no record of this specific robe. Because of this it is thought that the robe was created by a secret group within the empire
column3: though no proof of such an organization exists. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_33501_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This ominously ornamented robe tightly wraps its wearer with it's unique fit
column2: completely concealing their identity. It's said to have been sent from the underworld due to it being soaked in a malicious magic that recovers the wearer's vitality when an enemy is defeated. It may be considered demonic
column3: but there are still many who search for it due to how rare it is."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_33502_LONGDESCRIPTION":""

"MST_SPHERES_33600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A magical spear with the power to absorb vitality from your enemies. A normal spear can turn into a Soul Spear after it's absorbed enough blood on the battlefield. It is said that the possessor as well is subject to its dark power. This change is said to be slow
column2: with few releasing the change before it's too late."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_33601_LONGDESCRIPTION":""
"MST_SPHERES_33602_LONGDESCRIPTION":""

"MST_SPHERES_33700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An odd device which is activated when it's stuck to the torso of a living creature. The bearer's fighting spirit grows with each attack. Crafted using a method unknown of in Grand Gaia
column2: only the method of use and its effects are known. Until recently
column3: its whereabouts had been unknown
column4: reportedly last being seen in the Sama Kingdom vault."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_33800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An odd device which is activated when it's stuck to the torso of a living creature. The bearer receives a boost in vitality with each attack. Even amongst the scholars of the La Veda Republic
column2: whose techniques greatly differ from those used in Grand Gaia
column3: were unable to even take it apart. It was lost during the battle with the gods
column4: and its whereabouts since then were unknown."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_33900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"\"By the moonlight I swear
column2:
I will have Emperor Bariula's mysterious treasure tonight.\"
-Phantom Thief Zelnite

(An excerpt from Chapter 2
column3: Section 5 of \"The Adventures of the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite!\")"

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_33901_LONGDESCRIPTION":"\"Hmph. Just look at me tripping all over myself. I must've gotten clumsy in my old age.\"

(An excerpt from Chapter 3
column2: Section 8 of \"The Adventures of the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite!\")"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A bracer the wearer of which is infamously known to have the power to seize souls. It's ominous shape looks like a demon's mouth opened wide
column2: into which one's hand is placed. It's also said that it may have belonged to a pagan minister who
column3: long ago
column4: created it to make sacrifices to his evil god. This has lead to rumors that it holds the remaining power of the dark congregation."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34001_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A beast's spirit
column2: as researched in the old Bariura Empire
column3: is said to be as dense as a group of people combined. This bracer was created from powers extracted from such a beast for the purpose of bestowing said powers to its bearer. Unleashing powers never seen before
column4: this bracer was used to inflict damage upon the very souls of the gods. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"\"I never lose a target! I am the elusive unknown
column2: the great phantom thief... I am Zelnite
column4: Section 2 of \"The Adventures of the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite!\")"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A headpiece found in an ancient shrine
column2: for many years bathed in and soaked up the light from the sun along with the shrine
column3: filling it with a holy power. It's said that anyone who wears it
column4: when injured
column5: are soothed by the power of light it holds within it. It is called Celtion after the shrine in which it was found
column6: though to which god that shrine was dedicated remains unknown."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34301_LONGDESCRIPTION":"One day
column2: a star fell from the heavens
column3: and with a great explosion it left behind a stone about the size of a human head. Putting aside the cries of the priests
column4: screaming that it was some kind of divine retribution
column5: a blacksmith stole it away and made a helmet from it. The star-powered helmet was named Andromeda
column6: and it is said he who bears it has the protection of the stars."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34302_LONGDESCRIPTION":""
"MST_SPHERES_34400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"How should you use the Clear Cloak
column2:
you ask?
Well that's up to you."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A mask of a woman with an otherwordly look of jealousy and grief. Those who see it are filled with fear and the urge to attack. Despite not being cursed or affected by magic
column2: wearers feel a great presence eminating from it
column3: and there are many who wear it when they wish to hide themselves in public. It seems it was worn in plays in another world
column4: though that is not the case in this one."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Standard issue equipment for special forces from the Bariula Empire. On top of concealing the wearer with it's dark fabric
column2: it is also infused with magic that conceals their presence when they're in danger. These troops are so afraid of enemies learning the secrets of the robe that when they are captured
column3: not only do they kill themselves
column4: they go as far as destroying all of their equipment."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There once was a king who never lost his temper
column2: because he thought by doing so his precious emotional strength would be expelled along with it. However
column3: instead of his anger floating around inside himself
column4: it flowed into his crown. Despite this
column5: the people praised the king who never got angry
column6: ignorant of the rage that filled his crown."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34701_LONGDESCRIPTION":""
"MST_SPHERES_34702_LONGDESCRIPTION":""
"MST_SPHERES_34800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The blacksmith Vanbelk built into this headpiece the power to counterattack anyone who harms it's wearer. He deeply loved all his works
column2: therefore he made one with the ability to defend itself. This crown was able to take the damage it received and throw it right back at its attacker. Vanbelk
column3: along with his seemingly enchanted headpiece
column4: were to be forever remembered by the people."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34801_LONGDESCRIPTION":""
"MST_SPHERES_34802_LONGDESCRIPTION":""
"MST_SPHERES_34803_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An odd device made from an optimized Tech Gizmo. By modifying the output limiter on the back of the head
column2: this upgraded piece turns its wearer into a fighting machine. It's whereabouts are still unknown
column3: and instructions on its use as well as its history are sealed up tight within the vaults of the Sama Kingdom. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34804_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An odd device made from an optimized Cure Gizmo. By modifying the output limiter on the chest in front of the heart
column2: this upgraded piece helps its user to ease comfortably through battles. It is unknown as to how this incredibly intricate piece was developed
column3: and also why it was found in the La Veda Republic."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34805_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Long ago
column2: there was a queen who fell in love with a strange type of flower. She took special care to make sure they had clean water and got just enough light. It's said that she would even speak kind words to them. Then on one warm day
column3: the flowers came to hold a power of their own. Anyone who obtains one of these flowers is said to receive both the queen's kindness
column4: and the power to unleash their innermost feelings with ease."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34806_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Rameldria's authority as one of the strongest dragons around is widely known even among humans. This ring
column2: which provides the protection of Rameldria who rivals the gods themselves
column3: seems to grant its bearer courage and confidence. These feelings elevate with every battle
column4: the resulting power of which makes up the true essence of the ring. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34807_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This magical lance
column2: spoken of in otherworldly legends where it's said to pierce through those it's aimed at multiple times in a single thrust
column3: holds a power that can't fully be unlocked in Grand Gaia and only becomes available when one feels its alien power surge from within. However
column4: the tremendous power that is unleashed when it is activated is so strong that it enables its bearer to break through their enemies defenses."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34808_LONGDESCRIPTION":"It is said that by consuming the heart of a Phoenix
column2: the bird that rules over rebirth
column3: one can gain eternal life. Based on that legend
column4: this crystal was named the \"Phoenix Eye.\" It wasn't clearly known how this crystal
column5: which enhances the vitality of living creatures and increases their recovery rate many fold
column6: was produced. For that reason
column7: it has come to be speculated that it was formed from a crystalized Phoenix eye."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_34809_LONGDESCRIPTION":"I ask you.
\"Why must I grant you strength then have to save you?\"
I challenge you.
\"Why am I not of light
column2: nor of darkness?\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34810_LONGDESCRIPTION":"You
column2:
commander of strategy who walks a courageous path.

To you who have made your way to the end of the innermost region of the uncharted frontier
column3:
with the highest honor and respect we would like to present you with this treasure.

Akras Summoners' Hall"

with the highest honor and respect we would like to present you with this treasure.

column2:
master of timing with a lightning fast draw.

with the highest honor and respect we would like to present you with this treasure.

Akras Summoners' Hall"

master of combos whose attack is relentless.

To you who have mastered the art of Overkill

with the highest honor and respect we would like to present you with this treasure.

Akras Summoners' Hall"

column2:
master of vigilance with a keen sense of your surroundings.

To you who simultaneously slain countless waves of enemies

with the highest honor and respect we would like to present you with this treasure.

Akras Summoners' Hall"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_34900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A legendary holy spear
column2: the tip of which is said to ignore all defenses and penetrate straight through any material. Many expected that it could be used even against the gods
column3: with all the confidence they had in their own defenses
column4: but unfortunately not just anyone could wield it. Due to this
column5: there are many scholars who say the spear is alive and decides on its own where and when to activate."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_35000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There once was an alchemist who wondered if
column2: with magical items
column3: he could unlock the latent powers of people. He ended up creating one that
column4: using a person's state of mind
column5: could manipulate their inner potential. When one who has equipped this item achieves an uplifted state of mind
column6: their abilities are enhanced. It is said
column7: however
column8: that he was unsatisfied with the results and continued his research."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_35001_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Despite the great power he possesed as a warrior
column2: there are many stories of Log Node's failures. For one
column3: he had extreme social phobias. It's said that stone he treasured had the power to unlock the hidden potential of whoever possessed it. However
column4: it retained the flaws of its original owner
column5: rendering its effects useless when the person holding it reaches a pleasant state of mind."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_35002_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Also known as Loglas Mana
column2: this stone infused with the wisdom of the gods requires that the owners state of mind be at its peak. Though its requirements are large
column3: when they are met
column4: the owner experiences immense change. Not only are they granted great wisdom
column5: they're introduced to an entirely new side of themselves."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_35100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There's an old story about an ark that saved many people as the world was being destroyed by a flood. Upon hearing this story
column2: there was an alchemist who decided he wanted to make something similar that would protect its owner from similar disasters
column3: so he began work on his charm. He finished it right before his death
column4: and the final product
column5: the gem he'd so passionately polished
column6: was given his name
column7: Lignes."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_35200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A long sword made using techniques unlike those found in Grand Gaia. The sword is equipped with a special device that
column2: when activated
column3: completely envelopes both the sword and the user in a thin membrane. This rare item is desired by legions of swordsman as it is said that the abilities of those wrapped in this membrane are greatly increased. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_35201_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This armor
column2: named after Abaddon the god of destruction
column3: on top of boosting defense is also infused with a unique magic that increases the user. However
column4: upon seeing the ominous gaping mouth that adorns it
column5: there are some who hesitate to equip it no matter how powerful it is."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_35202_LONGDESCRIPTION":"I ask you.
Why do you want me... What is it you seek?
I challenge you.
Why am I here... Why do I exist?"
"MST_SPHERES_35300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An amulet called the \"Crown Light
column2: \" named after one of the two lights said to be given off by kings. It is said that this light has the power to protect the ruler of the world from all deadly poisons
column3: illnesses
column4: and curses. On the back of the amulet is inscribed its creator's name
column5: Luva
column6: along with a quote from him which reads
column7: \"Median
column8: it's impossible to create a world of peace on ideals alone.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_35301_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An amulet called the \"Royal Light
column2: \" named after one of the two lights said to be given off by kings. It is said that this light protects the one who governs the world from weakness
column3: injury
column4: and paralysis. Remnants of what was engraved on the back by the amulet's creator
column5: Median
column6: read
column7: \"I... chase... ideals. In... ...I believe.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_35400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A jewel named after an island that exists in Grand Gaia. Known for its legend of giants
column2: it's home to countless incredibly strong monsters. Though giants created this jewel to help them oppose these monsters
column3: for a normal person to unleash its power they too must have the energy of a giant. It seems those who are able to unleash its power are granted the strength of the giants."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_35500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"It is not recorded as to who gave this strange sword the name of \"Alter Blade.\" However
column2: anyone who looks at its shape can understand why it was named that. It looks completely different from normal swords
column3: leading many to ask its owner
column4: El Bueler
column5: \"This isn't a sword but a snake
column6: is it not?\" However
column7: he always answers firmly
column8: \"Nay
column9: it is in fact a sword.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_35501_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This fascinating sword known for its power to command dragons came to existence after a beast sought to eat a dragon
column2: leading it to transform into a blade when it exhausted its life force. It has been referred to as a sword in legends
column3: but this unique object merges with the arm of its wielder. It is said that when the vitality of this blade's owner is completely full
column4: the arm turned sword shines as if it held a will of its own
column5: unleashing a supernatural dragon-like power."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_35600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Long ago
column2: there was a pikeman known as \"Grumes.\" He was especially proud of his spear which was able to steal blood from people. Fearing being injured by his spear
column3: it is said that all who fought with him were defeated before they even threw a punch. Claiming victory after victory
column4: Grumes was once quoted as saying
column5: \"This is but an ordinary spear
column6: \" though none who heard believed him. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_35700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"It's been told that this spear eats peoples' souls. Knights thought of it as wicked
column2: none daring to take it for their own. Then one day
column3: a traveling knight
column4: dressed in black armor
column5: tried carrying it away. As those around him tried to stop him
column6: the black knight spoke
column7: \"This spear is like me. No one knows the power it holds. That is why I am taking it.\""

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_35800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"I ask you.
\"Why must humans hate and struggle against each other?\"
I challenge you.
\"Why do people love and sacrifice themselves for each other?\""

"MST_SPHERES_35900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"\"I steal not of my own desire! I am merely responding to the voices I hear calling out for me to steal!\"

(An excerpt from Chapter 2
column2: Section 4 of \"The Adventures of the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite!\")"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_36000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A strange mechanical piece of equipment activated by placing it on a living creature's head. This piece features characteristics of both the Tech Gizmo and Cure Gizmo. Its name abilities are recorded in history books
column2: but its origin
column3: including where it was created and who owned it
column4: is shrouded in mystery. However
column5: nowadays its existence is widely known even in Elgaia. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_36100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A special piece of equipment said to have been used in rituals in the La Veda Republic which was destroyed by the gods. Normally
column2: it takes the form of a goddess statue
column3: but by chanting a special prayer handed down from the high priests
column4: it changes into a full body robe. It is said that this robe
column5: which is able to decrease damage taken from any attack
column6: was to be used against the gods
column7: but it was never used in the great war."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_36200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"It's said that when someone equips this sword
column2: which was once wielded by the god Malda Zechs
column3: all of their abilities are boosted. However
column4: the noble Malda Zechs requested perfection from those whom he granted this power to. He would never grant it to the bruised or unclean. Therefore the Wicked Blade is said to choose its wielder
column5: usually one whose great luck sees them avoiding being attacked in battle."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_36300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The following was passed quietly through folklore.
\"You mustn't touch the Evil Shard.
You mustn't speak of the Evil Shard.
You mustn't think of the Evil Shard.
This is because it has the power to destroy the world.\"
However
column2: sinful foolish humans can't overlook even such a small fragment. They make use of it in order to fulfill their own selfish desires."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_36400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There was a maiden who once went searching for a flower said to bloom way up high on a tower where the gods supposedly lived. Believing in the legends she heard in her village
column2: she climbed the tower in search of the flower thought to unlock powers hidden within people. The villagers worried about for her safety
column3: but no one knew her reason for finding the flower. She wished to become stronger than any one of them."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_36401_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There once was a girl who
column2: in search of a flower said to bloom atop a tower inhabited by the gods in order to heal her sickly mother
column3: departed on a treacherous journey. Moved by her bravery
column4: upon climbing the tower a god presented her with a beautiful flower. As thankful as the girl was to the god
column5: she had still signed into a contract. Once her mother was healed
column6: she was to climb the tower once again to serve under the god."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_36500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Lilly Matah
column2: the fearful empress who is said to have led the Agni Empire
column3: more than anything took joy in making the slaves she took in each area fight amongst themselves. In order to liven up the battles
column4: she would give a King's Crown to her slaves. Whoever wore it
column5: when attacked their hatred toward their attacker would boil
column6: giving them the power to unleash a barrage of attacks much more powerful than normal. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_36600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A city was once invaded
column2: it's people left helpless
column3: and only one young knight stayed behind to protect them. It's said that no matter how badly he was outnumbered or how many wounds he bore
column4: every time he fell the crystal on his chest would shine and he'd be immediately back on his feet. Little did the knight know that this crystal harnessed the power of a phantom bird burning bright with the flames of invincibility. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_36700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"You
column2:
commander of strategy who walks a brave path.

To you who have blazed a trail into the uncharted frontier
column3:
with the highest honor and respect we would like to present you with this treasure.

Akras Summoners' Hall"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_36701_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Charge fearlessly forth
column2:
fine leader of invasion.

To you who have traversed the farthest reaches of the uncharted frontiers
column3:
with the highest honor and respect we would like to present you with this treasure.

Akras Summoners' Hall"

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_36702_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Talented Summoner who excels in all areas.

To you who have made your way to the end of the innermost region of the uncharted frontier
column2:
with the highest honor and respect we would like to present you with this treasure.

Akras Summoners' Hall"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_36800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There once was a boy who ventured up a mountain where a dragon lived to get medicinal grass for his sick mother. He ascended the treacherous mountain pass
column2: eventually completing his objective. However
column3: upon doing so he found himself covered in injuries and unable to descend. Seeing the boy struggle to push on
column4: the dragon granted him with an earring that would turn his inner courage into physical power."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_36900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There once lived a lord who was loved by the people of Alzeon. However
column2: his land was also ravaged by the gods
column3: and
column4: unable to fight back
column5: his people lost their lives. Hearing the dreadful screams of his people
column6: the lord grew angry. His rage endlessly pouring into the pearl he wore
column7: it suddenly exploded
column8: incinerating the gods along with the rest of Alzeon."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_37000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There once was a general in the Bariura Empire who was feared as a god. He lorded over the battlefield with his axe in his hand. It's said his intimidating ambition bound his enemies with fear while encouraging his own troops to fight on like mad men. Geldnite
column2: the fear inspiring general
column3: and his beloved axe would be talked about for generations to come. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_37100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The legendary swordsmith Masamune is said to have put all he had into this sword. It's said that Masamune's ghastly blade has the power to kill gods
column2: though in exchange it requires great spiritual concentration. Because of this it is difficult to use it for too long
column3: but there are many warriors who search it out
column4: believing in its power. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_37200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There's a story about a lost star whose dust fell down from the heavens. The dust gradually grew dim as it sadly fluttered about. A blacksmith saw this
column2: and
column3: waving his hammer
column4: told the light to return home. The stars that watched over the night sky sang and danced in harmony with the dancing hammer. Shining brightly
column5: the lost star finally made its way back to the heavens
column6: leaving behind fragments of dust as it went."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_37300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The legend solemnly speaks.
\"The Magic Ore refines one's heart.
The Magic Ore refines one's hate.
The Magic Ore refines one's ill will.
It is the source of the power to destroy worlds.\"
Pitifully sinful humans hold on to bitterness
column2:
inviting an even greater evil into their hearts as they do.
"

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_37400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"I ask you.
\"Why do people fight for their own name's sake
column2:
giving praise to those who win?\"
I challenge you.
\"Why do people fight for righteousness
column3: giving praise to those who have passed?\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_37500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Though everyone knew this sword's name
column2: none knew anyone who fought with it. Even though its great power is spoken of in legends across the world
column3: nowhere can its name be found in documents. Regardless
column4: people believe in its existence and continue to pass its legend down
column5: saying \"There is nothing the Ragna Blade can't split in two
column6: not even a god!\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_37600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A great sword that belonged to Vargas
column2: one of the Six Heroes. It is said that a blacksmith from the Agni Empire forged it with a special ore using the heat from a volcano. With a blade enveloped in flames
column3: it is said to boost its wielder's spirit. Vargas started using this sword when the war with the gods broke out and its notable contributions throughout have been recorded in countless archives."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_37610_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A demon pike that belonged to Lance
column2: one of the Six Heroes. This pike originated from the Vriksha Duchy and is said to bestow its user with the power of nature. However
column3: it bears a curse that completely fuses the pike to its user over time. It is rumored that Lance could hear the voice of the demon pike
column4: but there are various theories as to what the pike told him."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_37620_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The broadsword of one of the Six Heroes
column2: Eze. He acquired it when he defeated the thunderous beast Behemoth. It may look like an old broadsword
column3: but by influencing the spirit of whomever has equipped it
column4: it grants one the ability to release thunder. Not only does this thunder serve to attack enemies
column5: but it also awakened Eze's physical ability
column6: infusing him with destructive power that even the gods themselves feared. Furthermore
column7: there are reports left that state that the master of this thunder sword will change in appearance as the sword grows with him."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_37630_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A long sword used by Selena
column2: one of the Six Heroes. Passed down through generation after generation of the people of Savat
column3: it's said that whoever holds this sword is their leader. Though this beautifully crafted slender blade may look like a mere decorative piece
column4: it is in fact far more powerful than your average sword. It's told that the sword has a will of its own
column5: and that in melding with Selena herself further drew out her powers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_37640_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The lance that Magress
column2: one of the Six Heroes
column3: wielded long ago. This sharp lance was given to Magress by his father to celebrate his promotion to knighthood. A well manufactured lance
column4: it was initially a common steel blade until it was showered in gods' blood over and over again
column5: endowing it with dark forces. Enveloped in the gods' power
column6: the god killing lance Leomurg grows and evolves alongside its sinister master."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_37650_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The sword that one of the legendary Six Heroes
column2: Atro
column3: wielded. A legendary sword that is said to have been sheathed in the holy site of Lizeria. Its powers help to unleash the full potential of its possessor
column4: but no record of any owners besides Atro remain
column5: causing speculation about the truth of this ability. Legends say the gods were the ones to bestow this holy sword upon others
column6: but new research concerning blood lineage has been carried out since Atro had it in his possession."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_37660_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A set of armor passed down within the royal family of Palmyna. Though it looks like a broadsword at first glance
column2: it transforms into both armor and a great sword
column3: separately
column4: after it is offered a special prayer. Gathering its power from the forces of Mother Nature
column5: equipping it apparently increases the wearer's vitality. No information is left concerning the creator of this item
column6: but according to the legends which tell of its presumed last owner
column7: some suppose it was a creature of free will."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_37670_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Floating in the air as if having a will of their own
column2: these eight blades shred and tear through any enemy. Apparently forged for the single purpose of expelling intruders from other worlds
column3: these blades inherited the strong will of their owner
column4: striking to protect the wielder from harm. As the name of this group of blades suggests
column5: their attack is almost impossible to dodge
column6: spelling almost certain death for the average warrior."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_37680_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Originating from another world
column2: this hair ornament called a \"kanzashi\" is said to have belonged to a fearsome young lady who massacred her enemies as she danced. The beautiful flowers that adorn this luxurious hairpin make it a priceless object from both a monetary and artistic perspective. And although its previous owner never had a second thought about taking the lives of others
column3: she took great care of this particular possession of hers. Drenched in blood countless of times
column4: it acquired magical powers that give the wearer heightened senses on the battlefield."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_37690_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A strange looking tiara believed to have been found when two warriors were fighting in another world. It is said that when placed on one's head
column2: the wearer's abilities grow rapidly. However
column3: due to the great stress that it causes upon the body
column4: it should not be worn when one's condition is below a certain limit. It is also known for invigorating the wearer after having received damage
column5: a magical ability speculated to have been born from the influence of the two fierce warriors who found it. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_37700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An amulet named after the land it was found in as its creator remains a mystery. As it doesn't completely protect its user from all ailments
column2: it is believed that it was a by-product produced when forging a better sphere. \"Love alone protects nothing
column3: and power alone never brings peace\" was engraved on the back of the amulet
column4: sparking speculation over its creator."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_37800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A gem that bears the name of an island in Grand Gaia. Word has it that it was a blessing from the gods in celebration of the founding of the La Veda Republic. It is usually stored in a shrine
column2: but it was bestowed upon the military leaders when the war started. The gem was seen as a symbol of military power
column3: granting the republic's generations of commanders with the power to protect their homeland
column4: but it is believed to have vanished during the war with the gods."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_37900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A gem said to contain the sealed prowess of the gods. It is known for unleashing an immense burst of power when its user is at their peak mental state. When activated
column2: the power it releases exceeds humanly possible levels
column3: but once the burst is over
column4: its user's powers return to normal levels until their mental state reaches a peak again. Many believe that the gem was created to demonstrate the great powers of the gods in order to increase the faith the people had in them."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A shard of a manmade demonic stone said to be an imitation of the evil crystal known to be a source of demon powers. The completed demonic stone wasn't thought to be as powerful as the dreaded evil crystal
column2: but it was destroyed anyway as it was seen as a threat to world peace. The researchers who created the stone all ended up dying strange mysterious deaths and it was rumored that their souls were taken by demons as a punishment for creating the demonic stone."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38001_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An imitation of a stone with demonic powers fabricated by human hands. An item capable of sinking the world into chaos
column2: most Demon Shards were destroyed
column3: except for these clones that survived in safekeeping. Years later the existence of these stones became known to a large number of raiders and adventurers
column4: who immediately sought after them. However
column5: many of them were victims of very strange accidents while looking for the stones
column6: which drove them to give up their search."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"In the palace of a certain empire
column2: there was an alluring witch by the name of Milavis. Fearing assassination and curses
column3: the emperor sought the Amulet of Rouva and ordered the witch to forge something even stronger than it
column4: promising her any reward she desired. The emperor did receive the crystal he asked for which protects him from poison
column5: sickness and curses
column6: but the reward the witch asked for was the very life he wanted to protect with the powers of the amulet."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There once was a king of a small country who
column2: surrounded by rivaling countries
column3: was worried about how he could keep his citizens safe. Eldione the wizard created a range of items to help the king he respected in protecting the country. Among his masterpieces
column4: this crystal which prevents its user from becoming weak
column5: getting injured
column6: or being paralyzed
column7: was considered to be his best piece of work. However
column8: without the king's benevolent administration
column9: the country eventually fell to attacks
column12: was the only survivor thanks to its power."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Zelnite
column2: even on the verge of a life-or-death crisis
column3:
never gave up. His ingenious scheme lit up the night sky and called upon a life restoring miracle!

(An excerpt from Chapter 3
column4: Section 9 of \"The Adventures of the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite!\")"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A sword that is said only to be given to those who are deemed worthy by the Dragon King. With a blade as sharp as the fang of the Dragon King himself
column2: it is believed to be wielded with the goal of eradicating whatever damage has been done to nature. It is still unclear as to whether this sword of legend was really seen by anyone
column3: whether it was part of the god army
column4: or whether it was owned by a hero who defied the deities during the battle against the gods."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38401_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This sword is said to have been granted to humans by the Sea Dragon King. There is no information concerning the owner of the sword
column2: but only that whomever possessed it must have had an incredible amount of bravery that entrapped enemies in a net of fear. There is a popular theory that the Sea Dragon King peeled an inverted scale from its own body to create this blade
column3: but since sea dragons are not fond of humans
column4: it begs the question as to why their king would have done this. The origins of this blade are still being discussed today. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38402_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The Angels with wings on their back are known as devoted servants of the gods. Most of them are entrusted with punishing sinners
column2: but to praise those who have shown remarkable meritorious service
column3: they present them with this great Angel Sword. Each Angel Sword has its own special features
column4: and bear the names of the Angels themselves. However
column5: there is no mention in any record of an Angel by the name of Zeliel
column6: for which this particular sword was named."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38403_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Within the large recorded history left behind
column2: there is a record which states that the gods fought amongst themselves. When a higher ranking god sought to challenge the other gods
column3: this sword was forged to seal his power. There are accounts left behind which state that there were battles in which this sword was not used
column4: but unbeknownst to them
column5: the \"God Sealing Sword\" found its way into human hands
column6: who then carried out its true purpose."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38404_LONGDESCRIPTION":"What is expected of a weapon is the power to destroy enemies. However
column2: though the power of fire may be a great advantage on the battlefield
column3: it takes more than a great sword to defeat an opponent as strong as a god. The smith who forged this sword created it to slay the gods
column4: though he knew he could be killed by them himself. Any soldier who wielded this sword went off to battle ready to die at the hands of the God Army."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38405_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A blade rumored to have torn open the heavens of Grand Gaia long ago. Legend claims that countless demons came pouring out of the opening in the sky
column2: leading some to believe that this blade marked the origin of demons. Because of its infamy
column3: the blade was sought after during the great war with the gods
