column4: leaving records behind which state that humans meant to wield it at the time. However
column5: whether this is true or not still remains a mystery."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A shield born from the World Tree such a long time ago that it is hard to tell exactly when. At first glance it seems to be a shield made of wood
column2: but its durability surpasses that of steel and black diamond
column3: and it is even said to be better than the scales of a dragon. It is said to have been given to a hero before the Battle of the Gods
column4: but there are no records of the hero using such a shield
column5: though it is supposed that he passed it on to his descendants."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38501_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Underneath the underground darkness in the depths of a jewel mine lies a night sky full of stars. Of course
column2: these are not real stars that float in the sky. The ores of these gems reflect the light from something else
column3: making them shine. This mysterious light came from a single shield. Laying down by it were the withering bones of a human next to a rock that had been carved with mining tools that were now broken. The stone read \"Jarva
column4: \" a very well known armor maker of legend."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38502_LONGDESCRIPTION":"It is said that this shield was not originally made for war
column2: but for the gods to show humans the structure of the world. The earth
column3: the heavens
column4: the seas
column5: and the moon were all written down along with the names of the gods that rule them. There are some scholars that believe the gods had a master blueprint when they created the universe
column6: but no such thing is found in mythology. Though there are stories that state that this shield was used in the war with the gods
column7: this claim is widely refuted."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38503_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A shield made by a demon who was preparing to fight against the humans. It is only as big as a fist
column2: but it accumulates all of the magic and miasma floating around it to construct to a protective wall. Condensing more magic than what the usual human gets to witness
column3: it protected the demon from everything in battle. However
column4: since this demon always fought in the front lines
column5: his shield was eventually taken away by a hero
column6: and thus made its way into human hands."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38504_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There was once a feared Summoner who as a general took command of the front lines. He possessed a heavy
column2: shiny shield that bore many scars of battle
column3: which he used to take control over the battlefield. Though some may call his fighting style reckless
column4: it is perhaps more correct to assume he was very confident in his guarding abilities. This shield that was tested time and again in combat still remains as efficient as ever."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38505_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A shield belonging to the winged tribe of messengers of the gods which was passed down from chief to chief. When exposed to sunlight
column2: it shines as if another sun had descended from the heavens. When exposed to moonlight
column3: it reflects all of the stars in the night sky. This shield admired for its beautiful traits never suffers any damage
column4: no matter how strong the attack it receives. Some say it is proof of the supremacy of the gods."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_38600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"I ask you.
\"Why is it that life is not death
column2:
and death cannot bring life?\"
I challenge you.
\"Why is it that death and life are opposites
column3:
and yet they exist together?\"
"

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_38601_LONGDESCRIPTION":"I ask you.
\"Why is it that desire cannot be satiated
column2:
and hope cannot be extinguished?\"
I challenge you.
\"Why is it that despair never ends
column3:
and malice is never exhausted?\"
"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An alchemist once created a demon tool which had the power to awaken a person's dormant potential. After a strange series of events
column2: it found its way into a god's hands
column3: who became surprised when he saw how much human crafting skills had progressed. The demon tool was eventually returned to the alchemist
column4: but it was not the original demon tool any longer
column5: but a divine tool upgraded by the god. No one knows if this was meant to serve as encouragement for humans to aim higher
column6: or if it was a warning from the gods."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38701_LONGDESCRIPTION":"In ancient times
column2: when the menace of the invading demons became known
column3: the gods ordered a group of people to protect Grand Gaia from this threat. The gods granted them awesome powers
column4: actively supporting them and gifting the group with various arms to wield in battle. However
column5: this treasure distinguishes itself from the other gifts of the gods for having the ability to release the potential powers of its bearer as a reaction to their heightened spiritual capabilities."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"During mythological times there was once a man that committed a sin so great
column2: that he could never be forgiven. The man awaiting punishment was presented with a dagger by the gods. Knowing he had been sentenced to death
column3: the man accepted the dagger bravely
column4: and pierced it through his body. However
column5: the man did not die
column6: and lived for 40 years after the fact. It is said that throughout this time he continued to suffer all kinds of illnesses
column7: including poison and other incurable diseases
column8: as well as the hardship of various curses."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38801_LONGDESCRIPTION":"In a rare combination
column2: these are two great swords joined together. This lance with two spearheads is said to have the power to open another dimension. The power absorbed through whatever is pierced by one end is said to be released from the other end
column3: but it seems like a special kind of power is needed to activate this. When used normally
column4: however
column5: this weapon has dark magic that can also inflict poison
column6: sickness
column7: and curses upon its victims."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38802_LONGDESCRIPTION":"According to a certain piece of folklore from the Vriksha Duchy
column2: a demon called Gaze Ohma appears above ground once a year. Bringing with it pestilence and curses
column3: the people never ventured outside on the day of its coming. It is said that the next day
column4: the villagers went outside to find a tree that resembled the lance that the Gaze Ohma wielded. Once this tree had been chopped down
column5: they would pray for another year of sound health."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This was the most ordinary gun in the world. One would load it with normal bullets
column2: and then pull the trigger like with any other gun. However
column3: something strange happened to the body of the person shot by it. It caused numbness
column4: weakness
column5: and sometimes loss of the function of the joints. At the beginning it was believed to have been just bad luck
column6: but some found it strange when it continued to happen countless of times. Thus
column7: the rumor of the cursed gun that could damage the soul was gradually spread."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38901_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There is a myth that tells the story of a hero that descended to the underworld in order to find his deceased older sister. His attempt to revive her proved futile
column2: but the hero brought back with him a lance. Those who were struck by this lance suffered from weakness
column3: deep wounds
column4: and numbness that subsequently lead to death. The hero was successful in many exploits thanks to this lance
column5: but in the end was struck by it himself
column6: causing his untimely death.  "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_38902_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There are many legends of people who descended to the underworld while they were still alive. The story of Bastia is one such legend. The pike he brought back with him from his visit there had the power to pierce vital organs as soon as it was drawn
column2: leaving the wounded enemy with many afflictions in the case of having barely survived death. However
column3: Bastia did not have enough power to control the pike
column4: and once he perished and returned to the underworld
column5: it is said that he kept training with his pike for eternity."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_39000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The gods put sinners in a prison of torture
column2: where this weapon was carried by its guards to execute condemnation. Not much else is known about these guards
column3: but this tool for condemnation was reforged by a human blacksmith. The special shape of the spearhead causes anyone struck by it to suffer every type of pain imaginable
column4: making it an example of a torture device in the human world."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_39001_LONGDESCRIPTION":"In search for revenge
column2: one man sold his soul to a demon and received a weapon of dark magic in its stead. Surpassing the height of an ordinary man
column3: even if this Demon Bow misses the vital points of an enemy
column4: it will still cause their body to rot away. The only thing known about this man is that his whereabouts suddenly became unknown after he exacted his revenge. Only the cursed bow remained hence
column5: giving birth to numerous tragedies one after the other.  "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_39002_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There is a sequel to the story of the Demon Bow. Having helped many to attain the revenge they sought
column2: the Demon Bow's mystical power amplified. Its existence alone became a threat to the harmonious balance of the world
column3: and thus the gods ordered a sorcerer to destroy it. However
column4: this sorcerer became bewitched by the bow's power
column5: and escaped with it elsewhere. Now
column6: in a place no one suspects
column7: the bow's grudge grows deeper as it feeds upon its owner."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_39100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Skills obtained from another world peaked the interest of craftsmen. Thus
column2: the miraculous Demon Dress Manalarg was born. It was supposed to amplify the health of the wearer
column3: and grant them with powers of perception that surpassed human intellect
column4: but it only ended up as an eccentric looking piece of cloth. However
column5: as a piece a garment
column6: this article of rare beauty still remains an innovative piece. It is said to have the power to avert attacks
column7: as well as slightly decrease any damage taken."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_39200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"It is said that the goddess of love had two bangles made of gold and silver on her left hand. Both bangles hide great restorative powers within them
column2: and using them in combination with healing magic can cure any type of wound in an instant. The Gold Bangle seems to be more effective than the White Bangle
column3: but since the goddess gave the Gold Bangle away to someone else
column4: she treasured the White Bangle she had left very much in its stead.  "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_39201_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There is a legend about a soldier who defeated a demon in order to rescue a beautiful goddess that was being attacked by it. The two fell in love
column2: but when the goddess informed him that she had to go back to the far away country she had come from
column3: she left the Gold Bangle she wore on her left hand behind with him.  After that
column4: any injuries that the soldier suffered were completely healed in a short amount of time
column5: and is known as the hero who averted death time and time again."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_39300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"In mythical times
column2: there was once a gambler who tried his hand with a covenant god. The gambler tried to trick the stubborn god with his words
column3: but in the end played right into the god's hands
column4: and was manipulated by him. However
column5: this covenant god had such a serious sense of duty that he offered the spoils of the bet to the gambler anyway. It was a pearl that could increase spiritual power
column6: and it is said that years later
column7: the gambler became a highly regarded priest. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_39400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The customary festival of Falvana is still celebrated in Elgaia. This festival
column2: which originated with the intentions of praying for sound health by letting dolls made of flowers float down the river
column3: is now said to take place in exchange for the statue of this goddess. The statue
column4: bigger than a babe
column5: abates the spiritual burdens of whomever possesses it. One has to wonder if the love of the goddess also makes her shoulder the pains of the flower dolls as well."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_39500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There is a hat that until very recently was required when participating in official business at the Akras Summoners' Hall. This rule exists only in name now
column2: but the truth is that this hat is a replica of the one the companion of the first Summoner wore when they set off on their journey together. The real one had the power of abating the burdens of the wearer
column3: but it seems that it was lost in a battle against demons."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_39600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"In an ancient empire
column2: there was a general who was renowned around the world as a very devout man. He prayed to the goddess of protection day and night
column3: and is said to have lived the lifestyle of a clergyman. When in battle
column4: his soldiers believed that he had the divine protection of the goddess
column5: and thus forgot their fatigue and fought till the bitter end. It is believed that he never actually received this divine protection
column6: but that his fame as a pious man created for him a protection similar to the one he would have received from the goddess. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_39700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"In an ancient empire
column2: there was a terrifying general who was called a demon. Everywhere his troops lay foot gave way for mounds of corpses as they set village after village on fire till they were reduced to ashes. His subordinates did not enjoy performing such cruel acts
column3: but the more they continued following these orders
column4: the more they lost their reason
column5: plundering and slaughtering everything in their path. The bloodbath that ensued after smashing their enemies into bits drove the soldiers onto their next battle."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_39800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The fearful empress Lilly Matah
column2: who left a bad reputation throughout history
column3: had a daughter. When she came of age
column4: her successor took the name of Lilly Laze
column5: and was also known as a tyrant. She carried on with the slave war her mother had started
column6: and had a crown made of forbidden evil jewels. The brutality of the warrior who was given this demonic crown is said to have increased whenever he was struck
column7: leaving a stench of blood so powerful that it surpassed that of his ancestors long ago."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_39900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"\"The Tale of the Soldier with Shining Wings on his Back\"
The sacred fire bird
column2: shining wings--symbols of immortality and proof of courage. Once it rescued a gentle soldier
column3: and again healed a knight of love. When it flutters its burning wings
column4: its wick of life bursts into flames. Concealing a just heart in its chest
column5: it wields a sword that detests sin in order to protect the flame of life
column6: no matter how small it may be. Regardless of how many times it is struck to the ground
column7: it continues to stand up again and again. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_40000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A machine that was left in a treasure box of the Sama Kingdom
column2: which shows signs of being upgraded. It would fire up the heart of whomever equipped it
column3: making his desire to fight boil endlessly with excitement. However
column4: how this machine came to be upgraded even though its design wasn't fully understood
column5: still remains a mystery. It is believed that perhaps the people building it at the time thought it incomplete and kept adding to it
column6: giving the appearance of having been upgraded."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_40100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A treasure from the lost La Veda Republic that was upgraded. The techniques used to upgrade it are unknown
column2: but their results were recorded in detail. One would equip this machine on the heart
column3: stimulating the pleasure gained from battling on the field
column4: and promoting physical recovery. It is also recorded that some of the wearers of this treasure went berserk
column5: like a beast possessed by the moon."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_40200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An artificial Evil Stone created in order to surpass the power of the original. The process was successful
column2: and the resulting stone was more powerful than its original
column3: though the researcher who had created it became mesmerized by it. He didn't regard this experiment he conducted as particularly dangerous
column4: and so he didn't make any details public. Afterwards
column5: the Evil Stone broke into pieces
column6: and its shards are said to have brought continuous calamity about."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_40300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There was a young maiden who raised the God Flag. She followed the practice of this god and fought anyone who opposed him. When the god exercised his power
column2: she would wave the banner as well. It is said that when she did so
column3: the god would recover all of his power in one shot. Her hair and armor were decorated with incredibly beautiful flowers that no human had ever seen before
column4: and which never withered."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_40400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There is a legend in Grand Gaia from long ago that tells of Nine Sacred Treasures which hold immense power. It is completely unknown where these treasures came from and who created them. However
column2: when their names are mentioned
column3: one can be certain that something amazing is bound to happen. The Sacred Gem Quatre Marinus is a name mentioned in the annals of the birth of the Imperial Capital of Randall
column4: with an inscription next to it that reads \"this sword should never see the light of day again.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_40500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"\"How stupid! Are you going to give up your life for a little pocket change? The treasure that you should really be protecting is somewhere else
column2:
isn't it?\"

(An excerpt from Chapter 1
column3: Section 2 of \"The Adventures of the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite and the Princess of the Wind\")"

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_40600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"I ask you.
\"If war gives birth to hatred
column2:
why does it continue without end?\"
I challenge you.
\"If love gives birth to hatred
column3: why do we hope for an eternity of it?\""

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_40601_LONGDESCRIPTION":"I ask you.
\"Why does the hesitation that lead to the future go nowhere?\"
\"I challenge you.\"
\"Why do we falter because of our past instead of moving forward towards the present?\""

"MST_SPHERES_40602_LONGDESCRIPTION":"I ask you.
\"Why do humans avoid picking the best apple in the orchard for fear of failure?\"
\"I challenge you.\"
\"Why do humans pick the most mediocre apple in the orchard hoping for success?\""

"MST_SPHERES_40603_LONGDESCRIPTION":"I ask you.
\"Why do you desire the new while holding on to the old?\"
I challenge you.
\"Why do you hope for a transition when you fear change?\""

"MST_SPHERES_40604_LONGDESCRIPTION":"I ask you.
\"Why do beings of the same origin hate and quarrel with each other?\"
I challenge you.
\"Why do beings of the same origin love and help each other?\""

"MST_SPHERES_40605_LONGDESCRIPTION":"I ask you.
\"If you do not fear being hurt
column2:
how can you still go forth?\"
I challenge you.
\"If you fear being hurt
column3: how can you still go forth?\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_40700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The first weapon to spring from a god as it was cut down during the battle of the gods. Resembling a sword from another world
column2: it was wielded by a nameless soldier from Grand Gaia. It is believed to be the work of the legendary blacksmith Masamune
column3: but its origin is still unclear. When attacking
column4: the soul of the owner of the blade sublimates
column5: releasing an explosive strike in an instant. However
column6: this causes severe exhaustion that makes it impossible to draw-out a fight."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_40800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There is a plant that blooms a very glamorous flower. Earrings that mimicked the shape of this flower became very popular
column2: ranging from cheap wooden pieces to those made out of precious jewels
column3: such as rubies. However
column4: among these was a single stud made of Evil Stone
column5: an unlucky stone which brought about calamity
column6: that got mixed in with the rest. The person who wears this stud is said to display great evil
column7: and will continue cornering whomever that person has deemed an enemy."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_40900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"In his younger days
column2: an elder Summoner found this hat in the ruins of the gods
column3: which has the power to relieve some of the burden as a Summoner. The real artifact is said to have fallen into a crater as the Summoner dodged an attack during a battle that took place by a volcano. The elder still regrets losing the hat so much that he made it a part of the Summoner's Hall uniform."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_41000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A little before the war with the gods happened
column2: there was nameless dancer who performed a very particular dance. It is said that this dancer
column3: who performed the sword dance skillfully
column4: was on a journey to find someone. One time
column5: that dancer forgot one of her anklets in a town she had visited. It is said that the person who found this anklet could imitate the same sword dance the dancer had been seen performing."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_41100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Originally
column2: they were normal earrings that belonged to a noble's daughter. However
column3: one day the young daughter lost her life when she was attacked by a dragon. Enraged
column4: her lover put on her earrings and set off to drench himself in the blood of the dragon. The earrings became the fuel for the lover's revenge. His thoughts focused only on slaying the dragon ignited the fighting instinct within him."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_41200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"If one researches the legend of a traveling blacksmith native to the Agni Empire
column2: one will find nothing but folklore telling of a fallen star. Within the minerals he found
column3: there were unique crystals such as Cosmic Dust and Twinkle Gems
column4: which he could draw their special properties out of. It is still unclear whether or not these were really star fragments
column5: but it is true that they did add special power to the armor they were forged into."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_41300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The following folklore has been passed down in the Agni Region. It is said that when selling one's soul to a demon in order to attain revenge
column2: a voice will call one's name on a moonless night. Guided by the voice
column3: one will reach a sword. This sword is called the Lament Blade
column4: and it is said to cut as sharply as the pain felt by the wielder. The tale of a blood-drenched ogre swinging this sword to get his revenge has left many children trembling violently."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_41400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Though the Agni Empire was known for its many blacksmiths
column2: they were no strangers to fire emergencies. Because of this
column3: a piece of magical equipment which protects its wearer from fire was created to save people who become trapped in burning buildings. It's also thought that it was standard issue for knights
column4: who might have used it when fighting fire breathing monsters."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_41401_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A magical piece of equipment made by a magician to help her fight during the harsh cold. Worrying her piece was still lacking
column2: she refused to hand it out to anyone
column3: however it still said that its powers protected many a traveler from the freezing winds high up in the snowy mountains. There are also examples of them being handed out on Sama Kingdom warships to aid in aquatic survival."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_41402_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There was once an old tree in a great forest in the Principality of Vriksha. It's said that at the end of its life
column2: it placed the remainder of its vitality in a precious stone. It is said that equipment made from this precious stone
column3: known as \"Eylarta
column4: \" grants its wearer protection from earth attacks
column5: as well as fills them with a sense of security as if they're being protected by the great tree itself."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_41403_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A magical piece of equipment created by an inventor in the Atharva Republic. Though people struck by lightning would usually die
column2: wearing this piece of equipment lowers that probability considerably. Though originally created to control lightning
column3: it would be praised for its ability to resist thunder attacks
column4: and was subsequently used in fights against lightning wielding monsters."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_41404_LONGDESCRIPTION":"When the war with the gods began
column2: it is said many people fell to the holy attacks of the gods' messengers. In order to put a stop to this
column3: the La Veda Republic
column4: with the assistance of a magician familiar with dark magic
column5: produced a piece of equipment that protects its wearer from light attacks. Though its efficacy wasn't perfect
column6: it helped to reduce casualties among the knights who wore it."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_41405_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Many pieces of equipment were made with the power of dark magic in the Bariura Empire
column2: where research into dark magic was incredibly popular. This piece of equipment is one of them
column3: wrapping its wearer in shadows to reduce damage taken from dark attacks. It is thought that this is a highly useful piece of equipment in the Bariura Empire
column4: where battles with dark magic wielders is commonplace."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_41500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A necklace said to be possessed by the people of the great forest in which a protective spirit dwells. This mysterious necklace uses the power of a protective entity to increase the fighting spirit and vitality of the wearer. Some stories tell of a particular warrior that wore this necklace who was very successful in battle during the last stages of the war with the gods. However
column2: it is said that the protective spirit that lived within it disappeared after some time."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_41600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The stellar blade of the gladiator who stood against the despotic rule of an emperor. This blade originally belonged to the emperor himself
column2: but the gladiator ended up receiving this from the empress as a token of her love for him. Since the emperor was kin of his beloved empress
column3: the gladiator hesitated to strike him down. However
column4: he ultimately wielded his sword against the emperor he had helped bring to power by leading an uprising."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_41700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"These earrings are said to bring great power and courage to the wearer. They are said to have belonged to a hero who defeated a great black wyvern and then proceeded to build a strong empire by unifying various nomadic peoples. However
column2: whether the power to do this came from the earrings
column3: or whether the hero endowed the earrings with his own power instead
column4: is still cause of great debate."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_41800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A prototype meant for equipment made by the Bariura Empire during the last stages of the great war with the gods. Though it has no capabilities for defense
column2: it does have the ability to recoil attacks suffered by the wearer. This crystal was manufactured with the intention of having inexperienced soldiers equip it
column3: who would then serve as physical counters for attacks suffered from the God Army. However
column4: many denounced this intended practice as inhumane
column5: and production of this crystal was halted after a few prototypes were made."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_41900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A helmet said to have been forged from an ancient comet. It is said that this helmet has a mysterious power which allows it to turn back time when the wearer is attacked
column2: making it seem like the assault never happened. According to contemporary research
column3: the veracity of this ability is disputed. However
column4: many legends tell of numerous heroes who wore this helmet and escaped death thanks to it.  "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_42000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Once there was an alchemist by the name Rigness who produced a piece of glass that could protect people against all sorts of disasters. After his death
column2: the sorceress who found it try to make it even stronger. The possibility of losing this precious relic was very real
column3: but she proceeded to refine it without hesitation anyway. The fact that the name of this heroine did not make the story books is an unfortunate thing indeed."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_42100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There is a wasteland called Ifrikya. This land that has been known throughout history as a barren wasteland has been mentioned in legends as the den of a demon feared by even the gods themselves. It is said that this human hating demon's anger is only exacerbated by the effects of the True Ore that lay underground its nest."
"MST_SPHERES_42200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There are two sacred objects of legend in the La Veda Republic. One is the statue of a goddess
column2: and the other is the statue of a god. Divine robes were fashioned after the one the goddess statue is wearing when the gods demanded it. Legend has it that when both statues wear the robe at the same time
column3: their real powers are unleashed. However
column4: the statue of the god was lost in fairly ancient battle with a demon
column5: and thus the two statues have been unable to meet since then."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_42300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"I ask you.
\"Why do you declare justice when true evil is relative?\"
I challenge you.
\"Why do you loathe evil without knowing why virtue is good?\""
"MST_SPHERES_42400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A mysterious device that seems to have come to life through whispers alone. It stirs up the fighting spirit of the wearer on the battlefield
column2: while increasing the restorative powers of the body as well. There is only one other item known to resemble this one in name. The reason why the creator of this stone was not mentioned even once in the records the owner left behind is speculated to have been in order to protect this valuable item from being stolen."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_42500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Legend tells of a crimson dragon which left behind its heart after its death. This beautiful blade was forged from that dragon heart. It is said to have the power to turn the biggest coward and the wisest man into a relentless battle machine. When striking others with the Dragon Edge
column2: it is said that its wielder experiences a type of elation that cannot be compared to anything else. Even now the crimson dragon continues to terrorize this world after its death."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_42600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A charm shaped like a key that a Summoner of Old is rumored to possess. Once this charmed is used
column2: it opens a portal to another world
column3: where the Summoner may seek further assistance. Every time this Summoner is asked about the key he always makes up excuses
column4: claiming not to know anything about it
column5: or saying that he has lost it. Because his answer varies every time he is questioned
column6: many believe the rumor of the key to be true
column7: speculating that the elder is just trying to hide its existence."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_42700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The history of the Agni Empire tells of the fearful and tyrannical rule of a successive empress. Some rumors state that the servants under her rule who brought prosperity to that era were being controlled with dark magic. No results yielding from that type of dark research were thought to have survived until an improved version of this demonic tool was uncovered later. This inhumane use of dark magic for experimentation is believed to have continued until it was finally destroyed by the gods."
"MST_SPHERES_42800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Quite the curious tale was left behind in a fictitious book. The tale states that long ago a ferocious god from another world appeared in Grand Gaia
column2: challenging the gods who resided there to battle. After a tenacious fight
column3: the otherworldly god was repelled by the gods
column4: and this blade is said to be the only thing that it left behind. Though this story is believed to be a fabrication
column5: it still doesn't explain how Vriksha came into the blade's possession."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_42900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Long ago there was a queen who loved flowers. However
column2: her throne was usurped by one of her retainers
column3: and the queen and her young daughter where chased out of the country. The queen perished from anxiety and grief
column4: while her daughter was forced to live a harsh life in a village nearby
column5: growing stronger through hard labor. This daughter who loved flowers
column6: and whom was loved by them as well
column7: would end up pledging her life to the gods. Once her new self was born
column8: she returned to the battlefield in the country that had exiled her
column9: making flowers of fresh blood bloom in her path."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_43000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A group of alchemists is said to have believed in the spirits of the world. One of them
column2: Grinsel
column3: claimed to have created a lens that collected these spirits. When a person in perfect health holds this shield-like lens
column4: it is said that a barrier is created on the spot
column5: blocking any interference from the outside world. However
column6: no one has been able to decipher the connection between that phenomenon and the spirits of the world."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_43100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Nine divine treasures exist enveloped in mystery that only a handful of people are aware of. Their names not only remain in the history of Grand Gaia
column2: but in the history of Elgaia as well
column3: casting a great shadow through the incidents that surround them. The night before the Elgaia Federation was to be established
column4: an independence supporter is rumored to have exclaimed \"With this lance I can destroy the world.\" as if possessed. The lance was never seen or heard of again."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_43200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Rumors have it that a special demon crystal lurks underground
column2: beneath an ancient temple. This legendary crystal
column3: and the incredibly demonic power that comes with it
column4: is said to have originated from the heart of an evil fiend that proved to be trouble even for the gods. All in all
column5: this crystal has only been found in legends
column6: and thus its existence can't be proven. However
column7: no one can deny that its name appears multiple times throughout many chronicles."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_43300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A lance of legend said to be brought back from the underworld by the hero Farv Opis. Said to burn with the fire of Hades
column2: it is rumored to have been able to pierce through any substance
column3: no matter how solid. Even armor formerly considered impenetrable stood no chance against it. However
column4: no one in the human world was able to control such power in its entirety
column5: and thus its abilities came to be feared."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_43400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"I must become stronger
column2:
in order to save this country.
However
column3: the memories become heavier as the days go by
column4:
and therefore I shall leave them here.
I do not wish to hurt any longer.
Farewell
column5: my beloved."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_43500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The sickle used by the demon Graham
column2: which like its owner
column3: hides a very short temperament. Those rejected by the sickle are said to have been subjected to poisoning
column4: illnesses
column5: and even curses inflicted by the sickle itself. Whether Graham had the sickle made to fit his personality
column6: or whether he went in search of a weapon that would fit his personal style still remains a mystery. However
column7: whenever Graham laughed
column8: the sickle would reap yet another life."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_43600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A legendary blacksmith was once fortunate enough to run into a star that had fallen to the earth. Forging it with a fire full of his strong intentions
column2: the star regained its radiance once again. Reacting to a will that sought to save the people
column3: the star would shine its light in order to prevent calamities from happening. The blacksmith included this star among his many masterpieces
column4: later awarding it to a famous hero. Using this weapon even in the midst of the most wretched battles
column5: it protected the hero and his comrades while continuously feeding the fire of hope in their hearts. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A treasure bearing the name of one of the continents of Grand Gaia. A mysterious and gigantic crater exists in Bariura
column2: and it is believed that this gem had something to do with its birth.  By the time the Bariura Empire had been established the emperor was already in possession of this treasure
column3: building a special room to safeguard the phantasmagoric gem. However
column4: historical accounts claim that the gem was stolen shortly afterwards."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"It is well known that the fairies fought alongside humans during the great war with the gods
column2: but little is known as to how they were able to protect their delicate bodies against attacks. This rainbow robe knit by the fairies themselves is believed to release a film-like protective barrier around the wearer as it comes in contact with demonic powers. "

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_44200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"\"The empress's heart was moved by his words. Nay! It had been stolen by him in the blink of an eye.\"

(An excerpt from Chapter 2
column2: Section 3 of \"The Adventures of the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite and the Princess of the Wind\")"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There was once a taboo experiment that was conducted in the Agni empire which culminated with a certain empress's abdication. However
column2: years later this research surfaced in the Imperial Capital
column3: leading to further experimentation kept secret from the public. Not only were higher quality Demon Stones used for this
column4: but dark techniques had also advanced by this point
column5: giving birth to an even more powerful stone to adorn this crown. However
column6: the creation of this Item caused many misfortunes to come about."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A gem-like demonic tool used to bring back the original essence of valuable treasures such as the Falza Eye and Phoenix Wing. According to the journal written by the alchemist who created the orb
column2: as soon as he got his hands on it he felt greatly revitalized
column3: as if every cell in his body had been born anew. However
column4: this invention was stolen from him before he was able to share his great discovery with the rest of the world."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A strange piece of equipment shaped like a shield. This piece of equipment can foresee when it is about to take damage
column2: and thus can also occasionally decrease the impact the wearer receives. Also
column3: since it becomes very solid and heavy as it guards against attacks
column4: this sensation makes the wearer feel more secure
column5: heightening their mental stability as well. The creator of this piece is unknown
column6: but since nothing else like it is known to exist in Grand Gaia
column7: it is speculated that it may be a product from another world."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44501_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A device that must be worn on both arms and feet. Shortly after putting it on
column2: the body of the wearer is covered with protective armor
column3: and a mirage of the wearer is projected onto the surroundings to confuse the enemy. Once the armor has covered the wearer's entire body
column4: it is said to begin empowering the wearer's soul
column5: boosting their fighting spirit. The origins of such a function remain a mystery
column6: but it is believed that this device was created using very high level otherworldly techniques."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A jasper slate discovered in Mistral. It is said that on it are written the plans of a high ranking god who meant to destroy the current world in order to rebuild an ideal one of its own. The amazing power of creation is hidden within this slab
column2: giving it the ability to change the original properties of objects into stronger and improved versions of the same. It is speculated that this slate was created in order to aid the god with its self-appointed task to rebuild the world anew."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This Sphere was created by Noel of the Akras Summoners' Research Lab. Dubbed the \"Heresy Series
column2: \" these Spheres were apparently created to help the mock Units he had created to evolve. However
column3: though it sounds like their purpose may not be so uncommon
column4: they hide power and abilities beyond the imaginable. Rumors about this orb and Noel's reproduction of it in large numbers continue to spread rapidly."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44701_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A special Sphere created by the head of the Akras Summoners' Research Lab
column2: Noel. A byproduct of his research concerning mock Units
column3: this orb is also part of the Heresy Series. Though mainly created for the purpose of increasing the survival chances of the wearer
column4: it also has great healing properties that may restore HP when damage is taken."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44702_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A special sphere created by the head of the Akras Summoners' Research Lab
column2: Noel. Another of his orbs from the \"Heresy Series
column3: \" its purpose of \"increasing the survival chances of the wearer\" is very similar to that of the Fallacy Orb
column4: though it uses an entirely different approach to do so. With the ability to anticipate disasters before they happen in order to avoid them
column5: it also boosts the basic abilities of the wearer."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44703_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A special sphere created by the head of the Akras Summoners' Research Lab
column2: Noel. Similar to the rest of the orbs belonging to the Heresy Series
column3: it was created for the purpose of increasing the survival chances of its wearer. Though it always stimulates the latent abilities of whoever equips it
column4: the entirety of its powers can only be demonstrated through the cooperation of multiple allies in battle. The Infidelity Orb is said to be overflowing with offensive power that heightens the senses of the wearer as he or she fights to protect others."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44704_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A special sphere created by the head of the Akras Summoners' Research Lab
column2: Noel. This orb takes possession of the wearer's body and controls it to minimize any damage taken. It also converts any surplus energy into magical power. Until now
column3: Noel had focused on creating spheres that increase the survival chances of the wearer
column4: but this time instead of helping the wearer avoid any damage
column5: the sphere's main function is to decrease the amount of any damage taken. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44705_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This Sphere was created by Noel of the Akras Summoners' Research Lab. Its primary function is to maintain the magical and mental power of the one who equips it
column2: and thus contains a mechanism that allows it to encircle the wearer in a magic-enhancing barrier. Due its ability to redirect the excess power emitted when the barrier is expanded even further
column3: this device can hugely increase the user's fundamental abilities."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The sword of Stahn
column2: an otherworldly warrior. This blade known as a \"Swordian
column3: \" is a sentient sword imbued with the personality and memories of Dymlos
column4: a once courageous warrior from another world. The power of Fire lives within this weapon
column5: and grants its wielder an array of other foreign spells. However
column6: the strength of the blade itself can be said to be made for hand-to-hand combat."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44801_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The sword of Rutee
column2: an otherworldly warrior. This blade known as a \"Swordian\" is a sentient sword imbued with the personality and memories of a female warrior from another world rumored to have been Dymlos's lover. The power of Water lives within this short blade
column3: and grants its wielder an array of restorative and supportive abilities."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44802_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The giant axe of Barbatos
column2: a bloodthirsty warrior from another world. Boasting of incredible strength
column3: no armor or shield can withstand its amazing brute force. Rumor has it that any foe struck by this axe is immediately shredded into pieces. However
column4: wielding this axe requires such formidability that it makes it almost impossible for any average warrior to master it."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44803_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A ring containing the soul of Barbatos
column2: a bloodthirsty warrior from another world. This ring is said to awaken the dormant potential and abilities of any who wear it. On the other hand
column3: the ring causes the wearer's fighting spirit to grow to overwhelming levels
column4: leading him or her to continuously seek fights against extremely powerful opponents. Rumor has it the ring makes the bearer especially hostile against anyone considered a \"hero.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_44900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The Licresya flower that blooms near holy shrines was only known to others through ancient myths. Considered the epitome of beauty
column2: many artists exhausted their talents to create decorations for the gods in hopes of persuading them to bring the flower back. However
column3: the first time any human actually laid eyes on this blossom was during the war. This flower that grants more power to its owner was painted on the flags carried by the God Army
column4: bringing nothing but despair to the human race."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_45000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A weapon that encompasses both holy and demonic powers. It is said that Grahdens first obtained it while adventuring in his youth. Certainly ancient
column2: this weapon suits its owner well
column3: though no one knows where in Grand Gaia he found it. No legends mentioning Ishrion have been left behind
column4: and the other Summoners of Old will not speak of it either. Because of this
column5: many rumors claiming that it hides the secrets of the gods
column6: or that its true shape may not be a weapon still circulate to this day."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_45100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The story of an immortal king is carved upon this armor. According to the story
column2: there was once a king who had a piece of armor made in order to avoid death. The king gained the immortality he was after
column3: but losing all his loved ones drove him into a deep depression
column4: and thus he made his way to the underworld to join them. However
column5: even there the armor kept him from dying
column6: prolonging his suffering even further. This story has been classified as a work of fiction
column7: but the armor described in it does exist. It is said that whomever wears it gains such vitality that it seems as if they have achieved true immortality."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_45200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A communicating device used by the Grand Gaia Survey Office Bureau of Investigation. A private line to reach Lin Merylham from Logistics Support
column2: this gadget is her preferred method of communication. There are many Summoners who think of her as an unreliable staff member
column3: but those who actually work with her find her good judgment and precise knowledge to be of great help. Maybe."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_45201_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The emblem of the Silver Knights
column2: the 21st Demon Slayers Division. When the division was first formed
column3: then-commander Noah commissioned a craftsman from the Randall Empire to make these for his subordinates. Though now it is but the mere ornate symbol of a group long-disbanded
column4: the demonic power it holds is said to provide its wearer with divine protection whilst on the battlefield."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_45202_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Earrings owned by Sera of the Akras Summoners' Hall Grand Gaia Management Office. Sera used real
column2: elastic silk to make them herself
column3: and were not originally granted any special abilities. They are said to have taken on special powers as a result of Sera's love for a certain animal
column4: however. Her ability to remain cool-headed at all times during her work may be a result of these earrings' effects."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_45300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A piece of armor belonging to a noble family of the Randall Empire that has been handed down by many generations. Able to sense when the wearer is in danger
column2: the armor is said to have the ability to boost its own defenses. Once the armor was taken from Grand Gaia to Elgaia
column3: rumor has it that its power was sealed away. However
column4: some say that when a certain warrior was finally able to gain self-control by facing his past
column5: the power of the armor was released anew."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_45310_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Summoner Lugina's beloved sword
column2: made from the bones of an ancient dragon. The magic embedded in this blade gives it the ability to react according to the strength of its owner. For this reason
column3: it releases an incredible force when its wielder is dominant on the battlefield
column4: while it becomes extremely dull when the same is in a grievous predicament. Due to the difficulty of its use
column5: some advised that the sword be reforged
column6: but Lugina took it for himself stating that he never falls into mortal danger on the battlefield. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_45400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Priests taught that through had work and dedication even commoners could amass fortune and riches. On the other hand
column2: most commoners believed that the rich came by even more fortune much too easily. Proof of that may lay with this cap
column3: said to effortlessly bring its owner more possessions and money when worn. However
column4: no records are left as to how to obtain it
column5: leaving many to discard it as nothing more than a slacker's fantasy."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_45500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This treasure that heightens one's life-force and spirit is said to have been revered as an incarnation of the gods in a village from another world. However
column2: a knight who saw the reverence of an otherworldly god as blasphemous destroyed the temple it was housed in
column3: and offered the treasure to the La Veda Republic. After this incident there are no records stating that the pearl was ever moved
column4: but later on when the last commander of the knights opened the safe it was kept in
column5: the pearl is said to have been missing."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_45600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The Demon Dress
column2: which crystallized the dreams of the hardworking people
column3: left their hopes as just that
column4: mere dreams. However
column5: one of these people inherited the will of these poor souls
column6: and concocted a plan to upgrade the dress
column7: ultimately fashioning it into the Supreme Robe. This avant-garde garment holds more power than its predecessor
column8: though it did not serve to accomplish its initial purpose--to realize the dreams of the people."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_45700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There was once a man who managed to collect all of the scattered and broken pieces of a demon crystal
column2: fusing them together again and restoring the crystal's power. The incredible magical power that it possessed was said to drive one mad
column3: but according to a certain sorcerer
column4: knowledge that has surpassed human intellect is often dismissed as insanity. The beneficial techniques he left behind in his various works have countless uses
column5: and many of the skills used today are based on his original work."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_45800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"It is said that a heavily protected dark magic tome from the Bariura Empire demonstrated the secret technique needed to convert a demon stone into a true demon heart. Rumor has it that once this heart was produced by fusing multiple souls together
column2: a dark sorcerer appeared once again. It was then subsequently used during the war against the gods. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_45900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The existence of the Nine Sacred Treasures is known only to a selected few. Information about them has been kept well hidden
column2: but according to the discovery of a notebook belonging to a high official of the Agni Empire
column3: he had witnessed the Sacred Axe with his very eyes while it was still in its safe. However
column4: after having laid eyes upon it
column5: he wrote that perhaps his life was now in danger. Strangely enough
column6: the date of this entry in his notebook coincides with the day a famous tyrant abdicated the throne."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_46000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There was once a girl who pledged her life to the gods
column2: and fought against the human race. The girl is said to have resented the people who had made her mother suffer
column3: and loved the gods that have saved her mother. The gods loved her in return
column4: and gifted her with a new type of flower. Infused with divine knowledge
column5: the flower gave the girl a new power once she held it in her hands--the power to hurt many people. Unfortunately
column6: she remained forever unaware of how much her mother grieved to see her fight. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_46100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"\"This is a splendid crown. It's probably worth a good amount of Zel. But things are only things in the end
column2: given random monetary value by others. The only treasure I care about
column3:
is the treasure that resides within me!\"

(An excerpt from Chapter 4
column4: Section 1 of \"The Adventures of the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite and the Pirates of the Evening Calm!\")"

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_46200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"I ask you.
\"If there was a reason why we were born into this world
column2:
what purpose do our lives hold?\"
I challenge you.\"If everything is fated to meet its end
column3: is there anything left after the destruction?\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_46201_LONGDESCRIPTION":"I ask you. For what purpose was this world made? Does this great creation hold any meaning? I challenge you. Why does time never stop flowing? Does anything lie beyond its infinite cycle?"
"MST_SPHERES_46210_LONGDESCRIPTION":"One of the Six Armors found in Ishgria. When it was first discovered
column2: it was operating on its own as the ruler of a certain region until a group of Summoners destroyed it
column3: finally disabling it. Akras Summoners' Hall then gathered the pieces left after the wreckage
column4: and fashioned them into wearable armor. Not only did they improve on its original abilities
column5: but they also managed to replicate its restorative qualities. This piece is said have been engraved with the words \"No. 4\" before it was altered."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_46220_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Created based on the armor worn by Heresy Demon Kalon. It holds both divine and hellish properties
column2: and the unique pattern of sigils on it has the power to boost the wearer's base attributes as well as attack power. This armor balances beauty and utility
column3: and is said to be the embodiment of Kalon's pride in his long defense of the seals in Ishgria."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_46300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Though the history books don't have a very detailed entry on the matter
column2: there is a legend in every region of Grand Gaia that tells of a demon that was crushed by the gods. The demon was believed to have come from another world
column3: and the fierce battle that it endured against the gods still marks the location where it took place till this day. The purest form known of crystallized core was also found there
column4: said to still burn with the rage of the demon's fury."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_46400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An accessory long enshrined in an ancient place of worship within Grand Gaia. According to recent research studies
column2: the sanctuary belonged to the already fallen Stehr Val civilization
column3: whose heroes adorned themselves in such accessories. This particular piece is said to have the ability to increase defensive power
column4: sometimes even turning any damage taken into more fighting spirit for the wearer."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_46500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A divine sword said to be passed down through generations of an otherworldly people. Believed to have been left behind by a god from another world which was visiting Grand Gaia
column2: whoever wields the blade is said to become possessed by that very god itself. Indeed
column3: the blade has the ability to grant its master a ludicrous amount of power
column4: though no mortal is able to withstand it for very long. Even so
column5: its power should be enough to defeat any average enemy within no time at all."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_46600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Once there was a great axe shrouded in darkness which had taken countless lives. Loved by many of its masters
column2: this axe would unknowingly reach into their subconscious
column3: its destructive power growing ever stronger in order to protect them. However
column4: these masters drunk with power became overconfident in their abilities
column5: and began seeking meaningless fights. This only served to shroud the axe Agreious in deeper darkness still."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_46700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Long before the great war between man and gods
column2: a helmet had been made as an offering to the deities of the land. It is said to have been created by a blacksmith with knowledge of otherworldly techniques who had been sought after by the helmet maker Kleinkran
column3: along with other blacksmiths from each region. According to legend
column4: the blacksmith wanted to make a piece of armor that would overwhelm others through its existence alone. The result of his endeavors was a helmet with the ability to reflect enemy attacks
column5: and heal the injuries of its wearer."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_46800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The true form of a legendary garment from the La Veda Republic used for ritualistic purposes. Used as a divine medium to tie two god statues to each other
column2: it was then supposed to be overcome by a great spiritual power which turned it into armor. In ancient times
column3: this mystical armor was worn by the heroes who fought against evil demons
column4: displaying miraculous powers that embodied the gods themselves. However
column5: in the midst of the dreaded battles
column6: one of the statues was lost
column7: and the Monarch Sash was then forgotten in the annals of history."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_46900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Once there was a warrior who challenged the dragon emperor which commanded all other demon dragons in the land. After three days and three nights of incessant fighting
column2: the dragon emperor came out victorious. However
column3: admiring the warrior's fighting spirit on the battlefield
column4: the dragon emperor took one of the bones in his body and gave it to the warrior
column5: who then fashioned a pair of earrings from it. It is said that once the warrior put on the earrings his courage knew no bounds
column6: slaying countless monsters and becoming a hero of legend afterwards."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A treasure as old as the rumors of the Nine Sacred Treasures. This small sword
column2: which was kept in the treasury of the Atharva Republic
column3: is believed to have been part of the Nine Sacred Treasures themselves. Having played a crucial part in establishing the republic
column4: the successive rulers of Atharva have been known to say throughout history that even if the republic were to fall
column5: the treasure must not be lost. However
column6: there are no witnesses who can attest to the existence of this blade."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The Nine Sacred Treasures are said to have been feared even by the gods. Amongst them was the staff Kortz Lezetta
column2: which was sealed in the utmost depths of a sacred territory and guarded by the 12 Guardians of the Gods. However
column3: it is said that no one knows the whereabouts of the staff after the 12 Guardians' insurrection. If it were to reappear in this world again
column4: it would most likely bring with it a whirlwind of chaos."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The white armor of the Ten-Winged Tormentor who was once a menace to the country of Lizeria. After he ceased his destructive deeds
column2: it is said that only his armor was left behind. It is unclear as to who was behind the armor
column3: but according to the diary entries of a female scientist who came to visit the area from another world
column4: there were six pieces of armor that had wills of their own. This piece of armor was one of them
column5: said to have the words \"No. 5\" engraved on its back."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47201_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A piece of the being known once as Duel-GX. Though the material it's made of seems no different than any other metal
column2: inside it are intricate parts that flash intermittently from time to time. It is also unbelievably stark
column3: though it bears many scars and signs of melting--indications that that Duel-GX was once caught in a very fierce fight. Story has it that this fragment with the words \"No. 1\" carved on its backside belonged to the daughter of a prestigious household."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47202_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A crystal sphere rumored to be the driving force of a very powerful demon puppet. Its inner workings remain unknown
column2: but it is said that when this sphere is placed within a lifeless doll
column3: the doll begins to move as if having a will of its own. One theory claims that the sphere is the work of a demon father who sealed his own soul within it in order to look after his daughter even after his death
column4: but no proof has been found to support this claim."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47203_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Once there was a group of warriors called the 12 Guardians of the Gods. Being the most gifted warriors in the whole of Grand Gaia
column2: they were admired by the people
column3: and were the only ones allowed to carry proof of their status as holy guardians. However
column4: when the great war with the gods broke out
column5: they were separated into two factions
column6: pinning themselves against each other. After the battle
column7: this Sphere was found split in half on the battlefield."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47204_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An item carried by the 12 Guardians of the Gods which served as proof of their status. After the battle amongst the Guardians' two factions
column2: this Sphere fragment was found on the battlefield along the Guardian Shard. Though it looks like the two connect to form one original Sphere
column3: the damage and dirt on their surfaces suggest that they are parts of two separate different entities. The reason why only half of each Sphere was found remains a mystery."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47205_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A half-translucent stone that Reed
column2: Lucana
column3: and Aneil found when they were children. Originally there was nothing special about the stone
column4: until Lucana received a revelation from the gods that asked her to guide her people towards a new promised land. It is said that it was only after this event that the stone began emitting a mysterious light. Lucana took the glowing stone with her throughout her journey to the promised land
column5: and its light served as a beacon of courage and hope to her people."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47206_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A piece of armor which suddenly appeared when the otherworldly scientist Reeze found herself in great peril during her battle against the gods. It is said that the piece somehow matched perfectly with the rest of the upgrades she had done to her own body. Reeze gained great power thanks to this addition to her equipment
column2: but instead lost many of her human qualities in the process. It is said this piece of armor had the words \"No. 3\" carved upon it."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47207_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There are many stories surrounding the disciples known as the Six Pillars who rebelled against the higher gods. One legend claims that they all came together to face off against the same higher god
column2: but once they had collected enough power to strike
column3: the god fled. In its stead only a single crystal remained
column4: and the whereabouts of the Six Pillars became forever unknown thereafter."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47208_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A necklace passed down for generations in the small nation of Fordia
column2: which was located near Bariura. A scarlet gem is embedded in its center. The gem holds the power of a Fire Spirit
column3: and is believed to grant its protection to the necklace's wearer. It is said that Fordia's royal family used this necklace in important rituals. The necklace's current owner is unknown
column4: but legend has it that Fordia's last queen gave it to a certain young man."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47209_LONGDESCRIPTION":"These two bracelets were granted by the Sealed God Lucius to the Oracle Knight and Oracle Maiden. It's said that the Knight's bangle is imbued with divine courage to face the enemies of Lucius
column2: and the Maiden's bangle is imbued with divine purity to convey the will of Lucius. The bracelets are bestowed as a symbol of the Oracle
column3: but some surmise that they may also allow Lucius to monitor those who would faithfully carry out his divine will."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47210_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A refined long sword used by a mysterious swordsman. Due to his actions
column2: many people were able to find new life in Elgaia
column3: and tell of his tale to future generations. Because the swordsman is said to have been similar to Vargas of the Six Heroes
column4: it is patterned after his legendary sword
column5: the flaming Dandelga. The blade is covered in shining flames
column6: and it is said whoever holds it feels their fighting spirit rise from within them like an explosion."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47211_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This mysterious gem secretly found its way into the cloak of Great Thief Zelnite
column2: who stopped the Bariura Empire's conspiracy and saved its people. Though none know it now
column3: the gem became an irreplaceable friend and partner to him
column4:
and the two went on to have countless adventures together!

(An excerpt from Chapter 3
column5: Section 10 of \"The Adventures of the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite!\")"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47212_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A gem said to have been held at all times by a deity with incomparable wisdom. It is said that the deity stored antithetical concepts such as the sacred and profane
column2: order and chaos
column3: and truth and falsehood within it
column4: and amplified their conflicts in order to create impenetrable barriers against all interference. However
column5: tales also tell us that using its power requires substantial strength of the part of the user
column6: and that normal humans will be sucked into the gem and lost if they so much as touch it."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47213_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A blade entrusted to the first captain of the Randall Guard by his heroic father. Legends hold that this superior weapon was used during humanity's initial flight from Grand Gaia
column2: and that it is now kept under heavy security by the Imperial Guard. The will of past wielders to protect the people has been infused into this blade
column3: granting it power worthy of its title as a sacred item. This blade holds the power to turn the tide of any situation."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47214_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A crystal that the woman who became the wife of Ishgria's dragon clan chief is said to have poured her special powers into little by little to create.  It is thought that she originally prepared the crystal for her husband and son
column2: and therefore her final wish lies within. It is said that
column3: while limited
column4: it has the power to predict the future in critical situations
column5: guiding the wielder to a future free of worry."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A lance of fire the Holy Emperor Karna Masta granted to Claire
column2: one of the Guardians of Meirith. It is but a reproduction of a fabled Sphere of legend recreated by a Summoner of the Akras Summoners' Hall. Rumors say that the lance came into Claire's younger brother Colt's possession after she fell in battle. Possessing immense power
column3: all research concerning this Sphere came to a halt when the summoned Claire's hidden abilities were successfully unlocked."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47301_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A blade of ice the Holy Emperor Karna Masta granted to Colt
column2: one of the Guardians of Meirith. It is but a reproduction of a fabled Sphere of legend recreated by a Summoner of the Akras Summoners' Hall. Rumors say that this blade has the ability to manipulate the moisture in the air through the cold it releases
column3: freezing it upon contact. The original blade is believed to have held a much more unbelievable power
column4: though its whereabouts remain unknown."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A Sphere that has been under the care of the Akras Summoners' Hall since its foundation. Though absolutely nothing is known about when or where the Sky Orb was found
column2: the only thing that is certain is that it contains wisdom far beyond the capacity of mere mortals. The Summoners of Old refuse to speak of it
column3: but there are rumors which tell of a Summoner who was once taught to use powers even more ancient than gods and demons by the Summoners of Old themselves."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47410_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A Sphere that has been in the custody of the Akras Summoners' Hall since its foundation. According to legend
column2: the Heaven's Edge was created by beings far more knowledgeable than mere humans
column3: though their existence has been the subject of debate since ancient times. This Sphere is believed to be a remnant of the world that existed before this one
column4: which was supposedly brought into existence before the heavens and the earth were ever created. However
column5: there are currently no methods available to prove such a claim. The only evidence that can support this is the overwhelming power the Heaven's Edge possesses."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A diamond shield created by mixing advanced science practices with powerful magical spells. No matter what type of attack it receives
column2: this superb shield has the ability to increase the vitality of its owner
column3: making it a highly coveted accessory by all soldiers in Grand Gaia
column4: and those of the other world it originated from. However
column5: a great amount of luck is needed to acquire this shield
column6: as well as a great expense that must be paid with it. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47501_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A cursed blade which once belonged to a general from another world. According to legend
column2: all enemies cut down by this sword would be robbed of their souls
column3: screaming in a most inhuman voice as life left their bodies. Though the existence of a curse cannot be confirmed
column4: those swordsmen who have wielded this katana at least once will attest to the notion that it moved on its own accord whilst in their hands
column5: leading them towards the enemies which had the weakest defense on the battlefield. At any rate
column6: there is no doubt that this blade hides within it a terrible power. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47502_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A magical sword of legend from another world. Not only does it possess the ability to guard its master against all sorts of calamities
column2: but the bright light released from its sharpened tip can also reduce any enemies it strikes to shreds. Its magical powers feed off the willpower of its wielder
column3: an ability that according to otherworldly myth rendered a particular warrior able to perform miracles. This legendary weapon has also been recognized for its great beauty
column4: though acquiring it can prove to be an arduous task."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A literary work said to predict the end of the world. A prediction claiming that in the near future the world will be brought to ruin by humanity's desire to obtain the forbidden demon arts can be found inscribed inside. However
column2: not everything written on this book involves despair. As a matter of fact
column3: the last chapter gives guidelines as to how to reach the promised land. The hidden power of whomever owns this book is said to be released when the reader learns to carry that hope."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47601_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A blade made to resemble that of the War Demon Shusui. Boasting of incomparable raw power
column2: whoever owns this blade will be invigorated by its fighting spirit
column3: receiving demon-like strength in the process. However
column4: some say that this fighting spirit's yearning for battle renders the weapon's owner incapable of stopping themselves from seeking combat."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A demonic Phoenix Crown found in the ruins of the Agni Empire. Vermilion
column2: the emperor at the time
column3: ordered his best blacksmith to create this crown by using forbidden demonic arts. Many suffered due to various plagues and diseases that ravaged the country before its completion
column4: but it eventually came to be called a masterpiece of the highest quality due to its ability to bring its wearer's potential to extreme limits. It is said that as its name suggests
column5: no matter how many times the wearer is taken down
column6: they will rise like the phoenix once again."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The Nine Sacred Treasures are always mentioned in the darkest parts of history. In the Bariura Empire there were once some very well guarded black crystals
column2: and within them one which granted others the ability to see clearly into the future. During the great war with the gods it is said that the emperor took a look into the crystal and saw an ominous smile. Many are still after this treasure today
column3: but it has yet to be found."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A jewel named after of one of the regions of Ishgria
column2: which can be accessed through the Grand Gaia Crater. It is said that this gem originated from the power of the gods fighting in another land. Whoever possesses this treasure is said to be revitalized and empowered
column3: as well as driven to fight as if another epic battle were on its way. The authenticity of such a treasure remains uncertain
column4: but if its power is real
column5: it could prove very useful when exploring new lands."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47901_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A jewel named after the Ishgria region. Whoever possesses this gem is said to feel overwhelmed with power as the energy they intake revitalizes and reinvigorates them for an extended period of time. It is believed to have been made from the remnants of power left behind after the war of the disciples against the demons
column2: but no specific details are known about it. However
column3: if this treasure's power is indeed real
column4: it could come in handy whilst in battle on the land the gods have forsaken."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47902_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A jewel named after the Ishgria region. It is said that one of the disciples who fought against a demon who once lived in an ancient castle donned this mysterious gem. Since this beautiful gem has the power to bolster its wearer's abilities
column2: the battle against the demon is believed to have been a long one. Even an eternity later
column3: this gem's powers are still active
column4: and could probably come in handy when fighting in tumultuous regions."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47903_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A jewel named after the Ishgria region. The giant miasma-emitting flowers that grow in Wulgee are said to be the manifestation of the anger felt by demons condemned to that land. The seed of the Wulgee
column2: the flower which lends its name to the region and this Sphere
column3: is believed to have been mixed in with other seeds native to the area many decades ago. For this reason
column4: no one has ever seen it with their own eyes. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47904_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A jewel named after the Ishgria region. Originally the organ of a demon which hid its body's vital points
column2: it is said to have given enemy disciples a tough time during battle. However
column3: a high ranking god would eventually subdue said powerful demon
column4: collecting its remnants after its defeat and compressing them into a gem through a divine technique. Possessing the ability to change its shape to match any situation
column5: this Sphere is believed to have reawakened the power of the \"Supreme Eye.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47905_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A jewel named after the region of Ishgria. Everything about the great giant tied up and left to its doom in this land is a mystery. Was it a demon
column2: or perhaps a servant of the gods? And why was it restrained? The giant also gives off waves of energy that harden materials--a power said to crystallize into the form of a jewel within the giant's body once every few centuries."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47906_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A jewel named after a region of Ishgria. Since this region was once home to many demons with the power of dragons
column2: the disciples of the gods faced fierce battles when they invaded. In these battles
column3: the demons went mad with rage and began to create sinister vortexes from the jewels they wore. Wrapped in these vortexes
column4: the demons' attacks grew in force as they gained power
column5: and it is said that many of the disciples of the gods were slain."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47907_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A jewel named after a region of Ishgria. With its constant snow cover and brutal climate
column2: Estria is rarely involved in territorial conflicts
column3: and retains beautiful scenery. However
column4: it is said that the region houses immense energy reserves underground. Furthermore
