column5: rumors hold that a certain demon keeps a jewel containing a compressed form of that energy locked away somewhere."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_47908_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A special stone bearing the name of one of Ishgria's regions. Many demons perished in battle against Holy Emperor Karna Masta
column2: and much was lost to finally seal him in this land. The concentrated and crystallized malice of these demons is thought to also rest somewhere in this land. The one who uncovers it shall be possessed with unspeakable rage against the gods
column3: and augmented with incredible power."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A bow which belonged to Loch
column2: one of the Four Heroes of Palmyna. It is one of the weapons passed down from generation to generation in Loch's family
column3: which served Palmyna royalty as sword instructors. Though it was a very powerful bow to begin with
column4: it is said that after Loch faced Cardes the Malevolent for the first time
column5: its power reached new limits. The reason behind this is suspected to be the fact that Eshuon was drenched in the blood of the Fallen God during the battle. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A crystal that formed from the bonds shared by the Four Heroes of Palmyna
column2: who sealed Cardes the Malevolent. Said to have come from the passage to the Underworld that opened during the fierce battle against Cardes
column3: the crystal gives the protection of the Four Heroes to whomever possesses it. According to one theory
column4: this crystal is believed to be a part of the sealed Cardes himself
column5: housing the souls of the Four Heroes within."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There was once a pixie named Piany who lived deep in the woods of the great forest east of the Vriksha Duchy. Though she never showed herself in front of humans
column2: it is said she did trust a princess who loved nature. However
column3: when a plague threatened to wipe out all of the people that the princess held so dearly
column4: the pixie used forbidden demonic powers in order to help her. She then transformed herself into a flower that keeps all illnesses at bay."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48201_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A simulator Noel found while developing the Frontier Gate. Made in a completely different fashion than anything else in Grand Gaia
column2: its purpose still remains a mystery. However
column3: it was able to gather a lot of demonic energy after Noel upgraded the demon core that serves as its power source. It is said that this transforming device can awaken the latent potential of its wearer."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48205_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There was once a flying dragon named Kiravell which lived near the Sama Kingdom. At the time
column2: a rumor claiming that bathing in dragon's blood would make one immortal spread like wildfire
column3: and thus many warriors attempted to take Kiravell's life. However
column4: none of them survived the wrath of the dragon's Thunder Pearl
column5: which tore them all to pieces. When the leader of the Sama Dragoons heard of Kiravell's fury
column6: he went to see the dragon in order to appease it
column7: eventually gaining Kiravell's Thunder Pearl itself as a symbol of their mutual trust."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48206_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A simulator Noel found while developing the Frontier Gate. It is said that the beautiful semi-conductor found inside
column2: which shines in different colored lights
column3: has a lot of information regarding the history of Grand Gaia stored within. As soon as Noel took a glance at this data
column4: he nodded to himself in approval while smiling
column5: and promptly added a new function to the machine. It had now acquired the ability to penetrate the enemy's most vital points."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48207_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There is a legend in Grand Gaia from long ago that tells of Nine Sacred Treasures which hold immense power. It is completely unknown where these treasures came from and who created them. However
column2: when their names are mentioned
column3: one can be certain that something amazing is bound to happen. The Sacred Blade Quatre Marinus is a name mentioned in the annals of the birth of the Imperial Capital of Randall
column4: with an inscription next to it that reads \"this sword should never see the light of day again.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48208_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A precision simulator discovered by Noel while developing the Frontier Gate. Created with technologies unlike those of Elgaia
column2: it is said this device contained records on many phenomena in the world of Ishgria. After transferring this information to other media
column3: Noel reworked the device extensively. Transformed
column4: its current function is to greatly increase the user's defensive abilities during real battlefield use."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48209_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A sphere made with a precious Material referred to as \"the metal of fire.\" The metal has properties that cause it to emit magical power when struck. Noel processed it according to notes in an ancient text believed to have been written by Vandite
column2: the \"Artist of Flames\" of ancient Grand Gaia. The development of the Frontier Gate is said to have made explosive progress thanks to the discovery of this immensely magical metal."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48210_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A sphere made by applying technologies used in the development of the Frontier Gate. Possesses the ability to reflect malice and ill-will directed at its wielder by heightening their spiritual power. The technique used in its creation involved the Summoner projecting uncertainty and fear through training. However
column2: due to fears that the training could not be completed owing to the intense burden it placed on the Summoner
column3: these plans were suspended."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48211_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A device Noel discovered and converted into a Sphere when developing the Frontier Gate. On discovering radioactive materials produced with otherworldly technologies while investigating its interior
column2: Noel transferred the material to a unique catalyst. He then detected high levels of life energy from it
column3: and proceeded to modify the device into a Sphere. It has manifested self-repairing functions
column4: and Noel continues to mutter about room for further study."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48212_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A Sphere Noel produced based on otherworldly technologies excavated in Grand Gaia. It has the ability to detect its wielder's will and amplify their strength. However
column2: experiments intended to determine the upper limit for this amplification were halted when abnormalities were detected in the wielder. The spiritual induction technologies developed in the creation of this Sphere are said to have been used in the Frontier Gate itself."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48213_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A high-precision simulator Noel discovered while developing the Frontier Gate. It emits a unique form of light
column2: and can project three-dimensional images. It can reproduce scenes of the past that are extremely realistic. Noel has applied this technology to several fields of study
column3: and in doing so developed a unique scene to play. It is believed to heighten the will to fight in those who see it."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48214_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A high-precision simulator discovered by Noel when he developed the Frontier Gate. Its integrated circuits contain information about various events involving the spirits of Grand Gaia
column2: and shine with aquamarine light as they operate. When the spherified device is equipped and fully purified with spiritual magic
column3: it attracts the goodwill of peace-loving spirits and assists the body in recovering from injury or fatigue."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48215_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A device discovered and made into a sphere by Noel when he developed the Frontier Gate. It affects the wearer's mind
column2: and is capable of forcibly activating latent abilities. While it is highly effective
column3: prolonged use will result in tremendous mental strain
column4: and there are recorded cases of permanent psychological damage during the device's testing. Due to this extreme hazard
column5: Noel hurriedly added a safety circuit which automatically shuts the device down after a fixed time."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48216_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A sacred ring said to have been created from the tears of a god long
column2: long ago. It grants the wearer immense protection
column3: and holds the power to forestall any disaster. Its name appears countless times in many legends leading up to the present day
column4: but it was thought to be fictional due to the lack of concrete information. However
column5: its existence was verified thanks to an inscription found by a Summoner who collected fragments of memories."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48217_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A Sphere Noel produced by incorporating ancient materials discovered during the development of the Frontier Gate. Due to the poor response of ancient materials
column2: its performance was questioned initially. However
column3: the completed Sphere demonstrated impressive powers. These powers included avoidance of danger via precognition
column4: and the ability to convert its wielder's fear into strength. It is said that Noel muttered
column5: \"it's impressive for something still being researched
column6: \" upon seeing its abilities."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48218_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A Sphere created from a device Noel discovered when developing the Frontier Gate. It amplifies the wielder's offensive power
column2: then stores the energy that is produced and converts it for defensive purposes. Many of the researchers viewed it as an excellent Sphere for both attack and defense. However
column3: Noel is said to have been dissatisfied
column4: calling it \"imperfect\" because its defensive powers are dependent on offense."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48219_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A Sphere made by incorporating a substance Noel discovered when developing the Frontier Gate. It stimulates the wielder's regenerative powers
column2: and has the ability to heal wounds instantly. However
column3: the substance used in its creation is poorly understood
column4: and one theory holds that its effects are due to parasitic creatures present within the substance. Accordingly
column5: only a few prototypes have been made
column6: and the Sphere is not in mass production."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48220_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A Sphere created from a material Noel discovered when developing the Frontier Gate. Incorporating data on the gods that threatened Grand Gaia
column2: it grants its wielder divine majesty and dominance over their vicinity. It is also said to reduce offensive effects from those who oppose its wielder. Supposedly
column3: Noel complained that \"this is only an imitation
column4: it surpasses nothing
column5: \" after its development."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48221_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A Sphere Noel created by incorporating fragments of a certain demon's soul discovered during the development of the Frontier Gate. It endows its wielder with the limitless lust for combat of Ishgria's demons
column2: and has the power to enhance its wielder's combat skills. On seeing the Sphere's performance
column3: Noel muttered \"I guess we need more research to exceed the real thing
column4: \" and plunged headlong into a quest for further performance upgrades."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48222_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A Sphere that utilizes a phenomenon Noel discovered while developing the Frontier Gate. Bearers are said to enter into a state in which they feel like they could fight forever. They gain inexhaustible reserves of fighting spirit
column2: and never feel fatigue regardless of how long they have been in combat. However
column3: it is also said that Noel restricted usage of this Sphere to research purposes only
column4: due to concerns that protracted use could cripple its bearers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48223_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A device Noel discovered and converted into a Sphere when developing the Frontier Gate. Originally manufactured amidst a war between two nations
column2: its power to critically incapacitate its wearer's enemies ultimately brought both countries to their ruin. Some claim that although Noel condemned such power as the creation of heinous people
column3: he conducted his research on the sphere quite happily."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48224_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A sphere made from a seed Noel discovered during the Frontier Gate's development. The plants that grow from this variety of seed grow at more quickly when damaged
column2: and their essence grants the sphere heightened regenerative powers. Noel remains dissatisfied with its abilities
column3: however
column4: saying
column5: \"Someday I'd like it to grow fast enough to cover an entire island.\" He is rumored to be at work on improvements."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48225_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A sphere that Noel created based around a device featuring a resonance action that he discovered during development of the Frontier Gate. It is said to be able to sync with and amplify any kind of power
column2: and if used in combination with different types of attack
column3: can display enormous power. For a while after developing this sphere
column4: Noel was absorbed in devising combinations that would yield the maximum effect."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48226_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A Sphere developed using a variety of a particle that Noel discovered when developing the Frontier Gate. These particles have properties that cause them to absorb negative energies
column2: effectively protecting the bearer from all manner of calamities. Even so
column3: the particles do not show any clear change from this phenomenon
column4: and it is not clear what befalls the energies absorbed. Noel is said to have muttered something about a \"new Gate\" while experimenting on the particles."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"One of the three \"Demon Weapons\" used by ancient demons to fight against the gods. Bearing unimaginable power
column2: this weapon pulverized any menacing demons in a manner of seconds. Though its current whereabouts remain unknown
column3: literature pins this particular Demon Weapon as the most powerful of the three. Therefore
column4: it is believed that the Demon Striker was used to rule a region controlled by a war demon."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48301_LONGDESCRIPTION":"One of the three \"Demon Weapons\" used by ancient demons to fight against the gods. As it bears unimaginable power
column2: the gods feared it and sealed it away in an unknown location. Though its current whereabouts were thought to be unknown
column3: literature indicates this particular Demon Weapon rules over \"order.\" Based on the Demon Silk's properties
column4: one can surmise that the demon who possessed it protected important bases from attacks by the gods."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48302_LONGDESCRIPTION":"One of the three \"Demon Weapons\" used by ancient demons to fight against the gods. Fearing its unimaginable power
column2: the gods seized the crown known as the Demon Igniter and secreted it away. Though its current whereabouts were thought to be unknown
column3: literature indicates this particular Demon Weapon rules over \"unity.\" As such
column4: it's thought that the Demon Igniter was worn by a demon responsible for rallying forces against the gods."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Many literary works collected by the Vriksha Duchy mention the legend of the Amenonuhoko. Eons ago
column2: when Grand Gaia knew no heaven or earth
column3: nor even the names of the gods
column4: the light of a brilliant spirit from another world appeared in Grand Gaia. Using the Amenonuhoko it created various islands
column5: and the humans that would encapsulate other spirits shortly after. This legend is based on a story from another world
column6: however
column7: and its degree of authenticity remains unknown."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48410_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An ancient red pearl found in the ruins of the Agni Empire. Long ago
column2: the Agni Empire saw itself threatened by the rage of a fire dragon. The emperor at the time ordered his soldiers to slay the dragon
column3: but as soon as they met the dragon's gaze
column4: their bodies were set ablaze. This treasure is said to have been made from the eyes of this fire dragon
column5: which had the ability to heal its own wounds by incinerating its enemies."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48420_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The Flower Mirror is a treasure believed to have belonged to the fairies since ancient times. Able to reflect the deeds of whomever looks upon it
column2: the mirror is said to have been used by the fairies to judge those humans who wondered into their forests. Legend has it that when the God Army invaded the fairies' home
column3: their queen decided to fight back after the mirror showed her the beautiful reflection of a young man resisting their attack."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48430_LONGDESCRIPTION":"One of the powerful and mysterious crowns handed down from god to god. Though its origins remain a mystery
column2: there is one account left regarding this crown. According to the story
column3: this crown is named after the goddess who lived in the Tower of Trials and had given her divine protection to the flower-loving queen of a small country. When the young queen saw the goddess bearing this crown
column4: it is said that the divinity which surrounded her immediately prompted her to pledge her life to the gods."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Legend has it there was once a Ten-Winged Tormentor who was destroyed by five brave warriors after it had caused mass destruction. During their final battle
column2: each of the five warriors' attacks exhibited a light of different color that combined with the rest
column3: leaving behind a single locus of five different hues. The origins of a painting depicting this locus made of colors that refused to merge together is unknown
column4: but it is said that to this day whoever looks upon it is filled with courage."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A special sphere created by the head of the Akras Summoners' Research Lab
column2: Noel
column3: which was made from a peculiar material found within the Vortex Gate. This Sphere not only boosts the basic abilities of its wearer
column4: but also has the power to inflict status ailments upon its targets. However
column5: since Noel was unsatisfied with the final product due to its instability
column6: rumor has it that he is still researching the Metal Orb in order to improve it."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48601_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A special Sphere created by the head of the Akras Summoners' Research Lab
column2: Noel. Its core consists of a foreign substance which was found in the Vortex
column3: and later purified through the dark arts. While conducting an experiment that fooled a certain Summoner with green hair
column4: it was found that this orb had the power to heighten all of its wearer's abilities. The Summoner in question was in terrible shape after suffering from a curse
column5: but the Brass Orb is said to have helped the Summoner recover."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48602_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A special Sphere created by the head of the Akras Summoners' Research Lab
column2: Noel. The Steel Orb was made from a highly explosive material found in the Vortex. And similar to its fiery nature
column3: this Sphere boosts offensive abilities in battle. Although Noel was satisfied with the final product
column4: he decided to continue exploring the properties of this Sphere's substance in hopes of eventually combining it with something else."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48603_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Chief Noel of the Akras Summoners' Hall Research Lab developed this unique Sphere using a durable ore collected from the Vortex. Wielders' bodies emit a faint aura of heat on equipping this Sphere
column2: and its use creates a strong sense of empathy between the wielder and their comrades. In doing so
column3: it also heightens the bearer's restorative powers and induces a distinct sense of well-being when equipped. Given that the extent of this property's psychological impact is entirely unclear
column4: Noel continues to hasten data collection efforts."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A staff of lore from another world. Meant for healers to support their comrades from the sidelines
column2: this staff is said to possess incredible healing and protective powers. The Volunteer Army faced many battles against enemies who sought to destroy its world
column3: and legend has it that it was the Chronicle Staff which saved all of its members from danger by shining its powerful light upon them."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A blade endowed with magical power forged in another world. Said to turn its wielder's life force into strength
column2: the blade shines in a blue hue as it grows sharper relative to its owner's vitality. This blade's history can be traced back to the great war in ancient times
column3: having made its way from the hands of a sorcerer seeking utter destruction to the hands of the heroes who would protect the world from said villain."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_48900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Flame-cloaked
column2: scaly gauntlets. They convert the wielder's magical essence to that of a dragon
column3: and heighten offensive capabilities immensely. In the words of one Summoner who conducted prototype testing for them
column4: it felt as though time stopped for an instant when attacking an enemy. Furthermore
column5: mass production of the item has been halted as the effects of continuous dragon-transformation on wielders are not well understood."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_49100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"One of the Nine Sacred Treasures. Legends of this bow still linger in the Principality of Vriksha. When a great fire ravaged the Principality
column2: the flames devoured the woods nearby
column3: and it was thought that they would all be reduced to ashes. However
column4: when the flames reached a certain location
column5: it is said that they were all snuffed out in an instant. Afterwards
column6: the location was deemed sacred and access to it was restricted. But rumors also exist claiming that a lost young girl saw a divine bow when she ventured there unknowingly."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_49200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A pearl passed down among the Guardians of Meirith from generation to generation. A holy relic granted to the first Guardian by the Holy Emperor himself
column2: the pearl was normally kept under lock and key and only taken out for special rituals. It was even used in the Guardians' succession rituals
column3: in which it is believed that new Guardians would touch this pearl. Doing so would awaken the Guardian's latent powers
column4: and simultaneously instill a deep-seated reverence for the Holy Emperor."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_49300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A divine blade said to grant the power to rule the heavens to its wielder. It was capable of immense destruction
column2: and tales state that its power could distort the flow of time. Legend holds that many gods gave their lives to create this divine blade
column3: and that the will of the gods within it can overcome and control the bodies of any weak-willed individuals who hold it."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_49400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A rare fossilized flower named for the dark phoenix said to fly through the underworld in the legends of the Agni Empire. Rumors held that those who found this flower would enjoy the phoenix's protection
column2: keeping death at bay. This ignited a rampant harvesting of the flowers
column3: which led them to the brink of extinction. However
column4: an inspection of the fossils that have been discovered revealed that these are not flowers
column5: but rather a the feathers of a bird. Some scholars seem to take this as proof of the existence of phoenixes."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_49500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Long ago
column2: a king of the Sama Kingdom launched invasion after invasion against other nations. Even as a great plague swept the land
column3: he continued to call for war. The queen prayed to a goddess to show the king the error of his ways
column4: and was granted the Lotus Manuscript from on high. The queen then gave the king this piece of writing
column5: which is said to have changed him dramatically after he finished reading it. Realizing the importance of defending his land
column6: he shifted focus from conquest to strengthening the nation itself."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_49600_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A crown believed to have been forged by Leto
column2: keeper of the gate between the realm of the gods and the underworld. It has unique properties allowing it to hold both profane and divine powers
column3: and it is said that wielders may gain the power to survive in the vortex between the realm of the gods and the underworld. Leto originally crafted it for the next keeper of the gate
column4: but tales say that its unique properties meant that almost none in the realm of the gods could wear it."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_49700_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Fashioned in the style of the accessory Calamity Demon Amu Yunos wears on her forehead. Wearing it blocks one's vision
column2: but information it detects is transferred directly to the brain. Accordingly
column3: it grants awareness of one's surroundings that exceeds that of ordinary vision. However
column4: many points regarding this power are poorly understood
column5: and it is said that protracted use can lead wielders to see visions of themselves as invalids in the future."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_49800_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A shield created by the demon Mordlim when she became intrigued by human technologies. She combined these with otherworldly techniques in its construction. It is said that when the wielder is in danger
column2: the phantom insects that dwell in its core create a barrier that grants impregnable defenses. Morldim originally created this shield for her own use
column3: and thus there have been reports of unprepared human users being devoured by the phantom insects within it."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_49940_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The beloved sword of Owen
column2: one of the Summoners of Old. When the gate was opened
column3: a fearsome demon dragon spread chaos through Grand Gaia. It's said that when Owen defeated the beast
column4: this sword appeared from the remains. Medblare harbors tremendous destructive power. The blade is imbued with the demon dragon's hellfire
column5: and is capable of reducing the most terrifying monster to embers in an instant. According to rumor
column6: Owen has never let another lay a finger upon his prized weapon."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_49960_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A magical gauntlet said to originate from a place called the Eastern Kingdom of Mikado
column2: located in another world. This gauntlet allows the wearer to summon demons freely
column3: but only those chosen by the gauntlet -- known as Samurai -- are able to draw out its power. It also houses a sprite known as Burroughs
column4: who often offers useful advice to its master."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_49980_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Their lives are spent hiding in darkness. Hiding and disguising their forms
column2: just to stay alive. And at the end of that road lies..."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_5008000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Adds the following effects to LS:
150% boost to Atk and 120% boost to Def
column2: Rec
column3: max HP when 2 or more elements are present
column4: 10% damage reduction & raises Atk parameter limits to 180000"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_5008001_LONGDESCRIPTION":"150% boost to Atk
column2: 100% boost to Def
column3: Rec
column4: max HP & adds \u201cFinal Embrace\u201d effect to BB/SBB"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A phantom fruit drink that existed in the Agni Empire. A wine made with a thick nectar drawn from sweet fruits as its distinguishing point
column2: it was said to heal the minds and bodies of humans exhausted by their battles with the God Army. While the wine itself is not special
column3: it is believed to gain special properties when poured by the tavern keeper
column4: Luccia
column5: which raises its value. The young girl who works in the restaurant is also rumored to prefer using it in her cooking."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60010_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There are many answers in response to questions on the nature of life. However
column2: no one true answer on the subject has yet been discovered. There have been magicians and alchemists in every era of every world who sought answers to the riddles of life and birth
column3: and who sought eternal life. This jewel filled with life energy is said to have been discovered accidentally by one of those innumerable researchers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60020_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A battle plan discovered in the ruins of the Agni Empire. Believed to have been used in invasions of other nations
column2: the battle plan's contents are flexible for adaptation to enemy formations. As it contains calculations that extend even to the finest of details
column3: it was long thought to have been created by a strategically brilliant soldier. However
column4: research in recent years has revealed that its author was an empress at the time
column5: and that she fought on the front lines against enemy forces."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60030_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A short sword used by Rudoneil
column2: an assassin who attempted to slay the 4th Emperor of the Bariura Empire. It seems to be a decorative piece adorned with serpent and flower motifs at a glance
column3: but its deadliness becomes apparent soon after being wounded with it. No changes occur immediately
column4: but the various hexes built into the weapon begin to devour the subject after an incubation period of a few hours
column5: swiftly resulting in death."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60040_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An emperor concerned by invasions from neighboring lands once encountered a beautiful maiden in a dream and was told he would be able to create a great and powerful nation. On waking
column2: he found a beautiful bow atop his pillow and a divine animal resting beside it. Revering this animal as a sacred beast
column3: the emperor took the bow and drove off the foreign invasions. It is said that he went on to conquer those nations
column4: forming a great empire."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60050_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A star-shaped talisman said to have been a possession of the hero who created the foundations of the Randall Empire. It was passed down from the hero's mother
column2: a magician
column3: and a guiding light stone fragment is embedded within it. The hero always held it and prayed for victory before major battles
column4: but normally kept it hidden under his armor to prevent its discovery by his younger sister. However
column5: he was unaware that his younger sister also possessed a similar
column6: moon-shaped talisman."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60060_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A legendary divine vestment given to a cleric who had gone on a pilgrimage to all of the temples of Grand Gaia when the cleric was summoned to a sacred area. It has the power to heighten the spiritual powers of its wearer
column2: and to purify all apparitions that attack the wearer. It is said that the cleric accepted the vestments
column3: but returned them after bowing deeply and speaking a single word. Upon hearing this
column4: the gods granted the cleric divine powers in place of the vestments."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60070_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A massive
column2: beautifully designed axe. This axe is said to have decorated the throne room of the kingdom of Calcradia
column3: a small nation in ancient times. It was kept there on the pretense of allowing the king to freely strike down any pandering
column4: disloyal subjects
column5: but the axe was only used once. Furthermore
column6: in that instance it was used by an antihero to slay a foolish king. Afterwards
column7: the axe was stored in a temple as a symbol of the destruction borne of the corrupt and deceitful."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60080_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This unique armor was crafted using otherworldly technologies created in the Atharva Republic during the war with the gods. It protects the entire body and
column2: in addition to providing defense
column3: it has the power to greatly boost its wearer's basic abilities. However
column4: it was not well-liked by common front-line soldiers on account of its immense weight
column5: the difficulty involved in transporting it using human strength
column6: and the amount of time it takes to put on."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60090_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A gem said to have been enshrined somewhere in the underworld. It is believed to have been created by a demon who concentrated the vestigial powers of dead gods and disciples into it. However
column2: that demon is said to have been absorbed by the gem as well. Its wielder will gain incredible power
column3: but a normal individual's spiritual strength cannot withstand the lingering will of the gods that went into the gem's creation. Such an individual would be instantly crippled in attempting to use the gem."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A military manual created during the period of small
column2: warring nations prior to the founding of the Bariura Empire. Over many generations it would be rediscovered
column3: and renamed after where it was found. While its original title and author are unknown
column4: it is said to contain knowledge cultivated over long years of war. Believed to have been treasured and kept close by its owners
column5: only a scarce few copies were ever made. Accordingly
column6: only this one copy is known to have survived to the present day."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60110_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A helm and armor worn by a demon that once invaded Grand Gaia. If worn by a normal human
column2: it's said that the human's spirit will be dominated by the demon's residual will
column3: transforming the wearer into a murderous maniac. However
column4: those with a strong will may draw out the regalia's power and demonstrate power on par with a demon. Even so
column5: the regalia vanished to parts unknown after the war with the gods
column6: and no records of its use remain."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60120_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Flowers always wither and scatter
column2: even without the wind. Perhaps that is why the gods visit destructive storms upon the lands. Even if this eternal forest were to fade to red
column3: I would not wish to leave the place I love. It is because flowers wilt that they are beautiful. Glorious spirits of the land
column4: I surrender myself to purgatory and leave you this verse. For now we must say goodbye."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60130_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A divine staff that represents the power of the heavens. This staff is granted by the gods only to humans with refined personalities
column2: knowledge
column3: and abilities. Absolute power is granted to its wielder. It is said that any who see this staff are brought to their knees reflexively before the overwhelming power it radiates. Accordingly
column4: the staff has never been used in battle
column5: although many records tell of its use in peace talks and arbitrations."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60140_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A short sword said to drive off any hardship or misfortune
column2: and to protect its wielder to the very end. It is similar to the \"katanas\" of other worlds
column3: but it is quite small. It does not seem suited for use as a weapon
column4: but previous wielders spoke of feeling a sense of being protected by some sort of presence. One theory holds that it was crafted by a goddess in another world out of concern for a hero's safety. However
column5: the truth of the matter is unclear
column6: as is the source of this explanation."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60150_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Only a few individuals have learned the truth of the immensely-powerful armaments called the Sacred Treasures
column2: shrouded in history as they are. One such individual holds that the Sacred Treasures were not created by the hands of any individuals
column3: but rather that they are manifestations of the will of the world itself. This staff is known by the name Telra Eden
column4: and almost resembles guns used in other worlds. Rumors hold that it will appear to humanity shortly before the end of the world."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An orb modeled after the Twilight Stone carried by the Guile Demon Mora. It is capable of awakening latent abilities of its user to call down the crushing power of twilight upon enemies. Although spherified
column2: the stone is thought to possess its own will
column3: and the user must exercise great caution to avoid spiritual erosion while in contact. It is said that only Mora
column4: whose overwhelming willpower allows her to dominate and control the minds of others
column5: was able to reach a mutual understanding with the Twilight Stone and unleash its true power."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This sphere contains the crystalized soul of the disciple Melord
column2: who was doomed to decay when demonic power poured into his body. The demonic power successfully awakened Melord
column3: but at the cost of gradually rotting away his flesh and spirit. When Melord's body finally succumbed to the fusion of demonic and disciple blood
column4: only this crystal remained. Its clarion brilliance and holy aura attest to the unwavering faith Melord had in life for his master."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Krantz's beloved cape. Eager to stand in battle alongside his idols
column2: Owen and Griff
column3: he ordered it custom-made from a magician to commemorate his appointment to the Demon Slayers. It is said to hold powerful defensive magic. Krantz gave Mirfah this cloak along with the report when buying time for him to escape in Ishgria."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60410_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A staff believed to have been wielded by the magician Lucana
column2: who guided multitudes of people to the promised land. Though it always held potent magical energies
column3: it is said to have gained even more power when Lucana received her oracle. There are grand tales of Lucana defending the people from all manner of attacks from enemy gods over their long journey. Similarly
column4: it is said that its mysterious powers inspired hope among the people even after their arrival in Elgaia."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60500_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A set of twin chakram used by the brutal general Geurst
column2: who made his name as a warrior in the small nation of Calcradia in ancient times. The blades are made such that they can be combined to form one enormous circular weapon that can be thrown at retreating enemies for additional slaughter. It is said that Geurst fought as though he enjoyed this slaughter
column3: and was just as feared by his allies as his enemies."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_60510_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A crown containing the sealed powers of gods. While it was originally kept deep in the heart of a sacred territory
column2: a certain disciple removed it during the great war with the gods. Afterwards
column3: the crown came to resonate with the will of the disciples as they continued their extermination of humanity
column4: and it is said to have been used in its full capacity. The crown also features the ability to protect against calamities
column5: and the disciple's attacks are said to have continued for many long years."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_61000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A pike once sealed deep within Ishgria. It is believed to grant its wielder immense destructive power
column2: but it is also said that this ultimately dooms long-term wielders to experience the emptiness and futility of battle. Because of this
column3: it came to be seen as a forbidden weapon by the battle-loving demons of Ishgria
column4: and few would handle it despite its incredible power."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_61010_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Long
column2: long ago
column3: the divine beast Magrahja came to be known as the barbarian beast for its twisted
column4: unnatural form. Large enough to withstand any disaster and with the strength to instantly destroy powerful monsters
column5: it was hated and reviled by humanity. However
column6: Magrahja loved humanity and continued to watch over the people
column7: and left humanity a helm made of his own hide upon his death. The helm holds Magrahja's spiritual strength
column8: and is said to grant its wearer a wide variety of powers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_61020_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A protective charm believed to have been owned by an otherworldly sorceress. Legends state that within the charm resides the will of the war god the sorceress once commanded
column2: and that it grants great power in response to the bearer's wishes
column3: bearing the brunt of attacks its wearer receives to protect them if they encounter mortal danger. The sorceress is said to have driven off the apparitions that plagued her world and accomplished many great deeds as well."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_61030_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A great bow shrouded in a cloud of miasma. According to legend
column2: this bow took the lives of three different gods. The first god died from the shot of a single arrow
column3: while the second was more nimble and took two arrows instead. The third god braved through the bow's miasma and counterattacked
column4: but the momentum the arrow had picked up proved to be too much to withstand in the end. This story was believed to be pure myth
column5: but there are too many coincidences with ancient tales of an evil presence that slayed countless gods."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_61040_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A magical piece of armor created by the mad dark sorcerer Guenerga. The sorcerer took the soul of a god with healing powers and the soul of a demon with great destructive powers and fused them into this armor by means of forbidden magic. It is said that although the armor has managed to retain its unique abilities in an excellent state
column2: whoever wears the armor must have a spirit strong enough to withstand the two opposing forces battling endlessly within it."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_61050_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A Sphere that came into the custody of the Akras Summoners' Hall during the dawn of its establishment. These were times when speaking of such a powerful object could lead the world into pure chaos
column2: as the mention of gods alone was strictly forbidden. Although it had been sealed away for quite some time
column3: the story of why and how it eventually ended up in the hands of Summoners' Hall remains one of the organizations most guarded secrets."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_61060_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A Sphere that came into the custody of the Akras Summoners' Hall during the dawn of its establishment. This Sphere is said to have been retrieved from the plane between life and death
column2: though there are absolutely no details regarding the individual who handed it over to Summoners' Hall. However
column3: it is known to rule over the existence of all beings in the world
column4: allowing those who simply touch it to become one with the world itself. It is speculated to be the key behind the mystery of creation."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_61070_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A Sphere held since the founding of the Akras Summoners' Hall. According to the Summoners who knew of its discovery
column2: it holds the power to redefine all reality as we know it. However
column3: the Summoners' Hall has yet to deliver any commentary on the subject. It is held under strict security on the orders of the Summoners of Old. Given that only a select few are even permitted to study it
column4: one can surmise that the Sphere has incredible influence over individuals."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_61080_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A divine key bestowed only upon those who have mastered all the powers of the heavens. Its existence was previously only known through legends
column2: and even now remains thoroughly cloaked in mystery. None have fully comprehended its value or utilized its power to date
column3: and one theory holds that it is actually intended to enable journeys to higher dimensions. Regardless
column4: humanity has no means of verifying such a theory at this time."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There is a plant with glamorous flowers loved by many people that appears once every hundred years in a certain mythical beast's nest. The flowers are picked by a shrine maiden chosen by the beast
column2: which she then weaves into a colorful crown. It is said that the one who wears the crown is protected and given great strength
column3: but unfortunately few have seen this item in their lifetime."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62010_LONGDESCRIPTION":"New facts came to light when a certain alchemist's research papers were discovered. When the power of another world is gathered in the lens developed by the alchemist
column2: it creates a powerful force field around the device. Its power then negates any interference and draws out the potential of the user. Currently only a prototype has been built
column3: but it's thought to have endless possibilities."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62020_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The demons of Ishgria further refined this axe that had already taken so many lives. It houses incredible power when used normally
column2: but when the user's fighting spirit is overflowing
column3: it has the power to defeat even the gods with just one blow. However
column4: if a normal human continues using it for a prolonged period of time
column5: they will be haunted by a desire for war
column6: slowly becoming demons themselves."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62030_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Legend states that when a baby saddled with a peculiar fate was born
column2: a shining dragon appeared before mother and child
column3: wishing them fortune and giving them a charm made from part of its own body. The charm never left the baby's side
column4: and they grew to be a courageous hero who could defeat any hardship that presented itself."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62040_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An extremely rare crystal said to have come from the bones of a certain demon. The crystal is believed to hold the demon's final thoughts
column2: and it continually grants its wielder unyielding spiritual strength and seemingly limitless magical power. However
column3: since some who held it in the past claimed to have heard the demon's voice
column4: a number of researchers came to view the crystal as dangerous."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62050_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Armor discovered at a small
column2: ancient shrine in Ishgria. It encapsulates divine power inside a sinister exterior
column3: and is believed to have the power to place mighty curses upon opponents who attack its wearer even as it protects them. It is said that the demons of ancient times produced countless demonic armaments
column4: and created it as an experiment to combine their own dark powers with the divine powers of disciples. However
column5: the specifics of this remain unknown."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62060_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A medical text stored in the Akras Summoners' Hall. The legacy of a famed doctor who saved countless lives during the dawn of the Elgaian Era
column2: it lists treatment methods for many different illnesses. Since practicing these methods awakens latent powers in the practitioner
column3: it is said that they will never experience the same illness twice. Its efficacy is demonstrated by its careful preservation even into the present day."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62070_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An arsenal created by an otherworldly engineer. It has functions that allow it to transform into a sword
column2: bow
column3: or shield
column4: and it boasted incredible power on its creation. It has been improved upon many times since then
column5: due to the number of malfunctions it experienced and the difficulty of operating its controls. When it was eventually completed
column6: it had become an excellent item for both offense and defense. But even so
column7: it retained a flaw that placed a limit on how long it could be used at full power due to problems with the integrity of its component materials."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62090_LONGDESCRIPTION":"When this sphere was first discovered in Ishgria
column2: it was in such a terrible condition that it didn't even serve to create a prototype. However
column3: few could have guessed how truly formidable it was
column4: as it not only has the ability to predict incoming attacks
column5: but also to reduce the damage they inflict. Furthermore
column6: though many things concerning the dark arts remain a mystery
column7: the ones found within this sphere seem to help the wearer's body to endure the strain it places on it. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An ancient clay tablet that was found in the ruins where this sphere was discovered in had an unknown legend inscribed upon it. The legend tells of a very short period in time when the gods allowed a certain being to rule over everything in their name. This diadem served as proof of the gods' divine decree
column2: and it was adorned with an unwilting flower and an indestructible jewel. However
column3: this is where the story on the tablet ends
column4: as the rest of the story has been lost to time along with the identity of the person to whom the diadem was entrusted."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62110_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Near the end of the war against the gods
column2: a divine beast native to Grand Gaia came across a group of people who were being persecuted by the God Army
column3: and bestowed a magical mirror upon them. Afterwards
column4: when the group faced a perilous situation as they found themselves surrounded by the God Army once again
column5: they raised the magical mirror towards the heavens to create a barrier of light around them. The barrier reflected every attack it received
column6: sending the God Army into a frenzy
column7: and ultimately repelling the advance."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62120_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A charm passed down through generations of an esteemed family from Grand Gaia. It is said that not only does the charm protect its owner from calamities and awards him or her good fortune
column2: but it offers the same protection to said owner's descendants. Forged by the gods themselves
column3: this charm is rumored to have originally been in the custody of a certain shrine. How it eventually ended up in the hands of Grand Gaians
column4: however
column5: remains a mystery."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62130_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A magical bow found in the great forest of the Principality of Vriksha. Passed down among pixies since ancient times
column2: it holds the power to steal the souls of those it shoots. The pixies took humanity's side when the great war with the gods broke out
column3: and are believed to have slain countless members of the God Army with this bow. It is also said to have been used for an even more destructive attack on the gods after the forest was burned at the hands of the God Army."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62140_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Part of a suit of armor made using unique
column2: otherworldly technology. Although it would normally be accompanied by other massive plates
column3: even this core component grants its wearer incomparable power. An otherworldly god trapped in a small crystal on the armor is believed to be the source of its power
column4: but details regarding this source remain unclear. Furthermore
column5: the duration over which its powers can be utilized appears to be limited
column6: as the majority of the original armor is now lost."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62150_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There are unique evil stones created only during the moment the dawn breaks and the full
column2: golden moon overlaps with the sun. Made from those evil stones
column3: this shield is believed to have been passed down in the mortal world since ancient times. Existing before the great war with the gods
column4: it has since been improved upon. The immense protection it bestows upon its wielder turns back all attacks and opens the way for great heroism in battle."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62160_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The Necromancer Mehisa slaughtered numerous heroes and built this staff from their remains
column2: earning the title of \"Skull Monarch.\" The Holy General Merluk favored this skull-adorned staff above all others
column3: and it is said to have continued to corrupt Merluk's soul even in death due to extensive use of evil magic and sorcery. This staff holds great power due to its history
column4: but is also believed to either corrupt the soul of its wielder directly or to grant the wielder power sufficient for leading to their already inevitable corruption."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62170_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A shield called the ultimate defense by a warrior renowned as \"Scar the Unyielding.\" It grants its wielder \"the blessing of the struggle.\" This effect slowly hardens the bearer's skin in response to injuries
column2: eventually reaching a hardness that surpasses even diamonds. This power only manifests during extremely trying situations
column3: although that may be a deliberate feature. Its creator
column4: Paradoxia
column5: was known for only granting weaponry to those destined to endure great trials."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62180_LONGDESCRIPTION":"During the great war with the gods
column2: the great sage Vagarna created a technique intended to save humanity from certain doom. This technique would elevate human physical abilities to godlike levels and transform fighting spirit into raw strength. Human minds proved unsuited to godlike bodies
column3: however
column4: and stories tell us that all of the technique's users went mad. Although the strange tome Vagarna left after his death contains only fragments of this technique
column5: current scholars believe that even those would grant power that far surpasses that of an ordinary human."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62190_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A sacred blade said to have been made by an ancient deity from a portion of their own life energy. General belief holds that it is only bestowed upon those who have mastered the sword at a level that even the gods acknowledge. The same tales claim it grants its wielder an inexhaustible drive to fight and courage even in the face of overwhelming adversity. And indeed
column2: there are many ancient legends that tell of its wielders sighting an opening to seize victory in the face of certain death."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An armband that has been passed down since ancient times in the Bariura Empire. According to legend
column2: an individual wearing this armband appeared and led many people to a new promised land when a cataclysm befell Bariura. Its only proven ability at present is the tremendous enhancement it provides to its wielder's defenses
column3: and some suspect that even its existence was unknown outside of a few members of the imperial family."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62210_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Armor believed to have been used by an Ishgrian demon in the distant past. General analysis holds that it can protect its wearer from any calamity
column2: but past demonic bearers of the armor died mysteriously in rapid succession. However
column3: recent research indicates that the armor suppresses its wearer's senses of pain and exhaustion. In light of this
column4: many scholars now speculate that these demons drove themselves to destruction due to their race's endless lust for battle."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62220_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Long ago
column2: there was once a clan that made its living via the dark arts. The stories tell us that this clan preferred to live peacefully
column3: but was eventually drawn unwillingly into a conflict. In order to protect their village
column4: the clan unsealed this book of holy scriptures. Using the techniques inscribed within it
column5: they gained great physical power and vanquished their enemies. However
column6: the clan of curse-workers vanished inexplicably soon after the battle was won
column7: and their book of holy scriptures is said to have been lost along with them."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62230_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A firearm developed in the Imperial Research Lab during the dawn of the Elgaian era. It boasts substantial improvements over the great war-era model of magical machine gun it was based on
column2: including improved magical conversion ratios for bullets
column3: massive power amplification for opposing elemental attacks
column4: and more. Although officials at the time believed this weapon would act as a foundation for Imperial rule in Elgaia
column5: the design blueprints were stolen by its developer before mass production began. Unbelievably
column6: reports claim that the weapon later fell into the hands of a band of outlaws."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62240_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A sacred bow bestowed by the gods upon a young man who loved nature. The defensive sigil inscribed in the wood protects the archer who wields it
column2: and its arrows are said to hold a wide variety of natural powers. The young man's descendants took up the bow in turn
column3: but its power gradually faded as humanity began to grow apart from nature. Furthermore
column4: tales also tell us that the bow was feared and despised as a portent of destruction after the gods began their offensive against humanity."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62250_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Heavenly vestments granted to a child soldier by a certain goddess. The boy Arnugle was drafted into the military to protect his homeland
column2: and hoped to die defending another person rather than harming his foes. Moved by his feelings
column3: the goddess granted the boy these heavenly vestments. With their protection
column4: Arnugle was able to capture the enemy commander alive without suffering a single wound or injuring another living being."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62260_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A fragment of an arcane crystal developed for self-defense by a god of a war-torn world. The original crystal is said to have had the terrifying power to completely negate external damage via a magical barrier. Only fragments of the crystal exist in the present day
column2: however
column3: and these fragments retain only faint traces of the original's power. Even so
column4: each provides remarkable defensive benefits."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62270_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Sinister armor sealed deep within the underworld. It enhances its wearer's physical capabilities immensely while also granting limitless regenerative capacity that can compensate for any injury. However
column2: these benefits come at an incredible cost; the armor absorbs life energy from all surrounding beings during combat. It is entirely capable of reducing a verdant field to a lifeless wasteland. It is also said to make its wearer enamored with death in battle
column3: sentencing them to a life of endless combat."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62280_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A shield thought to have been granted to a fairy tribe by a god of the land in the past. When the fairy tribe's forest was invaded by the God Army
column2: a certain knight used this shield to protect the forest
column3: giving the fairy tribe more time to escape. Undaunted by any attack
column4: the knight ultimately perished with the shield still in his hand. The general of the God Army witnessed this
column5: and even though the knight was an enemy
column6: ensured he was buried respectfully along with the shield."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62290_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A sword said to have been left by a holy king who ruled over a continent with superhuman power in ancient times. The holy king
column2: who destroyed many traitorous enemy tribes
column3: upon realizing that he had reached the end of his natural lifespan chose to shut himself in a temple. Eventually his sorrowful vassal peeked in the temple
column4: but the holy king was nowhere to be seen
column5: and only a single sword remained. The holy king's whereabouts are still unknown
column6: and rumors persist that the sword itself is the holy king's true form."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A crown that a certain man is said to have brought back from the underworld. While wearing that same crown
column2: the man came back to life even after being fatally injured
column3: and eventually went on to build a great empire. However
column4: it is said that when he attempted to be coronated with a new royal crown he was cut by an infinite number of invisible blades
column5: and suffered an agonizing death. The crown was later destroyed by a retainer
column6: but was reformed by a mystical force
column7: and is said to be in the hands of someone even now."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62310_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A talisman said to be enshrined at the top of a mountain near sacred territory. It is thought to have been influenced by the close proximity to the gods' powers for many years
column2: and believed to offer various types of protection to the bearer. However
column3: climbing to the top of the mountain where the talisman is enshrined is fraught with difficulty
column4: and the majority of people are unable to go place enough trust in their companions to move forward and are forced to give up. It is said that only those who believe in the bond with their companions to the end can obtain the talisman."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62320_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A sphere that has been kept since the establishment of Akras Summoners' Hall. The Summoners of Old brought it back after a life-threatening mission
column2: revealing nothing about where they obtained it or through what process. Even now
column3: none will speak a word on the issue. Though it has some connection with the end of the world
column4: it is also rumored to be a necessary material for life to advance to a new stage
column5: and the only thing clear at this point in time is its tremendous potential."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62330_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A cloak said to hold the ability to reach the stars in the sky when it has gathered enough power from the torrent-like pulse of a dragon which roams the land. Capable of withstanding any type of damage and made to adapt to all sorts of environments
column2: it is believed to render the wearer able to survive under any imaginable conditions. However
column3: the mystery behind who could have created such a cloak
column4: and who has worn it since
column5: remains unsolved."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62340_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A ring said to be awarded by the gods to the warrior Alces. Although he always showed an almost divine prowess in battle thanks to the blessed ring that protected him
column2: one day the powers of said ring vanished
column3: and he was struck down by the enemy on the battlefield. Some claimed that Alces met his doom after failing to pay tribute to the gods
column4: but a high priest that examined the ring he left behind claims that Alces simply transcended the boundaries of mortality."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62350_LONGDESCRIPTION":"According to a legend from another world
column2: there was once an incredibly strong and chivalrous man who faced an arduous trial set by a wise sage only to barely escape with his life. Swearing revenge upon the sage
column3: the man who had survived dedicated the rest of his life to honing his skills as a warrior. Using every single opportunity at his disposal to overcome the limits of his swordsmanship and eventually grow to challenge even the gods in expertise
column4: he came to regret but one thing about the path he had chosen: the fact that he himself had turned into the sage he so despised."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62360_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Although it grants its wearer incomparable power
column2: this fiendish helm also causes the various emotions of the battlefield to be felt deeply and lastingly. Once engaging in battle
column3: its bearers are gradually poisoned by a fever for combat. In time
column4: they find themselves hurtling toward a heroic death. However
column5: were a bearer able to tame this seemingly-cursed power with an iron will
column6: they would become the storied conqueror of an era."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62370_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A weapon brought back to Elgaia from a dead world by a certain god. It is said to hold all of the knowledge of its home world
column2: and to grant wielders instant knowledge of all actions required to disable any foes they face. Realizing that the world died because of this weapon
column3: the god sealed it away deep within his temple. It is said that even when war broke out between humanity and the gods
column4: he did not permit the seal to be broken."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62380_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A crystal imbued with divine energies by a monk on a pilgrimage in another world. The monk is said to have visited extreme environments inaccessible to normal individuals in this quest in order to gather divine energy. Though accounts linger across the land even now
column2: the earliest and latest written accounts span over one thousand years. Some scholars contend that the crystal's power may have extended the monk's life for such a duration."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62390_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A scourge believed to have been used to punish prisoners in the Agni Empire. As all of these prisoners died with peaceful expressions on their faces
column2: in time it came to be revered as a sacred object. However
column3: it was later discovered that the whip was a profane relic that heightens suffering and madness in those it strikes. It was then promptly sealed away
column4: deep underground. One theory holds that a certain queen was involved in the whip's creation."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62400_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The legends of one world tell us that there once was an archer who excelled in rapid-fire
column2: point-blank combat. It was said that she could fire at an enemy locked in combat with an ally in a chaotic melee
column3: and always strike only the enemy without fail. She only grew more accurate with each foe she slew
column4: and she left the battlefield strewn with a corpse for each arrow she carried. As she put it
column5: so long as she had a trusted friend to work with
column6: she could slay any foe."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62410_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Heavenly robes bestowed upon a shrine maiden who was deeply connected to the gods in ancient times. The robes hold the power to make any who wear them into a divine being
column2: and those with strong spiritual faith are said to gain the same awareness as the gods. In time
column3: the shrine maiden awoke to some unknown truth and departed
column4: never to be seen again. Since that time
column5: a goddess virtually indistinguishable from the shrine maiden's description has appeared to rescue humans from grand disasters."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_62420_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A legendary demon blade said to be able to bring down any massive foe in a single strike. It is said that even a scratch from its blade will instantly devour life force from the wound
column2: earning it the nickname \"Death's Blade.\" It is also said that the blade secretly draws its power from numerous demons sealed within it
column3: and that one can faintly hear an eerie
column4: hair-raising wailing when it is nearby."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_63000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This Sphere was developed at the Summoners' Research Lab
column2: but Noel restricted the disclosure of information on it due to the magnitude of its powers. It holds the power to greatly enhance its bearer's destructive capacity
column3: but advanced skills are required to make full use of its abilities. Bearers were unable to control its power in tests
column4: and many are said to have injured themselves."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_64000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A precious stone very rarely discovered in the depths of a certain world. It is believed to be created from the crystallization over many long years of the power that circulates through that world. It is said to considerably enhance the potential of those who touch it
column2: and enable them ascertain the many different elements and flows of power that make up the world. Furthermore
column3: some among them are said to even understand their own destiny that awaits them."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_64001_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A halberd believed to have been created by the war god Diacles in order to destroy opposing gods. It absorbed the gods destroyed by Diacles
column2: and even now is said to contain their power. Since many different divine powers are mixed together
column3: it is considered to be extremely difficult to wield
column4: but it also has the ability to resonate with any kind of power
column5: and can amplify its force considerably."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_64002_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A sword said to have been created from the gathered light of stars by ancient gods long ago. Any who takes hold of it is said to be able to display great strength beyond what would be considered their limits. Some believe that
column2: were it wielded by a divine being
column3: it could destroy many worlds in one fell swoop. Upon realizing the sword's destructive power
column4: which far exceeded expectations
column5: it's believed the gods decided to seal it away on a distant world known to no one."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_65000_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This blade was made from materials gained from the wicked dragon Avlansch
column2: who was created out of concentrated water magic by Natra
column3: the deity of shadow. With its flowing curves and clear blue-white blade
column4: many who look upon it are struck with awe. But the blade still holds the evil spirit of Avlansch despite its beautiful appearance. Accordingly
column5: it is said to have the terrifying power to paralyze anyone it cuts via its inherent freezing temperature."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_801001_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A cross shaped wand
column2: used by Mira
column3: a nun known as the \"Beansprouts Sister\" from the fabled world of elder runes. This wand can be used to channel restorative powers to keep its owner in good health. It is also known to boost the potential of its bearer
column4: granting them endurance that helps them perform vigorous attacks more easily. However
column5: any details regarding its history and origins remain unknown."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818880_LONGDESCRIPTION":"It is said that the Great Thief Leon had been hiding a secret. Rumors state he had brilliantly designed an invisible cloak. No one could has been able to confirm its existence
column2: but one thing is for sure
column3: Leon was one hell of a thief."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818881_LONGDESCRIPTION":"During Leon's early days as a thief
column2: brushes with death had made him realize the importance of survival. He designed a Guardian Cloak that could save him in times of need."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818882_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The magic of the Aegis Cloak is that it gives enemies the illusion of a clean attack while the offense is greatly directed away from the bearer's body."
"MST_SPHERES_818883_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A mysterious lantern with an undying flame. Infused with arcane powers that cause it to glow more brightly under a full moon."
"MST_SPHERES_818884_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A ring of power granted by the gods to challengers who have demonstrated their strength through various trials. It empowers the bearer with great strength
column2: hardened defenses and the ability to mirror damage back against any foe."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818890_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A skull cursed with the restless souls of warriors who lost their lives in the battle of La Veda. A Wicker Man is said to have been guarding it
column2: waiting for the right bearer to grasp it..."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818891_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An artifact that grants it's wielders a tremendous surge in necrotic wrath. Each year for centuries
column2: during the season when wails accompanied by the howling of wolves can be heard
column3: it is said that this orb glows with hate..."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818892_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An ornament belonging to a nefarious ruler who once stood alongside the great disciples of Grand Gaia. Over time
column2: corruption and greed consumed him and he craved death more than being a part of a greater cause. After shattering his camaraderie
column3: he ran into exile
column4: in search for his calling."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818895_LONGDESCRIPTION":"There are many stories about the origins of this skull. The most common one is that it belonged to a demon who died in an ancient war. Previous bearers have all been rewarded with great strength
column2: and eventually descendedinto madness..."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818896_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Rumor has it that this artifact was found on an altar in an underground labyrinth by a group of explorers. As the leader touched the orb
column2: he lost consciousness. When he woke up
column3: he found that his entire party has disappeared
column4: andin his hands was the same orb
column5: now with shadowy figures that seemed like theyweretrapped within..."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818897_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A weapon forged from memories and relics from a faraway home
column2: this item glows with the light of the otherworldly might found within. A soft hum can be heard whenever it is held by heroes with good hearts
column3: bound by courage and friendship to defend the world against evil."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818898_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A mysterious gooey substance that oozed out from a strange egg-like object discovered in a pipe from one of Noel's research labs
column2: after a massive water leakage incident had erupted overnight. The goo got devoured by a certain hungry jewel ghost that always tried to sell itself to charity. The next morning
column3: lab personnel were amazed to discover a shiny Golden God blocking the hallway to Noel's chamber."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818900_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A mystical snowglobe infused with the essence of winter and its magic."

"MST_SPHERES_818901_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The Frozen Myth had long been deemed to be just a legendary stone that people called \"The Heart of Winter.\" It freezes the air around it and is said to bear the soul of the cold season itself. No man can ever hold it with their bare hands as its frost burns any mortal flesh."
"MST_SPHERES_818902_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A frosted and enchanted gemstone which emits a swirling blurred glow from the inside. Although cool to the touch
column2: it warms the heart and soul of the bearer
column3: giving him great spirit and energy."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818903_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Long deemed unconquerable by mere mortals
column2: this stone was lost within the deep wintertide long ago. It was not until one of the coldest winters known to date passed that it was discovered by a duo who came across it in a forgotten cave
column3: as if the stone had called onto them. Both were immediately ensnared by its power
column4: and a great battle for ownership promptly ensued. Come morning
column5: only one of them walked out of the cave triumphant. The direction the victor took
column6: however
column7: was not towards home
column8: but deeper into the wintertide."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818904_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A small
column2: almost unremarkable chunk of gold shaped vaguely like a heart
column3: it contains many warm memories and happy thoughts tempered by a cruel world. The light shining brightly deep within can make even the saddest hearts happy once again. When placed in a toy soldier's chest
column4: it can make him a real boy--almost."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818905_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A lifetime of happy holiday memories made whole with a beautiful ornament crafted from precious jewels and metals. Legend has it that the shine of this lovely relic can even make wishes come true
column2: albeit for a limited time. Could there be any truth behind this myth? After all
column3: winter nights are said to be the most magical of all..."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818906_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A lifetime of cheerful holiday memories warmed by the sun
column2: the power within this relic reminds its bearer that there are always things worth fighting for. Its shine can be so intense at times that it can even be used as an improvised lantern
column3: bringing quite a literal meaning to the phrase \"light can always be found in the darkest of places.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818907_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A lifetime of cheerful holiday memories that glows in the darkest nights
column2: the sun-touched power within this relic can even bring inanimate objects to life
column3: albeit for a limited time. Even in the coldest of nights
column4: its power is proof of miracles - but only if one believes in the joy of the season."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818910_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A special sword forged from Mithril by royal Elysian blacksmiths. It was given to Xenon as a token of honor from the Elysian King for dedicating his life as a protector of the realm."
"MST_SPHERES_818911_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An ancient piece of parchment inscribed with a litany in an unknown language which has been kept hidden by the Battle Maidens
column2: and passed down from generation to generation. Its seal pulsates with a dark energy that slowly consumes the bearer's mind
column3: eventually driving them to madness. Vanila has entrusted this dark relic to you
column4: fearing that Lico would one day be consumed by her already unnatural bloodlust should it fall into her hands..."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818912_LONGDESCRIPTION":"After upgrading her cannon
column2: Bonnie left behind a strange mechanical contraption before bouncing off into the woods. Engineers from Randall began studying the gadget
column3: hoping to create an alloy of unprecedented strength. Their experiments were fraught with many perils. While they failed to achieve their goal
column4: they did manage to replicate and apply some mysterious properties to an extent. The results were the weapon enhancers that could manipulate weight and strike any target with a mild
column5: weakening electrical charge."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818913_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Using techniques developed by the Master Smiths of Athensphere
column2: an incredibly dense ore of unkown origins was forged into a massive warhammer. The process was said to have been so intense that the Scared Forge was left in a state beyond repair
column3: thus its name Forgebreaker. Forgebreaker was gifted to Deimos by Zedus
column4: inrecognition of his unrivalled strength and pledge of loyalty. Every blow from Forgehammer sounded like a massive clap of thunder
column5: shattering the ground in its immediate vicinity. It is rumored that the ore was obtained from the Void itself and within it houses an unimmaginable amount of raw energy. The mysterious energy from the warhammer is believed to grant its bearer extraordinary stamina
column6: allowing Deimos to fight for days on end. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818914_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A small jet black sphere no bigger than the fist of young child retrieved from the site of the void rift. The occasional flash of purple light from the sphere reveals a highly intricate network of lines carved underneath its smooth surface.
