Gazia created this power amplifier to boost Zenia's abilities exponentially. It was specifically designed to forcefully \"awaken\" Zenia's potential at manipulating the gates across worlds. With the power amplifier activated
column2: it grants it's bearer unmatched physical capabilities
column3: at the risk of damaging one's own body permernantly. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818915_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Ultor's blades are believed to have been re-forged from the two halves of his broken spear during his face-off with the Cyclaw. A mysterious smith attempted to re-forge the blades using lost records found from the lost civilization. The result was that of a pair of heavy blades that constantly burnt at an extremely high temperature. Special hilts were made for them
column2: but only the toughest of warriors can endure the intense weight and heat."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818916_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Tridon\u2019s Trident  is said to grant its bearer control over the seas. This replica was re-forged by a mysterious smith using lost records retrieved from the lost civilization during its brief reappearance. Heavy and extremely unwieldy
column2: only the most dexterous polearm masters may put it to good use. While inferior to the real artifact
column3: the trident proves to be an excellent conduit of magical energy
column4: granting its bearer an almost limitless amount of stamina."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818917_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Aurelia's Harp was a beautiful work of art imbued with a mysterious power. The harp was said to behave in many different ways
column2: depending on the intentions of its master. In the hands of the affectionate Aurelia
column3: she used the harp's power to heal the sick and reinvigorate the despondent. When malice gripped Aurelia's heart
column4: its tunes could perform the exact opposite of its original task. While not as potent as the original harp might have been
column5: this replica greatly boosts it's bearer's vitality and latent spiritual powers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818918_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The cursed axe belonging to Hadaron was such a brutal weapon that few warriors dared to approach it. It is said that the blade of the axe passess through all corporeal forms such as regular weapons
column2: armor and flesh
column3: permernantly damaging the soul of whoever it hits. Using lost records recovered from the lost civilization
column4: a replica was made by a myterious smith. The jagged edges of the axe was incredibly thin
column5: capable of ripping steel to shreds in a terrible way. One can already imagine the damage done when it is used against a living target. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818920_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An auspicious bronze charm portraying the head of a guardian lion. A symbol of power and prosperity. It grants the bearer heightened senses and reflexes."
"MST_SPHERES_818921_LONGDESCRIPTION":"By the power of all things sacred
column2: the grace of the Holy Emperor Karna Masta
column3: and the benevolence of the watchers from worlds beyond our own
column4: I present to you the \"AX Sphere.\" What does \"AX\" mean
column5: you ask? What business is it of yours? Just take the darn thing and get out of my sight! Shoo!"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818922_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The bow once used by the gifted Andaria was a difficult and heavy weapon to use. Without a proper bowstring attached to it
column2: the bow instead draws power from its bearer and turns it into a lethal projectile of pure energy. Masters of the weapon like Andaria could fire a variety of projectiles types
column3: from a barrage of bolts to a high-powered shot. Reforged by a mysterious smith
column4: this replica is still a lethal weapon that could effectively convert one\u2019s own spritual energy into devastating bolt of energy."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818923_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Weapon of the Lord of Athensphere
column2: this legendary spear could be wielded by no one but Zedus himself. The spear itself is believed to contain an immense amount of power
column3: capable of powering a city a hundered times the size of the Imperial Capital Randall on its own. Using the lost records recovered from the lost civilization
column4: this replica was forged by a mysterious stranger. From one end to another
column5: the entire spear is a weapon itself. Attempting to hold it with your bare hands would be akin to holding on to a live lightning bolt."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818924_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A magical artifact from a another world. Blessed by the monks of the Eastern Wind Mountains
column2: these golden seals were given to the most loyal subordinates of the emperor known as the Golden Lion. A symbol of great power and authority
column3: the seals also brought great luck and fortune to those in possession of them. The Golden Lion would then go on to conquer the rest of the eastern lands and eventually establish a dynasty that would live on for another thousand years. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818925_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A golden orb inscribed with the symbol of a phoenix. Legend has it that the bearer of this orb will live a healthy life and find power beyond his or her imagination. Could that be true?"
"MST_SPHERES_818926_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A golden orb that is warm to the to the touch. Rumor has it that ancient power courses within this orb
column2: protecting the bearer from unforeseen disasters."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818931_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Korzan's treasured Vulcan Axe is a weapon like no other. Forged from orihalcum
column2: the bone and crystallized heart of an Elder Magma Salamander
column3: the Vulcan Axe was commissioned by Overlord Azurai to celebrate the birth of his son. The soul of the beast lived on within the weapon
column4: but only a warrior worthy of its fiery might could call forth its true power. Although known for their extraordinary strength
column5: the only known Morokai to have ever wielded the Vulcan Axe effectively were Overlord Azurai
column6: and Korzan himself. In battle
column7: the flames of the Salamander would engulf the weapon
column8: making it capable of melting both metal and rock in a matter of seconds."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818932_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The Glacies Staff used by Haile has been heavily modified to suit her aggressive style of combat. The staff is forged entirely from mithril
column2: an extremely durable but lightweight material found only within the mountain mines of Myrranthia. The crystal lacrima embedded into the staff is said to be the frozen tear of a legendary Ice Serpent
column3: an incredibly rare resource that provides unparalleled efficacy when channeling magic. In the hands of a novice the staff would rapidly deplete its bearer's mana
column4: possibly killing them in the process. However
column5: in the right hands it is capable of greatly reducing the casting time of spells while simultaneously magnifying its owner's powers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818933_LONGDESCRIPTION":"At a glance
column2: Avani's chainblades seems like a bad joke designed to shred its wielder before he or she can use them. In truth
column3: the blades were designed by Avani herself to subdue the beasts that roam the Baldemar badlands. Forged from orihalcum and treated with a venom concoction extracted from the most venomous beasts of Baldemar
column4: a single wound from the blade or barb from the chains could quickly cripple even the most ferocious of beasts. As if the venom wasn't enough
column5: the oddly serrated edges of the blade could inflict wounds so terrible they never heal. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818934_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An enchanted shield that belonged to the first Deva Champion who dealt a crushing defeat to the first invading Morokai horde. This legendary artifact has since been passed down from one Champion to another. Even after five hundred years of war
column2: the shield still retains its luster and bears not a single scratch nor dent on it. The technique used to forge the shield was lost to the flames of war when one of their grand forges was razed to the ground. After being named Champion by the Emperor himself
column3: Mikael became the shield's next bearer. Ironically
column4: it had previously been wielded by his beloved brother
column5: a disgraced Champion and branded traitor suspected of fleeing the battlefield."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818935_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Every Deva Librarian is required to pass the exams for basic Arcane understanding and manipulation. To assist them in maintain their libraries
column2: they utilize magical staffs as instruments to move massive shelves from one place to another
column3: or sieve through mountains of scrolls that need sorting. Due to the predicament Allanon brought upon himself
column4: his trusty staff has been customized to be more suited for combat. However
column5: since it uses a mishmash of untested crystals from Myrranthia and Baldemar
column6: Allanon's staff is capable of delivering some rather...unpredictable results. Please use with caution."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818936_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A pair of old bronze bells Nyami cherishes more than any treasure in the world. These are the only memento she has left of her sister; a gift for her 3rd birthday. On the day her sister was taken away by the slavers
column2: the bells stopped ringing although they weren't damaged. Not even a rattle could be heard. It was as if the bells took a vow of silence
column3: so they would not attract any unwanted attention. Allanon believes that Nyami's bells were imbued with an ancient power borne from her sister's powerful desire to protect her. The bells are not broken and still \"ring\" to this day
column4: toying with the minds of those who harbor any ill intent towards its master."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818937_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Using the essence extracted from Chromatic Blossoms with a strange mechanical contraption Bonnie left behind
column2: the top engineers of Randall crafted an exquisite enhancement charm. It unleashes energy in such great magnitudes that its wearer is said to become able to penetrate any foe's armor."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818938_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A beautiful orange gemstone coveted by the Morokai as a good luck charm
column2: cherished by the renegade Deva Librarian Allanon. The stone only forms deep within the belly of an aged Giant Rock Turtle. It took the combined effort of the members of Rih'alnase to crack open the belly of one such turtle
column3: which mistook the curious Librarian for it's dinner. Having earned the respect and trust of Rih'alnase
column4: the gemstone has been bestowed upon a summoner who has earned the respect and trust of the wondering band of misfits. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818939_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket god of righteous battles and retreats
column2: this phylactery was meant to be mounted onto a warrior's chest after their Trial of Acceptance. It increases the user's physical strength by purifying their life force and filling it with courage. The words \"The Dust-Yellow King shall triumph no more.\" can be found along its rim. It empowers its user in Guild Raids
column3: although some have claimed to dream afterward of battles against a warrior clothed in gold."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818940_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket deity of righteous battles and retreats
column2: this phylactery is connected to the warrior's body after being upgraded with tissue from the Ulnhann viper tails. This allows the wearer to fight better in battle
column3: especially in Guild Raids. The scroll at the phylactery's center shines with a soft light once its owner is on the field
column4: which makes it visible through the wyrmscale encasing it. Some wearers claim to see a warrior clothed in gold at the edge of their dreams from time to time
column5: which mysteriously leaves them with a sensation of dryness in their mouth and eyes."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818941_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket deity of righteous battles and retreats
column2: this phylactery's true powers are reserved only for the strongest of warriors. Powdered Sarayagaza Blooms have been added to the device
column3: rendering the wearer immune to fear in the face of danger
column4: and even more powerful in Guild Raids. Some who own this device claim to see a warrior clothed in gold among their enemies during fierce battles
column5: often accompanied by a pale maiden by his side. The saying \"The stars shall shine forever.\" is etched on its rim."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818942_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket deity of weapons and fortune
column2: this unassuming blade is gifted to promising warriors who have proven their skills in hand-to-hand combat. In the hands of a capable fighter
column3: it deftly seeks the gaps in an opponent's armor
column4: as if possessed with a predatory life of its own. Its excitable users claim that bathing it in blood grants them their victims' skills in combat
column5: especially during Guild Raid missions. \"The Empty Sea glitters darkly.\" can be found carved onto the weapon's hilt."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818943_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket deity of weapons and fortune
column2: this unassuming blade was reshaped in a biological forge with a mixed powder of ground bone clubs and Sarayagaza Blooms before being tempered. The blade is then enchanted to ensure that it meets as little resistance as possible before tasting its victim's blood. With practice
column3: one can even dispel sorcerous attacks with this weapon
column4: although its properties are better used in Guild Raids. Those who wield this blade are often found on the front lines
column5: eager for the fight ahead of them."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818944_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket deity of weapons and fortune
column2: this blade was reforged once again through magical means. The words beaten into the wyrmscale folded and mingled with the blackest poisons of the Vardket used to enhance this blade cause memories of its wielder's triumphs to spring back to life. The weapon itself seems to swallow light
column3: and the strength it grants once it draws blood turns mortals into monsters. Its bearers are often eager for fighting
column4: especially when in Guild Raids. Unfortunately for this blade's victims
column5: however
column6: protective walls and barriers only serve to delay their inevitable fate."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818945_LONGDESCRIPTION":"In the land of Mikado
column2: all youths who has reached the age of 18 are to participate in the Gauntlet Ritual.  Only those who manage to summon a demon are chosen to be a Samurai. This gauntlet was once held by a hero who has defeated angels and demons. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818947_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket deity of poison and medicine
column2: this unassuming length of darkly colored bio-organic material serves as a rudimentary whip for those who need to harvest exotic materials in the field. Crafted from a variety of substances
column3: it can unerringly strike at the material desired by its wielder regardless of angle or direction. Some of those who wield it for combat find its length a handy container for a variety of poisons and elemental powders - all the best for inflicting an excruciating death
column4: especially in Guild Raids."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818948_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket deity of poison and medicine
column2: this weapon's coils are extended and intertwined with muscles from various animals to further increase its strength and striking speed. Various substances are then introduced into the material before it is tested one last time with electric shocks to ensure that the material works as intended. The final result is a weapon that is known to begin - and end - with a long
column3: drawn-out death
column4: especially in Guild Raids."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818949_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket deity of poison and medicine
column2: this weapon has been modified and reworked to allow its user to inflict both injury and healing in the same stroke. With additional bio-mechanical material worked into its form and its own muscular electric capacitor discharging secondary currents to maximize its strength and speed
column3: it is considered one of the most effective weapons of death and life on the battlefield. As some have remarked
column4: it is a thing of horrifying beauty
column5: perfectly mirroring its namesake's nature
column6: especially in Guild Raids."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818951_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket god of righteous battles and retreats
column2: this phylactery was meant to be mounted onto a warrior's throat after their Trial of Acceptance. It grants a mystical power to their words
column3: allowing them to enhance their speech with nuances of power. Some say that they feel purer - almost holy - when they lead their fellows into war
column4: and that their motions are empowered to superhuman levels. This is most effective in Guild Raids."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818952_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket god of righteous battles and retreats
column2: this phylactery is enhanced with various materials
column3: allowing the user to create a battlefield where their words dictate the flow of combat
column4: especially in Guild Raid. Attacks miss
column5: and attempts at evasion fail
column6: all at the reality-nudging power of their speech. Users often become paragons of leadership
column7: and thirst for their next battle in their dreams."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818953_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket god of righteous battles and retreats
column2: this phylactery is consecrated with one final blessing before the purified commander has it reattached to their throat. Each spoken syllable becomes a dirge for the enemy who hears it
column3: and every tune becomes a keening melody. Soon
column4: the lust for battle becomes their fuel for existence
column5: and they become unstoppable heroes on the battlefield
column6: especially in Guild Raids. Crackling energy accompanies them wherever they go
column7: and the flow of war becomes subject to their spoken whims."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818954_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The power that the Blight grants to those who gain his favor may seem small
column2: but it leaves beautiful blooms in the user's flesh. Shifting in pattern and hue
column3: it takes on many shapes and forms as it grows in power
column4: granting its wielder immense strength and power. Soon
column5: they become capable of heroic feats spoken of in taverns and royal courts
column6: smashing any and all obstacles in their path. Their accomplishments become legend
column7: even as their bodies start to slowly fail beneath their notice. One day
column8: they simply lie down
column9: Malekhan's blooms spreading with their last breaths among those that they held dear. Just as intended."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818955_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The power that the Blight grants to those who gain his favor may seem unremarkable until it blooms in times of need. Shifting in pattern and hue
column2: it grants the user the strength to rip arrogant gods and ill specters from their thrones. They become heroic adventurers
column3: smashing any and all obstacles in their path. Their accomplishments become legend
column4: even as their bodies start to slowly fail. One day
column5: they simply explode with unexpressed rage as Malekhan's fungi coat everything within reach in thick toxic spores. Just as intended."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818956_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The power that the Blight grants to those who gain his favor may seem unremarkable until it blooms in times of need. Shifting in pattern and hue
column2: the user sees the actions that link cause and effect together. Soon
column3: they become capable of making reality-bending strikes that turn illnesses into flowers or a crowd's hunger into flocks of geese. Their accomplishments become legend
column4: even as their bodies start to slowly fail. One day
column5: they simply implode as Malekhan's spores dig deeply into the ground they occupied a few moments before. Just as intended."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818957_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The power that the Blight grants to those who gain his favor may seem unremarkable until it blooms in times of need. Shifting in pattern and hue
column2: it allows the user to create impossible miracles from insane odds. Soon
column3: their feats cause them to be heralded as messiahs and prophets. Their accomplishments become legend
column4: even as their bodies start to slowly fail beneath their notice. One day
column5: their magic pulls them and everything around them for miles into a spore-laden explosion that resounds to the heavens. Just as Malekhan intended."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818964_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The power that the Weaver grants to those who gain his favor may seem insignificant
column2: but careful examination reveals its true power. The humble appearance of this token belies its true ability: in exchange for a paltry reduction of one's power and awareness
column3: all but the most hate-laden circumstances will see them free of danger. Opportunity bends and coincidence flexes in favor of the user
column4: typically resulting in them enjoying a rather charmed life. Until they become convenient pawns in Maestron's greater schemes
column5: they will find life quite convenient for them. Their ends
column6: happily enough
column7: are quick and usefully clean."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818965_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The power that the Weaver grants to those who gain his favor seem insignificant at first. This belies its true ability
column2: granting a life free of danger. Opportunity bends and coincidence flexes in favor of the user
column3: typically resulting in their flagrant excess despite attempts to unseat them --or worse. Their usefulness eventually comes to an end
column4: however
column5: and they soon themselves sacrificed to advance one of Maestron's many schemes. After all
column6: everything must go according to plan."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818966_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The power that the Weaver grants to those who gain his favor seems insignificant. This belies its true ability: a danger-free life filled with opportunities and encounters to live to the fullest. Opportunity bends and coincidence flexes in their favor
column2: making them rise from nobodies into people of interest
column3: surrounded by dead-eyed hordes of admirers and sycophants. Their usefulness eventually comes to an end
column4: and they soon themselves sacrificed to advance one of Maestron's many schemes. After all
column5: everything must go according to plan."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818967_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The power that the Weaver grants to those who gain his favor seems insignificant. This belies its true ability: a danger-free life with a godlike ability to sense both danger and opportunity in every shape and form. Opportunity bends and coincidence flexes in their favor
column2: causing them to become famous overnight as many turn to them for answers. Their usefulness eventually comes to an end
column3: however
column4: and they soon themselves sacrificed to advance one of Maestron's many schemes. After all
column5: everything must go according to plan."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818968_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The power that the Weaver grants to those who gain his favor may seem insignificant at first. This belies its true ability
column2: granting a life free of danger. Opportunity bends and coincidence flexes in favor of the user
column3: typically resulting in their flagrant excess despite attempts to unseat them--or worse. Their usefulness eventually comes to an end
column4: however
column5: and they soon themselves sacrificed to advance one of Maestron's many schemes. After all
column6: everything must go according to plan. \"Your fishbone struggles are exactly what I expected
column7: set against crimson leaves.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818974_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The power that the Harbinger grants to those who gain her favor is no small matter. This combination of living creature and biological device attaches itself to the user's chest and grants them an increase in strength
column2: agility
column3: and power--for a price. As long as the wearer enjoys Malachus's patronage
column4: no ill effects will be noticed. Indeed
column5: it will take an extended period of time away from her side before one is beset by wracking hungers and unnamable illnesses. As one sickens and finds life's pleasures turning into ash in their mouths
column6: this thing detaches from their body and wriggles home. They soon perish thereafter."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818975_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The power that the Harbinger grants to those who gain her favor is no small matter. This inhuman thing attaches itself to the user's chest
column2: allowing them to perform feats known only in legend. As long as the wearer enjoys Malachus's patronage
column3: no ill effects will be noticed. However
column4: some have noticed that users become reckless adrenalin junkies
column5: eager to chase the next near-death high. Their accomplishments typically end in a gore-filled slaughter
column6: with the creature within departing before its demise is reached."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818976_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The power that the Harbinger grants to those who gain her favor is no small matter. This inhuman thing attaches itself to the user's chest
column2: allowing them at their peak to defy immortal-crushing odds. As long as the wearer enjoys Malachus's patronage
column3: no ill effects will be noticed. However
column4: some have noticed that users become reckless warriors
column5: eager to fight at the smallest provocation. Their belligerence tends to get them killed
column6: which is not an easy feat when one's flesh eagerly accepts pain in every shape and form."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818977_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The power that the Harbinger grants to those who gain her favor is no small matter. This inhuman thing attaches itself to the user's chest
column2: allowing them at their peak to punch
column3: kick
column4: or strike things dead with a single blow. As long as the wearer enjoys Malachus's patronage
column5: no ill effects will be noticed. However
column6: some have noticed that users become reckless brawlers
column7: attacking everything in reach whenever the opportunity presents itself. Eventually
column8: everything ends for them in the same way: in a beautiful explosion."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818978_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The power that the Harbinger grants to those who gain her favor is no small matter. This inhuman thing attaches itself to the user's chest
column2: allowing them to perform feats known only in legend. As long as the wearer enjoys Malachus's patronage
column3: no ill effects will be noticed. However
column4: some have noticed that users become reckless adrenalin junkies
column5: eager to chase the next near-death high. Their accomplishments typically end in a gore-filled slaughter
column6: with the creature within departing before its demise is reached. \"Come
column7: and I shall give you rest. Drink deeply of me
column8: and I shall satiate your darkest appetites.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818979_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The power that the Harbinger grants to those who gain her favor is no small matter. This inhuman thing attaches itself to the user's chest
column2: allowing them at their peak to defy immortal-crushing odds. As long as the wearer enjoys Malachus's patronage

column4: some have noticed that users become reckless warriors

column6: which is not an easy feat when one's flesh eagerly accepts pain in every shape and form. \"Let me have you
column7: and we shall explore the sweet promise of power together--forever. Mine.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818984_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket deity of travel
column2: commerce
column3: and jewelry
column4: this coil of minerals and bone is implanted into the user's spine before being bathed in a growth solution over several months. It allows the user to resist injury and wounds far better than they normally would. Despite its strange color and appearance
column5: its cleansing and purifying effects are quite potent on the battlefield. \"Speedily traverse the Empty Sea.\" can be found written in its seed sections in the Vardket tongue."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818985_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket deity of travel
column2: commerce
column3: and jewelry
column4: this coil of minerals and bone is enriched with additional mineralizing baths and oral supplements as it binds itself to the user's skeleton and flesh. As a result
column5: its cleansing properties allows the user to double (or even triple) their strength as long as they remain uninjured. None save the most potent poisons and illnesses will plague their bodies. \"Purify the waters with force.\" can be found written in its seed sections in the Vardket tongue."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818986_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket deity of travel
column2: commerce
column3: and jewelry
column4: this coil of minerals and bone is given one last empowerment as it binds itself completely to the user's flesh and skeleton. In its final form
column5: it allows the user to resist the most powerful of blows. Raw strength is a meaningless weapon against them
column6: allowing them to defeat hordes of enemies with ease. Users often spend time away from others
column7: preferring to be immersed in bodies of water or dancing among the stars in the Empty Sea."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818988_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A light and simple shield wielded by an order of courageous knights."
"MST_SPHERES_818989_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A sacred shield said to be imbued with the power of light. It protects its bearer against dark forces."

"MST_SPHERES_818990_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Only those with enough courage to protect and defend their allies are able to wield this wondrous shield. Legend has it that the protection it offers is a reflection of the bravery residing within the bearer's heart."
"MST_SPHERES_818992_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket deity of slavery and sacrifice
column2: this paw-shaped amulet enhances one's strikes beyond the norm
column3: allowing them to draw upon reserves of strength that they never thought possible. Care
column4: however
column5: must be taken by the bearer with their newly-endowed strength - lest their caresses crush bone and steel."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818993_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket deity of slavery and sacrifice
column2: this paw-shaped amulet enhances one's strikes beyond their imagination. Every move they make
column3: no matter how small
column4: turns their victims into gibbets of flesh and blood. Many quickly learn to keep their distance lest their friendship be misinterpreted as something else."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_818994_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Named after the Vardket deity of slavery and sacrifice
column2: this paw-shaped amulet allows its bearer to crush armies with a flick of a wrist. No defense is proof against the power it grants
column3: and many learn to kneel before their quick demise arrives. Yet this power comes at a steep price
column4: for the wearer pays for their strength with a highly truncated lifespan. Nevertheless
column5: their imminent demise is guaranteed to be a carnage-filled spectacle."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819002_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A single archer can be easily closed down
column2: but a group of archers working in unison can survive anything."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819003_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A famous archer once said
column2: \"Fear not the man who has the most expensive bow and arrow
column3: fear the man who has devoted his life to archery.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819004_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Ancient texts of archery mention archers who aimed not only with their eyes
column2: but also with their hearts. Legend has it that a masterful archer can shoot an arrow through the petals of a flower without breaking it!"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819005_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An ancient pendant that seduces its wielder with the promise of power beyond their imagination. It can be found almost anywhere nowadays."
"MST_SPHERES_819006_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An ancient artifact that has Orochi's Mark on it. Some say that this is used to obtain its dark power. One is warned never to gaze upon it for long."
"MST_SPHERES_819007_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An orb that pulsates with Orochi's power. It tempts weak-willed seekers of power with promises of victory for a dark price."
"MST_SPHERES_819008_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An orb crafted from the essence of fire
column2: it softly hums with power. This is one of the first creations from Noel's workshop with the newly discovered Vardket technology
column3: and is a promising start for future artifacts of power."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819009_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Formed with a Pyre Orb as its nucleus
column2: this artifact is warm to the touch. Thanks to trial and (explosive) error
column3: Noel has managed to improve the compression ratios
column4: allowing him to solidify elemental essence around a stable base."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819010_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An improved version of its predecessor
column2: this artifact blazes with the power of fire. With Giselle's assistance
column3: Noel has managed to build upon his earlier success with these objects of power. They are the closest thing to literal fonts of raw elemental power...for now."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819011_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An orb crafted from the essence of water
column2: it softly hums with power. This is one of the first creations from Noel's workshop with the newly discovered Vardket technology
column3: and is a promising start for future artifacts of power."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819012_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Formed with a Tide Orb as its nucleus
column2: this artifact is cool to the touch. Thanks to trial and (explosive) error
column3: Noel has managed to improve the compression ratios
column4: allowing him to solidify elemental essence around a stable base."

column3: Noel has managed to build upon his earlier success with these objects of power. They are the closest thing to literal fonts of raw elemental power...for now."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819089_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A wondrous crystal that is made from the finest salt. The raw power crystallized salt gives the bearer of this Sphere abilities beyond their imagination! There are rumors that the gods of Grand Gaia feed on these crystals."
"MST_SPHERES_819090_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A nondescript egg-like sphere that can hold an infinite number of magical Easter eggs. No one knows where it's come from
column2: although it has been spotted being toted by bunnies and bunny-like heroes alike."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819091_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A nondescript egg-like sphere that can hold an infinite amount of magical Easter goodies."
"MST_SPHERES_819092_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A nondescript egg-like sphere that can hold more magical Easter goodies than meets the eye. Perfect for parties!"
"MST_SPHERES_819093_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Encased in a specially made globe
column2: this multicolored carrot is a beauty to behold. The power it contains is fueled by a spectrum of elemental energies
column3: compressed into a material form."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819094_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Elphelt's signature rifle packs a lethal punch with every shot. It's certainly a lovely way to punctuate a heartfelt expression of love
column2: such as \"Boom
column3: HEARTSHOT!\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819095_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Elphelt's signature shotgun cleans up any room
column2: guaranteed. It's the perfect twelve-gauge solution for a fighting
column3: yet classy lady."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819096_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Elphelt's signature pistol is proof that good things come in small sizes. One shot is all it takes to marry its lead to the groom--or bride--of your choice. Permanently."
"MST_SPHERES_819097_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Elphelt's signature rocket launcher is the stylish way to blow up your enemies. Alternatively
column2: you can use it to perform impromptu firework shows for monstrous villains...before you blow them up."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819099_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A smooth crystal formed out of the essence of a world-walker
column2: this artifact pulses with an unseen power. Its surface is slippery to the touch
column3: with an oily sheen to it. Should one be able to hold it for long enough
column4: knowledge of the pleasures of life will come to them swiftly."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819100_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A round crystal formed out of the essence of a world-walker
column2: this artifact pulses with an unseen power. Its surface is pebbled and sits itself in one's palm quite comfortably. Should one be able to hold it for long enough
column3: knowledge of any subject in creation will come to them swiftly. Sleep
column4: however
column5: will slip from their grasp for years to come."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819101_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An ornate greatsword that is rumored to be the harbinger of massive destruction. It is covered in jewels and ancient runes of power."
"MST_SPHERES_819102_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A metal bangle from another world covered in runes of mystic power. It is said to bring bravery
column2: luck
column3: and skill to its bearer."

column2: it feels warm to the touch. Attuning to it grants an explosive infusion of magical energy to your every action...for a price."

column2: it feels cool to the touch. Attuning to it grants a chilling infusion of magical energy to your every action...for a price."

column2: it feels warm to the touch. Attuning to it grants an great infusion of magical energy to your every action...for a price."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819108_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A wing of shadowy elemental power
column2: it shimmers when it is held. Attuning to it grants an massive infusion of magical energy to your every action."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819109_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A device used to direct unthinking mechanical beasts to one's will. This one has seen many adventures
column2: but still gleams with hidden strength."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819110_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A device used to direct unthinking mechanical beasts to one's will. This one has been engineered to perfection and grants life - or death - to those its owner decides to spare."

"MST_SPHERES_819111_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A device used to direct unthinking mechanical beasts to one's will. The mask inlaid in its center is a symbol of a long-forgotten warrior-king who drove his mechanized hordes across an unnamed wasteland. With it
column2: one can almost see a future filled with smoke
column3: fire
column4: and conquest."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819112_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A relic whose creation dates back to a time long before the war between the Deva and Morokai. This blade was part of a set of prototype weapons forged by a horned smith and enchanted by an Archmage of the Deva. It became the template for many future blueprints but the process of forging the blade was mysteriously lost to the ravages of time. This was a great shame to the prideful Deva; the fact that their prized mithril weapons were flawed was kept a secret. This weapon now lies in the hands of Allanon's prot\u00e9g\u00e9
column2: Ezra Fish Slayer; it has skewed a great many innocent fish for Ezra's dinner. How did he obtain the blade? Obviously
column3: he stole it. Why did he do it? Well..."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819113_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An old crinkled letter can be found in the hollow of the swords hilt:
Do not cry

column3: for no one will wait for you. And no matter what happens
column4: never ever give up
column5: for that will truly be the end of you. However
column6: do not forget that there is still good in this place we call home
column7: that there is still love and hope to be found
column8: for that is how your father and I were able to bring you into this world. You
column10: are meant for great things. Just as you are our joy and our hope
column11: I know that you will one day become the light for the people of this world. Although our time together has been but a brief moment
column12: know that mommy and daddy will always

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819120_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An embellished looking silver key imbued with a mysterious power."
"MST_SPHERES_819121_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A gold key suffused with an inexplicable power."
"MST_SPHERES_819122_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A solemn looking key decorated with diamond
column2: it seems suffused with an incomprehensible power."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819123_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A magical tome closely guarded by Mard Geer."
"MST_SPHERES_819124_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Before the era of the gods
column2: a unique material was harnessed by otherworldly creatures as an endless source of energy and data. A single drop of this element somehow emerged in Grand Gaia
column3: where it resulted in wild tempests that left brackish pools of water in their wake. Bewildered and worried
column4: the Gods sought to contain this element in a divine vessel crafted from their essence and then dropped it into the deepest rift they could find. Yet rumors say that Akachi
column5: one of the original Shapers of the element
column6: has found the vessel and mounted it onto a gauntlet of power. Why it has done so is anyone's guess
column7: but it can be certain that whoever possesses this shall make their enemies weep in abject hopelessness."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819125_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A charm that radiates an odd sense of dread
column2: this talisman boosts one's reflexes to superhuman levels. It is best worn around the neck. Some users have reported suddenly having the urge to cackle for no reason - they say
column3: however
column4: that it is completely normal."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819126_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A ragged doll with a sinister smile
column2: it seems to be laughing at a joke no one else knows. Terrible accidents befall those who own it
column3: but if one can tap into its energies
column4: dark powers can be theirs. Where it came from
column5: though
column6: is something nobody knows..."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819127_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Baiken's iconic glass mono-goggle. Worn over her missing eye
column2: it adds more flare to her unique image. It does not boast the same offensive powers as her arsenal of \"Demon Tools
column3: \" but it has been with her through thick and thin since the aftermath of the Crusades."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819128_LONGDESCRIPTION":"May's orange pirate tricorn hat. The cute skull ornament on it has seen May's growth from a 'young' orphan to the leader of the Jellyfish Pirates. The hat holds much of her cherished memories from adventuring with Johnny onboard the Mayship."

"MST_SPHERES_819129_LONGDESCRIPTION":"
One of Johnny's coveted coins
column2: it is used for his signature Special Move \"Glitter is Gold.\" Due to his \"Treasure Hunt\" Overdrive's power to replenish coins
column3:
he could afford to lose this particular coin without losing much sleep over it.
"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819130_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This is Leo Whitefang's personal dictionary
column2: where he privately enjoys adding people and incidents to its pages to expand the definitions of existing words. For example
column3: his older sister is recorded under \"Devil
column4: \" reflecting his fear of her. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819131_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Potent luck crystallised into being and bound together by microscopic fairy dust
column2: its like has never been seen before. Anyone standing near will sometimes feel a rush of positivity and excitement for the future"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819132_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Potent luck crystallised into being
column2:
enclosed in a charm made from Kitsu's hair. Its aura is inspiring and giddying.
"

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819133_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Winter magic has purified and transformed the charm into a beautiful clear crystal. Its emanations are almost addictive.
"
"MST_SPHERES_819136_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A crystal orb set in gold
column2: this sphere was created to celebrate one's ascension to power in dazzling style. Imbued with a wide array of powerful strengths
column3: one who holds this can surely make the heavens shake if they desired it"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819137_LONGDESCRIPTION":"With success comes rich rewards
column2: and few are as wondrous - or powerful - as this creation. With several outstanding benefits (especially in Guild battles)
column3: the advantages it brings can turn a glimmer of hope into certain victory."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819138_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A holy shield
column2: adorned with radiant pure-white wings. Such shields are only\u00a0bestowed upon Holy Knights of renowned skill and valor.\u00a0It protects the\u00a0wielder\u00a0against both physical and magical attacks
column3: and also endows him or her with\u00a0righteous fury
column4: granting the strength to endure any battle."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819139_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This apple looks fascinating
column2: alien
column3: and too weird to eat. The bearer of the artifact feels the presence of countless other memories
column4: imparting wisdom and knowledge. It would seem that the memories are held within the apple
column5: drawn from millennia of previous owners from another world."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819140_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Eons ago
column2: when Grand Gaia knew no heaven or earth
column3: nor even the names of the gods
column4: an otherworldly deity with an octagonal mirror appeared. Holding the Yata no Kagami up high
column5: it exposed and branded creatures of chaos that were masquerading as gods and causing havoc
column6: causing them to vanish from Grand Gaia. Its great light lured out primal gods who then shaped the known world. This legend is based on a story from another world
column7: however
column8: and its degree of authenticity remains unknown."

column2: however
