column1: "MST_SPHERES_819156_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Given as a symbol of both loyalty and success
column2: this reward is highly coveted by warriors--especially those eager to prove their superiority to all others. A potent artifact of power (especially in Guild battles)
column3: those who possess this are exemplars of battle itself."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819157_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A medal awarded to the victors of battles long-gone
column2: it bestows overwhelming power and striking beauty to its wearer. Such warriors are considered figures of legend on the battlefield."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819158_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A medal awarded to the victors of battles long-gone
column2: it bestows power and grace to its wearer."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819159_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A brilliantly shining medal of glorious gold
column2: awarded to the warrior whose soul shines like the sun. It feels pleasantly warm to the touch
column3: and grants prodigious energy to its bearer."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819160_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A shining medal of glorious gold
column2: awarded to warriors of the sun. Grants a burst of energy to its bearer."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819161_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A beautifully gilded medal set with fine amethyst and precious silver. It glows with the mystical energy of an otherworldly twilight
column2: a realm between sun and shadow. Grants its bearer great power over light and darkness."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819162_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A gilded medal set with amethyst and silver. It emits a faint glow reminiscent of a mystical twilight. Grants its bearer power over light and darkness."
"MST_SPHERES_819163_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This strange petal-embellished artifact is used by shrine maidens from a faraway land. While it can drive away evil spirits with a simple swish
column2: its true potential can only be brought to life by those gifted with heavenly voices and ethereal melodies."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819165_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This beautiful hourglass is a container for a magical sand-like substance gathered from the timeless Vortex. The substance shifts and dances endlessly
column2: imbuing its bearer with boundless energy and enhanced time management skills. Its deepest secrets
column3: however
column4: remain locked to all but a select few who understand and are able to manipulate the intricacies of Time. What should happen if the hourglass is ever broken and the sands unleashed
column5: nobody has even dared to speculate."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819167_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Worn by a mighty peace-loving hero
column2: this item protects his face from shrapnel while permitting a degree of freedom."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819168_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Worn by a hero whose prowess with explosions is the stuff of legend
column2: this item allows him to channel his special power without harming his body."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819169_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Worn by a mighty peace-loving hero
column2: this cape can give anyone wearing it a massive boost in confidence. Just try not to trip over it."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819170_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A magical artifact
column2: in the grotesque shape of a skull
column3: wielded by Ihsir to focus his dark powers. Ihsir used the artifact to harness the souls of countless combatants
column4: absorbing their memories to become the master of a thousand magical and martial arts. When he ran out of life force to sustain his magical immortality
column5: Ihsir began to draw upon the strength of other living things to fuel his necromantic magics. Unlike most valuable trinkets
column6: Ihsir was unafraid to leave the skull unattended for extended periods of time. He knew that only a few in the world would be capable of subduing the demonic echoes in the skull to bend its overwhelming puissance to their will."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819171_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A trinket that was left behind by the Moon Fairy who was said to have charmed many mortals. It emits a faint glow
column2: but it does not seem to possess any special properties. However
column3: those who have the opportunity to wear it claim that they feel much luckier. Strangely enough
column4: it appears to be part of a bigger charm."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819172_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A trinket that was left behind by the Moon Fairy who was said to have charmed many mortals. An intangible aura radiates from it
column2: and those who wear it claim they feel invigorated. Strangely enough
column3: a crescent-shaped inset appears to be missing from the trinket."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819173_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A beautiful charm comprising the two trinkets left behind by the Moon Fairy. After clicking the crescent inset into place
column2: the jewel began to shine with celestial light. Its immaculate
column3: shiny surface is pleasantly cool to the touch
column4: and smoother than any material known to this world. Radiating powerful energies
column5: this charm appears to increase the luck and life force of its wearer."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819174_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The greataxe that Hadaron wields in battle
column2: a monstrosity housing the spirit of a terrible demon. Hadaron once faced off against a dread abomination in a battle of epic proportions. Facing obliteration
column3: the demon pleaded with Hadaron for a lighter judgement. Hadaron sealed the demon into his greataxe
column4: where it would serve Athensphere for all time. Under its master's watchful eye
column5: the demon unleashes itself in battle to consume the souls of his foes. These souls are trapped in Kronax alongside the demon
column6: to be called upon in the defense of Athensphere. It is rumored among the demigods that anybody too weak to wield Kronax risks being devoured by the demon."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819175_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Blades of exquisite craftsmanship that glow with moonlight
column2: the Vesper Argentum was said to be the very same wielded by the First-Who-Walked\u2014the first vampire. Gabriela Ninlil
column3: matriarch of the Black Dragon coven
column4: bequeathed these blades to Kielazar to protect them from the vampire courts that longed to recover them from her guardianship. Legends say that the Vesper Argentum reflects its owner's soul. In Kielazar's possession
column5: the argent surface ripples with ghostly energy
column6: and howls through the air when swung. Perhaps the spirit of Kielazar's loyal wolfhound companion
column7: Mannag
column8: is indelibly tied to his."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819176_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A Flower of the Vale tinged with Faefire. Although the original flowers were said to be delicate and fragile
column2:
the divine nature of Faefire has imbued them with a fiery essence instead of burning the bloom to ash.

During the Voidborn invasion
column3: vast trails of destruction marked the once peaceful Vale
column4: but one particular section was found razed with Faefire\u2014damning evidence of Man's theft and betrayal of this divine power."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819177_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A Flower of the Vale corrupted by Void energy. The blight that penetrates these flowers is a desecration of its original life essence
column2: and yet
column3:
their auras appear curiously similar\u2014like two sides of the same coin.

The Voidborn's vile influence seeped into the fertile soil of the Vale
column4: corrupting every living organism it touched. When the creeping blight tainted these flowers
column5: they took on a poisonous
column6:
amaranthine hue instead of wilting.

Perhaps the nature of the blight\u2014or the flower\u2014is not all it seems."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819178_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A relic comprising a sealed vellum scroll in a wooden container that was given to the Summoner after helping Theodor subdue Florence. While its exact nature and behavior remains a mystery
column2: there is no mistaking that there is some kind of power\u2014a curse even\u2014at work here."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819179_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A relic comprising a sealed vellum scroll in a metallic container that was given to the Summoner after helping Theodor subdue Florence. Through unknown methods
column2: Theodor has managed to combine Prismatic Crystallite and Luminous Solvent to empower this relic even further. Cool to the touch
column3: this relic was entrusted to the Summoner for the purpose of research."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819180_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A relic comprising a sealed vellum scroll in a golden container that was given to the Summoner after helping Theodor subdue Florence. Through means unknown to the Summoner
column2: Theodor has managed to combine Prismatic Crystallite and Luminous Solvent to unlock its fullest potential. Warm to the touch
column3: this relic exudes pulses of energies that seem to grant supernatural powers to its wielder."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819181_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This tool comes from a different timeline and has been infused with the power of unknown crystals. It is said that the owner of this pickaxe isn't an ordinary harvester."

"MST_SPHERES_819182_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This mask comes from a different timeline and has been infused with the power of unknown crystals. Some mercenaries are using it to conceal their identity but the owner of this one is someone special."
"MST_SPHERES_819183_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The largest of Aurelia's songstones
column2: Orphira features prominently at the head of Aurelia's harp. Songstones are immaculate orbs that radiate gently with the colors of the rainbow
column3: and are said to be the crystallization of divine inspiration. Using the unique resonance of Orphira
column4: Aurelia is able to attune her song to the rhythm of heaven
column5: inducing any emotion she wished in her listeners. During the Augmentation Wars
column6: the songstones were used to amplify the power of her healing hymns. Through Athensphere's darkest hours
column7: Aurelia provided the wounded soldiers with songs of light and hope."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819184_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A holy relic that was sealed away due to the immense amount of evil magic that it absorbed."
"MST_SPHERES_819185_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The very source of power for Mavis Vermilion; the Fairy Heart. Being the guild's most closely guarded secret
column2: the Fairy Heart is also referred to as Fairy Tail's \"Ultimate Weapon.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819187_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A glowing Medal
column2: with intense brilliance
column3: made with Gold and Amber. It is said to contain the energy of a noble and mighty warrior whose might roars throughout the battlefield
column4: terrifying his enemies. Grants its bearer great power over Fire and Lightning."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819188_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A glowing Medal made with Gold and Amber. It is said to contain some of the energy of a noble and mighty warrior whose might roars throughout the battlefield. Grants its bearer power over Fire and Lightning."
"MST_SPHERES_819189_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A Flower of the Vale corrupted by Void energy. The blight that penetrates these flowers is a desecration of its original life essence
column2: and yet
column3:
their auras appear curiously similar\u2014like two sides of the same coin.

The Voidborn's vile influence seeped into the fertile soil of the Vale
column4: corrupting every living organism it touched. When the creeping blight tainted these flowers
column5: they took on a poisonous
column6:
amaranthine hue instead of wilting.

Perhaps the nature of the blight\u2014or the flower\u2014is not all it seems."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819190_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A Flower of the Vale tinged with Faefire. Although the original flowers were said to be delicate and fragile
column2:
the divine nature of Faefire has imbued them with a fiery essence instead of burning the bloom to ash.

During the Voidborn invasion
column3: vast trails of destruction marked the once peaceful Vale
column4: but one particular section was found razed with Faefire\u2014damning evidence of Man's theft and betrayal of this divine power."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819191_LONGDESCRIPTION":"With such a cold name
column2: this trinket puts most people off from procuring it for fear of contracting frostbite or worse. However
column3: those brave enough to handle the item hear faint strains of old melodies emanating from it
column4:
as well as a nostalgic warmth.

A closer inspection of the trinket reveals an inset
column5: indicating that something else is needed to complete this trinket."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819192_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An odd trinket with several musical notes hovering inside. It exudes a small aura of coldness that seems to be at odds with its appearance. Shaking it will produce a variety of festive melodies
column2:
invigorating the user.

Upon closer inspection
column3: this item appears to be part of a larger trinket..."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819193_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A completed trinket formed from both Kindling and Frigid Melodies. It exudes a warm and invigorating aura comparable to a blazing fireplace. The trinket grants its wielder an increase in strength
column2:
and allows them to withstand punishment that would have otherwise crippled an average person.

When held
column3: twin sensations of warm and cold dance across the fingertips. This trinket seems to be the manifestation of a will to protect those who brave many hardships."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819194_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A precious emerald so named for its rare crystallization structure that causes five colors to reflect instead of the single
column2: standard deep green. Such gems are highly prized in the market
column3:
and are a popular inset in all sorts of jewelry.

According to the ancients
column4: five key elements were instrumental to the creation of the universe: fire
column5: water
column6: thunder
column7: earth
column8: and a fifth combined essence said to be the harmony between light and dark. Some geologists believe that the quintan emerald
column10: can be seen as a microcosm of the universe."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819196_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An amazing lucky charm that provides not only protection for the wearer but also grants them additional confidence to overcome obstacles. Such charms are normally impossible to be crafted and fragments of these charms only be found by answering a series of questions from the guests of another world.

Legend has it that these guests rarely appear. The only way to encounter them is by standing at a certain location where the stars and moons align
column2: and even then
column3: one must still be incredibly lucky to chance upon them."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819197_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An ornate golden longbow belonging to Andaria
column2: mistress of the hunt and of history. Its incredible draw appears to require prodigious strength
column3: but instead relies on the wielder's dexterity and technique rather than brute force. Andaria strongly believed that the end goal of any hunt should be a dance between equals
column4:
and not merely that of hunter and hunted.

Andaria favored swiftness and patience above all
column5: and during the Augmentation Wars
column6: it was said that the last visual registered on many of Gazia's robots was a single
column7: gleaming streak of gold."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819198_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A vibrant
column2: prismatic flower that grows only in the Vale of the North under certain conditions. It gives off a gentle
column3: aromatic scent at full bloom
column4: and its petals appear to glitter and glow at night. Among the Fae
column5: it is a popular gift of friendship among children and adults alike
column6:
but it is far more sought after by human druids and scholars.

Surviving botanical records from Hanukkah festivals during the Vale's brief period of open contact note the flower's many beneficial properties
column7: among them an incredible boost to one's magical abilities."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819199_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A gleaming golden pupa of the rare chrys\u00f3s butterfly
column2: a mythological emblem of glory and power. According to a popular legend
column3:
these chrysalises contain tiny sparks of life that will protect its bearer from violent misfortune.
Chrysalises that are especially tough and resilient are known as \"Alphas\"
column4: and are presented as gifts to soldiers and warriors. The butterflies that emerge from these gilded pupae are resistant to extremes of heat and cold
column5: and their wings often feature large
column6: intimidating patterns."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819200_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A stunning silver pupa of the rare chrys\u00f3s butterfly
column2: a mythological emblem of glory and power. According to a popular legend
column3:
these chrysalises contain tiny sparks of life that will protect its bearer from violent misfortune.
Chrysalises that are found deep in lush forests or in the wake of fertile rains are known as \"Omegas\"
column4: and are presented as gifts to sentinels and guards. The butterflies that emerge from these silver-tinted pupae are sturdy and stalwart
column5: braving harsh thunderstorms to feed from stormflowers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819201_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A highly unusual azure pupa of the rare chrys\u00f3s butterfly
column2: a mythological emblem of glory and power. According to a popular legend
column3:
these chrysalises contain tiny sparks of life that will protect its bearer from violent misfortune.
Chrys\u00f3s caterpillars that form azure chrysalises are said to combine the best traits of both the golden Alpha and silver Omega variants. Known as \"Zetas\"
column4: the butterflies that emerge from these pupae are paragons of the species. Zetas are usually presented as gifts to monarchs and heroes
column5: as they possess powerful energies that invigorate the body."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819202_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Forged from fire and fury itself
column2: the spear of the great demigod warrior Ultor is every bit as unbreakable as his will. As Athensphere's mightiest champion
column3: Ultor led their armies to countless victories
column4:
crushing all who stood in their path.

At the height of the Augmentation Wars
column5: Ultor was a permanent sight on the burning battlefields. His battle roars were overshadowed only by each earth-shaking swing of this indestructible spear. Legends say that the demigod single-handedly downed enough enemies to fill a small empire
column6: his eyes burning with the passion of conquest."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819203_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A mighty spear fashioned after a thunderbolt
column2:
symbol of the great demigod leader Zedus. It was said that the power of the old gods manifested as a ravaging thunderstorm upon the newly created world of Athensphere\u2014\"the light that streaks the path of all things.\"

Zedus fought valiantly and selflessly in the Augmentation Wars
column3: channeling all of his power into every strike of his spear. During his final stand to ensure the evacuation of his people
column4: his gleaming form silhouetted against the smog-choked sky evoked the image of a divine pillar of light smiting evil."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819204_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Solemn and stalwart
column2: this trident is the chosen weapon of Tridon
column3: Grand Admiral of the Athensphere navy. Its three-pronged tip channeled the power of the oceans into raging maelstroms
column4: and yet in the same vein
column5:
it was also capable of calming the most irate tides.

Though Tridon was peaceable and preferred the expansion of trade and commerce over military might
column6: he came to the forefront of Athensphere's defense during the Augmentation Wars. His love for the people was second only to Zedus
column7: and it was through his efforts that many were afforded the chance to evacuate."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819206_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Developed by Vektor
column2: the Excelsior Chip is a modular enchancement for robotic equipment or entities outfitted with the standard XSB-U sockets. This MK-1 chip is an initial prototype of the series
column3: and the very same that propelled him into world of engineering."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819207_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Developed by Vektor
column2: the Excelsior Chip MK-2 is a significant improvement over the MK-1
column3: boasting improvements in every area and adding several new functions for compatible robotic equipment and entities. The MK-2 was the result of countless hours of iteration
column4: mostly due to Vektor wanting \"a bigger bang.\" This chip is popular on the market
column5: especially among fighting robot enthusiasts."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819208_LONGDESCRIPTION":"At the peak of the Excelsior Chip line stands the MK-3
column2: Vektor's pride and joy. Although the series is designed with all robotic equipment and entities in mind
column3: the MK-3 itself is specifically tailored to enhance the battle android Galene's abilities. One could say it is Vektor's way of expressing his love for Galene
column4: despite the strangeness of romance between a human and what many would call a sentient pile of circuits and wires."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819210_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A grisly
column2: impaled skull with tentacles erupting from its mandible
column3: the Uln'gha is the cherished relic of Saerenthis
column4:
high priest of the Endless Abyss.

This was the skull of the high priest's own father
column5: whom he personally sacrificed to gain favor with their Deep Goddess. This symbolic act was meant to sever all earthly relationships
column6:
so that he would wholly devote himself to carrying out Tsovinar's will.

The Uln'gha appears to have a will of its own at times
column7: and has been known to utter smatterings of eldritch or abyssal phrases."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819211_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A massive blade that is extremely unwieldy to all but the strongest and nimblest of warriors
column2:
it bears an uncanny resemblance to another famous sword known as the \"Duster Sword\".

Before the fateful battle between Shura and Hisui
column3: this weapon was the bane of many great warriors. Though it is crafted from common steel
column4: it shines radiantly with the focus and ambition of its former master. When Shura forsook his name to become the War Demon Shusui
column5: he abandoned his weapon as well
column6: leaving it to be discovered by the Summoner's Hall in an unnamed corner of Celgrad."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819212_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A heavy
column2: iridescent longsword
column3:
with intricate weaving patterns carved into the side of the blade.

This is Noel's second attempt to replicate a weapon carried by the War Demon Shusui. Recognising that his berserker fury was Shusui's shortcoming in battle
column4: Noel was careful to dampen the furious aura that emanated from its previous incarnation. The weapon has lost none of its potency
column5: however
column6: and preliminary tests have unveiled the ability to absorb magical strength from its wielder's foes."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819213_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The ultimate weapon. Its power exceeds those of anything once wielded by War Demon Shusui.

Along with Giselle's unerringly helpful insight
column2: Noel has fashioned a close quarters weapon that changes form at its user's will. However
column3: it requires enormous energy to sustain its form at all times
column4: and only entities with great mental fortitude have the stamina to use such a weapon. Noel believes that this weapon will enable anybody who is strong enough to wield it to become the next War Demon."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819214_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An unassuming metal half-mask
column2:
it grants the wearer extraordinary vision of the magics and energies that permeate all things.

With an improved understanding of magical neural interfaces
column3: Noel has overhauled the way it communicates with the user
column4: removing the unintended side effect of vegetation by long-term use. Noel's testers have
column5: however
column6: reported slight migraines and nausea after extended periods of use
column7: presumably due to the average mind's inability to handle extreme clarity and detail."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819215_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The ultimate soothsayer. In addition to magical vision
column2: its user is endowed with multiple visions of possible events in the near future. Only entities with great mental strength are capable of wearing this device and using it effectively instead of going insane. Noel says it is theoretically possible for a user to focus the mask's power into one single chain of events to see far into its future
column3: but he has yet to find anyone who can."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819216_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An improved version of Mordlim's shield. It creates an endless weave of interlocking branches and twigs around the wearer.

The shield has been upgraded to absorb and store vast amounts of solar energy
column2: used to grow a wooden armor around its bearer. The wood is deceptively strong
column3: as resilient as the best materials used in Noel's defensive technologies. In the rare case of the armor getting damaged in combat
column4: the shield immediately regenerates the wood
column5: as long as there is energy left."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819217_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The apex of nature's defense. Noel has added a battery meter to inform the bearer when it is time to charge the armor.

In addition to maintaining a solid defense
column2:
the shield is now able to power up the wearer's strength and stamina. Some describe the experience as a powerful force of nature.

Its rudimentary sentience occasionally manifests as a soft whisper coming from the shield itself: \"I have root!\" Interpretations of this simple sentence vary
column3: but the most popular and accepted one is that the armor as declared its host as part of itself\u2014the source of its energy and something to protect."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819218_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A complicated looking suit of armor that is actually quite simple to put on.

Before Noel could even begin designing upgrades for Beiorg's Armor
column2: its components assimilated Orebi crystals close by and started modifying itself. Having wanted to incorporate technology from some research blueprints that the summoner \"borrowed\" from a corporation in some distant land
column3: Noel attempted to assuage his bruised ego by undoing the automated upgrades. The armor refused."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819219_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An extremely futuristic piece of protective technology
column2: created when Beiorg's Armor is exposed to sufficiently large Orebi crystals. Its array of defensive capabilities include an exhaustive arsenal of preemptive mechanisms
column3: automated by the powerful and cognizant Artificial Intelligence residing in the armor. Having recognized the envious Noel as a worthy adversary in an unsanctioned arms race
column4: the armor upgraded itself several times over in a single iteration."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819220_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A flawlessly clear orb that resembles an eye. Its ley lines shift and transform at the will of the wielder. A black ellipse at the center of the orb
column2: like the pupil of an eye
column3: swivels around merrily as if pleased. After consuming considerable amounts of Orebi crystals
column4: the orb attained its current form
column5: refusing to absorb any more magic. Noel noted that he could no longer detect the subtle malevolence that previously seeped out from the orb. Noel believes that the orb has a sentience of its own\u2014one that seeks to siphon latent energy from its user
column6: and suggests caution when handling it for long periods of time."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819221_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A white orb emanating magic so potent that it manifests as visible ley lines around the orb. The mock Twilight Stone lost its signature blue aura when infused with magical Orebi essence. This orb synchronizes its own attacks with the user
column2: multiplying the effects tenfold. After countless hours spent trying to understand the inner workings of this orb
column3: Noel hypothesized that Mora's lust for power was slowly and secretly deepened by her Twilight Stone
column4: despite her immense willpower. As for how or why
column5: he has yet to figure out."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819222_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A red jewel set in a golden frame. Its lavish yet pleasant style belies the awesome power held within. After saturating the armor with Orebi magic
column2: most of the suit disappeared into thin air
column3: leaving behind the chestplate seal. When the user places the seal on any part of the body
column4: a suit of armor magically materializes around the user
column5: with none of its magical and physical strength diminished. Noel has yet to find a reason for its immateriality
column6: but most Summoners find its easily concealable nature a boon for surprise encounters."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819223_LONGDESCRIPTION":"You can't quite place your eyes on it. Are you seeing double? Triple? Which seal is the real one? The morning after Noel infused even more potent magic into the Bulwark of Menon
column2: he came into his laboratory to find hundreds of seals lying everywhere. Each copy seemed as real as the original\u2014he spent weeks identifying the real seal
column3: and kept it marked to prevent such tedious work again. Wearers of the seal gain the ability to clone several copies of themselves to confuse and swarm the enemy in battle. Fighting a foe with such an advantage was
column4: at best
column5: a tedious affair; and at worst
column6: an overpowering loss."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819224_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Though cracked in several places
column2:
this pulsing orb still retains much of the power of a Revenant\u2014a Guardian that has consumed so much debris that its phantom essence exhibits anomalous energy signals. It was theorized that these Guardians were abandoned decades ago by long-dead Guilds.

After several tests by Noel and Giselle
column3: the energy signals are similar to pulses in the human brain when accessing memories. The Revenants are thus named for being amalgamations of \"deceased memories\"
column4: but whether this is scientific fact or supernatural sentiment is a constant topic of debate between them."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819225_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A little something from Giselle as thanks for all the hard work you've been doing for the Orebus Special Inquiry lately.

It is well known through history that a lady's kiss is a sign of affectionate\u2014even intimate\u2014favor
column2: but what is baffling is just how she managed to get this to you. Catching a blown kiss is a figure of speech
column3: not a reality-bending
column4: science-defying feat. And yet
column5: here it is
column6:
taking up an invisible space in your hand. You can even see her mischievous smile if you close your eyes and focus hard enough.

Lucky you...?"

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819226_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Gleaming scale gauntlets boasting impressive rock knuckles and clawed fingers.

Noel created these fist weapons by imbuing dragonscale with the raw magic of Orebi Revenants. There are only a few of these in existence as the magical process used to craft them is prone to failure
column2: utterly destroying the materials involved...as well as anybody standing too close
column3: as Noel nearly found out. Forget spears or bows
column4: dragon hunters would do anything to get their hands on a pair of these rockstars."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819227_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A flashing orb containing all the colors that exist in the visible light spectrum. In life
column2: Melord had been turned into various forms
column3: and his core contained magical memories detailing the shapeshifting process. On a whim
column4: Giselle analyzed the magic involved
column5: allowing Noel to apply the concept to a whole range of magical beasts. Powerful entities are able to access these forms within the orb
column6: turning into 72 possible transformations as the situation demands."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819228_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A heavy onyx faceplate belonging to Czorag
column2:
a member of the Seventh Circle Fiends. The rune inscribed on the forehead is a remarkably modern take on the ancient rituals normally used to contact demonic entities.

Czorag differs from most of the other mercenaries in one key aspect: he seems to be a native inhabitant of their hellish plane. The heated inner surface suggests a body temperature too high for any normal human.

Rarely known to remove his faceplate
column3: one can only imagine the sheer malice on Czorag's undoubtedly frightful visage
column4: given his prodigious appetite for destruction."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819229_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Crafted from fine steel and accented with gold bronze
column2: this modern-looking helm belongs to Katerin
column3:
one of the Seventh Circle Fiends. The rune on the visor resembles sigils used in demonic rituals.

Katerin was a tormented soul whose misery extended beyond her death. Among the meagre possessions she haunted as a wraith
column4: none held as much sentimentality as this helm. Though it has been reworked and improved upon over the decades
column5:
it unfortunately does nothing to lessen the cruel whispers that fill her mind.

Perhaps playing the part of executioner is both a curse and a blessing to her."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819230_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This vulpine trinket is a cherished possession of Hakuzo
column2: a mercenary of the Seventh Circle Fiends. A ring of foreign runes
column3: said to be from a forgotten land of warrior monks and wandering swordsmen
column4: glows around it. Hakuzo has a rather foxish demeanor about him
column5:
from his sharp eyes to the bushy tail affixed upon his wide-brimmed hat.

Many tales from his supposed land of origin speak of shapeshifting animals
column6:
foxes the most notorious among them.

Though some foxes there are messengers of a god
column7: many more simply prefer to assume the appearance of their divine brethren for their own ends."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819231_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An emblem resembling a sharp-beaked corvid
column2: insignia of Vr\u00e1na's former house. It crackles with arcane energy
column3:
forming a faint aura of bright blue bolts and golden sigils.

Vr\u00e1na's natural aptitude for arcana manifested in her talent for manabreaking\u2014disrupting the mana flow of a magic-user
column4: and in severe cases
column5:
incapacitation and death.

The young heiress begrudges her selfish parents for pawning her soul while she was in the blush of youth
column6: but since finding her place among the Seventh Circle Fiends
column7: has grown fond of her new kin. A noble
column8: after all
column9: must have a place of pride."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819232_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A bronzed skull artifact brimming with a potent curse
column2: a keepsake from Tarok's personal collection. Painted on its forehead are ritual runes from an ancient
column3:
forgotten civilization.

Tarok viewed his ill-starred existence as both a curse foisted upon him
column4: as well as a blessing to be elevated at the whims of the gods. Savagery was the only way to survive in a world painted red by tooth and claw
column5:
and yet there was reverence to be found even in the thrill of the hunt.br>
Having accepted his role in the grand machinations of his dark deity
column6: Tarok prowls the planes
column7: seeking his next trophy."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819234_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A charming
column2:
well-crafted hairclip of unknown metal belonging to Giselle. The eerie emerald gem set prominently at its base seems to reflect your bewildered gaze.

You're not quite sure why such an innocuous item would provoke anxiety
column3: but suddenly
column4: you hear it: vague strains of flutes playing the same thin
column5: monotonous note
column6:
accompanied by a slow drumbeat that seems to mimic the living pulse of something far beyond your knowledge.

Giselle
column7: you think
column8: is truly a woman of mystery... Though
column10: you're starting to wonder if she was ever human to begin with."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819235_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A plasma-activated device used to greatly enhance one's agility. The tubes within the wheel contain frigid plasma which irradiates bodies in its vicinity. Possessing this wheel allows one to slow down time itself."
"MST_SPHERES_819236_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The heirloom held by the Yasakani clan
column2: it was used in a powerful rite to seal the power of Orochi. A jewel of divine shape and form
column3: it is revealed only to a select few
column4: yet many covet the power and prestige that it holds."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819237_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The heirloom held by the Yata clan
column2: it was used in a powerful rite to seal the power of Orochi. A mirror that can create illusions
column3: it is held by its wielder close to her heart while many covet the power and prestige that it holds."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819238_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The heirloom held by the Kusanagi clan
column2: it was used in a powerful rite to seal the power of Orochi. A majestic sword of impressive proportions
column3: its true form is known only to a select few
column4: yet many covet the power and prestige that it holds."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819239_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A cacophony of voices fills the user's mind
column2:
roaring with battle rage. It is as though the blade is infused with souls that believe they are still fighting on battlefields long destroyed.

Giselle recommends that Summoners take frequent breaks when using this item
column3:
lest the voices become indistinguishable from one's own.

A swordsman with extraordinary clarity is able to discern an occasional shriek: \"Khree!\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819240_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This orb gives off a comfortably warm aura
column2:
embracing and entertaining nearby listeners with an enjoyable song.

Lost in the raging tides of Orebus' constant wars
column3: lovers cling closely and tentatively to each other. Attachment to other beings was frowned upon by society and feared by individuals
column4: as existence on Orebus was generally... rather transient. However
column5: those who did take the plunge into relationships were rewarded beyond their wildest dreams with a hitherto unencountered sense of satisfaction."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819241_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This seal emanates waves of remorse
column2: with a sobbing that is barely detectable even in a quiet place. The sounds evoke a person choking back their tears in the dark of a night
column3:
knowing that the dire present and desolate future are nothing more than the accumulation of their past mistakes.

A strong Summoner learns a crucial lesson from the seal to avoid letting past mistakes force their hand into making new ones; a weak Summoner allows themselves to be paralysed by indecision and second-guessing
column4: overwhelmed by the power of regret."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819242_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The Artificial Intelligence within the armor has grown even more active after absorbing the Whispering Shard. It beeps and whistles every so often
column2:
as if trying to communicate with the wearer.

The Greherd of Orebus were well known for their disposition towards technology
column3: and a significant portion of their population and resources were focused towards all sorts of research fields. It seems that death did nothing to diminish these scientists' passions
column4: and their souls gravitated to Beiorg's successor."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819243_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Anyone who wears this mask hears only a mournful choir
column2: filled with sorrow over an unknown catastrophe. The elegy seemed to be about an event that had yet to occur
column3: however -- foreseen
column4: tragic
column5:
and inevitable.

Some Summoners have been known to enjoy its lamentations
column6:
treating it as a sort of ominous entertainment or grim prophecy.

Advanced meditation may help soothsayers discern the image of a looming fleet of shining golden shapes against a midnight sky."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819244_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Upon donning the armor
column2: an almost deafening silence is immediately apparent. The story of the nomads of Orebus is one told in hushed tones. Unwilling to join any of the six factions of Orebus
column3:
countless tribes of nomads hid themselves away.

From the raging wars between the factions and the golden ships from beyond the limits of the sky
column4: to the golems and their pointless wars
column5:
the nomads had seen it all.

Though many died
column6: the remainder clung desperately to life. Generations of silence had bred noise out of the race
column7: and it was the faint hope of peace in a distant future that kept the nomads going."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819245_LONGDESCRIPTION":"You have no idea what this object is supposed to look like. It has no shape
column2: yet it has a million shapes. It has no color
column3: but it contains the entire spectrum of light. Noel tells you that his brain and yours are both unable to comprehend the object
column4:
and that other mortals would probably see even less. Is it made of matter? Does it matter?

This sphere contains many brave souls who fought to the very end for their commanders. Holding it bolsters the user's resolve tenfold
column5: and combat leaders are able to use its power to sharpen the fighting spirit of their subordinates."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819246_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Among the nomads and warrior monks of the Southern Plateaus
column2: the concept of a \"guardian spirit\"\u2014a s\u00fclde\u2014is strongly rooted in their culture of ancestor worship. Every individual possesses one from birth
column3:
and this protective force stays with them for life.

Rarely
column4: a s\u00fclde can manifest physically when an object or idol is consecrated to it. Jeweled beads are favored by Southern folk for their versatility as worn jewelry and as a convenient home should the s\u00fclde choose to make its presence known."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819247_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The highest form a s\u00fclde\u2014an individual's guardian spirit\u2014can ascend to is that of tengri
column2:
the most powerful class of divinities in the beliefs of the Southern nomads. Qormusta was the chief god and leader of the tengri; those directly under its command invoke its name as an indication of class and status.

Most souls are imbalanced to some degree
column3: but Saskya's dark desires had overwhelmed her gentle nature since her first taste of conflict. Only by keeping both light and darkness in equilibrium can an individual find harmony in a perfect self."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819248_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A decorative headpiece belonging to Inoko
column2:
one of the twelve heavenly creatures sent to the earthly realm to compete in Emperor Yu's search for the perfect assistant.

Boar was most proud of her tusks
column3: but after learning that humans saw her kind as crude beasts
column4: she decided to adopt conventional standards of beauty. Inoko did not abandon them completely
column5: however; the brash beauty had them fashioned into a stunning headpiece
column6: which remains one of her favorite accessories and a surefire way to get the crowd talking."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819249_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An imposing crown belonging to Inoko
column2:
a celestial boar who assumed the gorgeous form of a voluptuous woman and became a fiery fashionista who turned heads wherever she went.

As Inoko's taste for fashion grew
column3: so did her vanity. Unlike some
column4:
Inoko had no qualms defending her pride with the ire of her true self. The great curved tusks atop her perfect coiffure were a symbol of that fierce nature.

It's generally a bad idea to get into a shouting match with this beastly beauty
column5: but her friends maintain she is
column6: at her heart
column7: fiercely sincere."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819250_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An experimental liquid prepared by Charlie
column2:
one of twelve heavenly creatures sent to the earthly realm to prove themselves the most worthy of being Emperor Yu's trusted assistant in a competition.

Rat was both curious and clever
column3: rapidly scurrying from idea to idea. She delved deep into the secrets of science
column4: and before long
column5: had set up a laboratory to test out every sort of formula she could get her hands on. This little sample labeled with her signature rodent sticker is just one of many lying around her workbench."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819251_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A vibrant and ectoplasmic fluid distilled after countless iterations of Charlie's experiments. The celestial rat had found her niche among the word of mortals as a brilliant\u2014if scatterbrained\u2014inventor of ingenious ideas.

Charlie's short attention span made it difficult for her to concentrate on any one experiment for long
column2: so when a hypothesis is seen through to its natural conclusion
column3:
it's usually because she was struck by a sudden burst of inspiration.

Unsurprisingly
column4: this liquid tends to form rodentlike shapes\u2014proof that Charlie quite enjoys her nimble true self."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819252_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An oxhead decoration carved from a strong tree. This ornament belongs to Ulagan
column2:
one of twelve heavenly creatures sent to the earthly realm to compete for the prized position of Emperor Yu's assistant.

Ox's imposing bulk and strength was admired by a clan of warriors who took him in
column3: but despite his appearance
column4: he was a peaceable creature who preferred to spend his days lazily strumming his yatga. This ornament
column5: with its stalwart jade stare
column6: is a reflection of his true self whenever he reclines on the plains."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819253_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An imposing oxhead decoration affixed to the top of Ulagan's yatga
column2: his favored stringed instrument. As a celestial ox
column3: his strength was second to none
column4:
but he much preferred pounding out melodies than skulls on the battlefield.

During a night of interclan revelry that turned violent
column5:
Ulagan stunned everyone into captivated silence with the earth-shattering epic of the gods. His baritone passion rekindled their sense of community.

Since then
column6: no warrior has given him further grief for his perceived indolence
column7: for strength comes in many unexpected forms."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819254_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A commander's cap with a plush tail worn by Kassia
column2:
one of the twelve heavenly creatures in Emperor Yu's competition vying for the top spot as his trusted assistant.

Tiger's fierce will made her a natural leader
column3:
and with strict training and regimentation had converted what was once a ragtag group of hunters into the elite mercenary company now known as the Skyroar.

Though powerfully capable
column4: her pride does get in the way\u2014like the time she literally fell for the oldest trick in the book by marching right into a floor trap."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819255_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A commander's cap gilded with the symbol of the Skyroar Mercenaries
column2: worn by their proud commissar Kassia. The celestial tiger made her mark on the mortal world by raising a ferocious company of mercenaries
column3:
known far and wide as the Skyroar.

Although Kassia had plummeted straight into a floor trap
column4: her concerned deputies were silenced by her calm commands. She brooked no further inquiries
column5:
insisting that all was proceeding as planned.

To this day
column6: no one but the commissar really knows if it was a feint. As Kassia puts it
column7: this is an art of war."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819256_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An orange bandana with two adorable floppy ears most often seen on Peter
column2:
one of the twelve heavenly creatures competing for the coveted position of Emperor Yu's assistant.

Rabbit's agility was his greatest strength; with a knack for thinking on his feet
column3: few could match the speed with which he performed his tasks. Among his construction crew
column4: he has earned the nickname \"Lightspeed\" for constantly quoting how fast he can get things done\u2014although whether the end result turns out correctly is a different matter entirely..."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819257_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A brightly polished helmet with a protective visor owned by the exuberant craftsman Peter. Even in human form
column2: the celestial rabbit boasted an agility like no other
column3:
being able to lend his fellow animals a helping hand on top of his own tasks.

Part of Peter's work ethic is to always prepare as many solutions as possible to any problems that may arise. Unfortunately
column4: this also means a complete lack of planning or foresight
column5: and the sheer amount of roundabout repair work is in itself a hazard. Little wonder his colleagues refer to his helmet as a brain-bucket."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819258_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A creepy
column2: horned doll in a hood belonging to Noxa
column3:
one of the twelve heavenly creatures assuming a human form in the earthly realm to prove themselves the most capable assistant to Emperor Yu.

Dragon was a majestic creature full of ancient power
column4: but in the earthly realm
column5: her kind had become mere legends and myths. Eager to carve out her new niche in these changing times
column6: Dragon delved into the darker arts of human culture. There are rumors out there claiming her doll laughs in a rasping voice reminiscent of a great and terrible beast..."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819259_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An eerie horned doll dressed in a torn
column2: hooded cloak
column3: impaled by pins from Noxa's seemingly endless collection. The celestial dragon made use of her innate powers to work her magic in the earthly realm
column4:
bestowing upon it a modern mystique found in the darker arts of old.

Noxa lamented her loss of influence in a world that had all but forgotten the majesty of the dragons
column5:
but managed to weave a new legacy in its wake.

Little do her adoring \"cultists\" know of her true nature
column6: but perhaps nothing has changed from old times: dragons do so love to be fawned over."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819260_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A black disguise made by a ghoul
column2: it covers a significant portion of one's face. It has an opening for the wearer's eye and can be unzipped to allow them to feed."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819261_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A cute mask modeled after a rabbit with oversized ears
column2: it serves to playfully hide the wearer's identity while they are conducting their business. One can almost feel the emptiness in its eyes
column3: as if it was just observing what happened around it..."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819262_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An all-white mask worn by a sadistic ghoul
column2: it serves to protect its wearer's face and identity from any attackers. But the real threat comes from the pain that the wearer promises to inflict
column3: and the screams that come after."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819263_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A dull gold statuette in the shape of the waxing moon. This simple-looking sculpture was a wedding gift to Aesys and Osiris
column2: from an old friend Khons. Its humble appearance belies a vast reservoir of magical energy
column3: along with an extremely powerful charm that was designed to defend its master's home from malicious beings."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819264_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An incomplete statuette that once belonged to Aesys and Osiris. Khons' gift was beloved by Aesys and displayed as the centerpiece in the home she kept with Osiris. Over the ages
column2: Osiris and Aesys added their own magic to the statuette
column3: and its form changed to display the aspects of Osiris' scarab and Aesys' sun."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819265_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A full figurine of a scarab holding up the crescent moon and sun. On the day that the statuette's scarab and sun became fully formed
column2: Osiris and Aesys conceived a son. That fateful day also saw Osiris receiving an ominous message from the goddess of knowledge
column3: that something had disrupted the fabric of reality. Wanting to protect his wife and unborn child from an unknown disaster
column4: Osiris left to investigate the disruption. That was the last time Aesys saw him alive."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819266_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A statuette of a golden scarab
column2: crescent moon and glowing amber sun. When Aesys' son was born
column3: the figurine in her home transformed dramatically. Colors blazed bright
column4: and a pair of kaleidoscopic wings sprouted from the scarab base. Thus was born Horus
column5: Lord of Skies."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819269_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An onyx figurine of a sha. You get the uneasy feeling that it's watching you
column2:
but close inspections yield no result.

In the moments before Set's birth
column3: the Watcher in the Cosmos was drawn to this seemingly trivial event
column4: and she saw greatness unfold in Set's unending life. Yet something crucial was missing... and the Watcher was perplexed that her attentions should be occupied thus. In a flash of understanding
column5: Ma'at drew on the magics of Neith
column6: infusing Set with a power unlike any other at the moment of her birth. A sha was recorded to enter the room and immediately snuggled down next to baby Set
column7: her companion for life."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819270_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This statuette of a sha has been detailed in amazingly fine filligree. Despite what logic tells you
column2:
you are unable to convince yourself that it's not alive somehow.

With the sign of Neith clearly present in the skies at Set's birth
column3: Set was marked from birth as a victim of ill omen. She was treated differently by the other gods
column4: and mortals were afraid to worship her openly. Only Aesys and Osiris called her friend in her youth
column5: though she would realise her unique destiny and sorrowfully distanced herself from everyone. Not knowing that she was closely watched by the Arbiter... not knowing that she had been the focus of the Arbiter's sole direct intervention in the workings of the world."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819271_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A pair of glowing rods styled after spined serpents owned by Rhyne
column2:
one of the twelve heavenly creatures sent by Emperor Yu to the earthly realm in a competition.

Snake was a creature of perfect opposites; a dance shifting between languid and lascivious
column3: deadly then dormant. This calculated
column4: seemingly effortless efficiency translated into the easy grace of a dancer
column5:
and every new night brought with it a new kind of heartbeat.

For she
column6: if nothing else
column7: was patient and ever-watching for her opportunity to strike."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819272_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Reinforced with a broader back and brighter glow
column2: Rhyne's dancing rods leave blazing afterimages in their wake
column3:
long after the dance resolves. The celestial snake had carved her niche as the most avant-garde dancer in the concrete jungle she now nested in.

The dancefloor opened up to her willingly
column4: and the night soon shifted into a myriad of pulses and lights. Between breath and beat
column5: Rhyne remembered what it was like to be truly alive in the spirit of the moment; to sign the air with a vivid trace of one's emotions
column6: and to exult in its heartbeat in those moments."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819273_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A lightsteel belt sporting a horseshoe buckle belonging to Kahiki
column2:
one of the twelve creature candidates sent to the earthly realm to compete for the prized position of Emperor Yu's assistant.

Horse was the perfect mix of carefree spirit and energy
column3: his mane trailing behind him as he chased the winds across the plains. Initially trapped by the vast expanse of blue surrounding the island he arrived on
column4: a first encounter with a rolling wave soon replaced that trepidation with transcendence."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819274_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The latest in lightsteel crafting technology
column2: Kahiki's unique belt is as flexible as wind-driven waters
column3:
molding to the shape of its wearer's body as they soar against the sun. The celestial horse traded the call of the land for the song of the sea in his new island home.

Though scientific advancements had rapidly transformed the human world
column4: a new wave of interest in culture spurred a movement to meld tradition with technology
column5: igniting a search for man's inner spirituality. For Kahiki and the other soul surfers
column6: that blissful zen existed along the sun-kissed sea and its rolling waves."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819275_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A cane owned by Alphie
column2:
one of the twelve candidates sent to the realm of humans as part of a competition.

Always ready to lend a hand (or hoof)
column3: Goat made up for his small size with a big heart. Friend to those who look past his raggedly appearance
column4: he does all he can to bring joy with the little things in life\u2014be it a simple mended boot for an orphan child
column5:
or a timely fix on a broken axle for an accident-prone journeyman.

After all
column6: who else was capable of walking up a nearly vertical cliff?"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819276_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A cane topper fashioned after an alpine goat sporting fantastic golden horns. Especially prominent on a certain elfin mountaineer's staff
column2: this topper has become almost synonymous with Alphie
column3:
the celestial goat.

Legend has it that a hunter
column4: seeking the creature's head
column5: lost his way in the vallery in pursuit of his quarry. Just then
column6: two narrow streaks of light cut through the dusk
column7:
and led the man safely home to his family.

As the mist cleared with the dawn
column8: the man realised the truth of his savior\u2014the same golden-horned goat. Thereafter
column9: the man laid down his hunting arms forever."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819277_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The favored prop of Ukie
column2:
one of twelve celestial creatures sent to the earthly realm to compete for the prized position of Emperor Yu's assistant.

Excitable (some say overly so) Monkey was a troublemaker and trickster both. It was as hard to predict her next line of thought as it was to catch her. Indeed
column3: jumping to conclusions could even be considered a skill; when she witnessed lavishly dressed humans mock-fighting one another
column4: Monkey seized this single tonfa immediately and started swinging away."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819278_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Fashioned after a legendary weapon wielded by an indomitable sage
column2: the striking golden bands on these tonfas draw the audience's eye to its every movement
column3: easily making it the star of any show. Ukie proudly spins these as she duels her fellow actors (not too gently
column4: even) on stage
column5:
reenacting the legend of the Great Sage.

Though these tonfas are merely replicas
column6: they seem to take on a life of their own in the deft hands of Ukie. The strength and cunning of the Sage lives on in spirit through epic performance and daredevil stunts; some even wonder if Ukie may be a descendent..."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819279_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A pair of lightsteel knuckle dusters with laser spurs belonging to Kelsa
column2: rising star of the underground circuit. Sent to the earthly realm in a competition to become Emperor Yu's assistant
column3:
Rooster has a vastly different idea for her \"skillset.\"

Less interested in the position of assistant than a means of humbling ne'er-do-wells
column4: Rooster's wanderings soon brought her to the underground fighting circuit. Every spin
column5: every jump
column6: and every kick in her new human form was no less deadly than she was before; she simply needed new talons."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819280_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A pair of knuckle dusters with upgraded apertures for laser-powered blades
column2: Kelsa's distinctive weapons. Living and dying by her talons
column3:
the celestial rooster's victories are a tour de force to be reckoned with.

While Kelsa's forays into the ring were more out of a personal calling to put down ruffians than for any showmanship
column4: her bouts drew a massive crowd and greater appreciation for the sport\u2014both a blessing and a curse. These dusters have lasers so precise and vicious that burns are no longer uncommon; a small price to pay instead of fatal stab wounds and split flesh."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819281_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A polished silver spiked collar belonging to Kirke
column2: one of the twelve celestial creatures competing to become Emperor Yu's trusted assistant. As one well-attuned to mankind
column3: Dog had an intrinsic advantage over his peers
column4:
but the modern world was much more different than he could have imagined.

Gone were the old days of faithful companionship; modern man was much too engrossed in their personal lives. But even so
column5: Dog would prove himself their stalwart companion. Perhaps a new coat and collar would do; after all
column6: pets tended to take after their masters..."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819282_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A spiked collar with a garish golden hue
column2: the signature accessory of Kirke. The celestial dog followed his instincts and became the self-appointed guardian of mankind's new generation
column3:
assuming a form most befitting the spirit of their time.

Even in human form
column4: Kirke has a distinctive doglike demeanor about him
column5: though one of good breeding and obedience. He speaks little
column6: preferring actions over words
column7:
but will always offer an encouraging nudge when it's most needed.

Though some believe this collar to be only for show
column8: those who have crossed Kirke's charges tend to say otherwise..."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819284_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A symbol of eternal friendship between the goddess Tilith and the Summoner. This orb radiates with the colors of the rainbow
column2:
mirroring the resplendent hues on the goddess's dress.

Tilith's promise to protect her loved ones makes this orb glow with a cheerful warmth. With her around
column3: there will always be hope!"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819285_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A miniature portal into the Void. The previously untapped Divine Master Key was found to resonate perfectly with the Seventh Element. Noel persuaded the Summoner to try merging them
column2: and the result was an object that allowed the wielder to continually draw power from the Void. Given the recent occurrence of escalating events
column3: it is rumored that some great cataclysm is coming
column4: and the Void itself is... changing."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819286_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An unknown substance. Noel recently detected new readings in the Void
column2: and found something that had never been seen before. After some initial probes into its unique powers
column3: he decided to call it the \"Caelian Aether\"
column4: but Giselle cut in with the name \"Seventh Element\". To his chagrin
column5: the name stuck with the rest of the Summoner's Hall."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819287_LONGDESCRIPTION":"In the distant past
column2: lost in the history of Grand Gaia
column3: the creators of space and time forged a sword of nothingness. Its blade cuts through space and slashes through time - a tool for exterminating their own faulty creations. This imitation
column4: although weaker than the real blade
column5: will at least not deconstruct the wielder."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819288_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A well-used copper kettle used to serve drinks at roadside vendors. Surprisingly sturdy.

Years ago
column2: Mugen had encountered Shoryu at a roadside vendor. The man\u2014a quiet sort who claimed to be rather out of touch with public affairs\u2014offered him his kettle when Mugen finished what little he could purchase. Mugen was able to catch the kettle when it \"slipped\" from the man's hand
column3:
and it was this detail that prompted Mugen to call him out.

The Tsujigiri would go on to challenge Mugen on the night of the next full moon from this single encounter."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819289_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A bronze coin with a square hole minted in a country far
column2:
far away. Smells faintly of sunflowers.

Fuu first met Jin and Mugen in an odd twist of events involving several guards
column3: a restaurant
column4: and a mistaken identity. Nevertheless
column5: the two men were marked for execution
column6:
but Fuu's quick thinking broke them out just in time.

To keep Jin and Mugen from killing each other and leaving her with no bodyguard to find the \"Samurai who smells of Sunflowers
column7: \" she decided on a coin flip\u2014if it comes up heads
column8: they could hack away all they wanted

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819290_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A special candle kept lit during the Longest Night. Carefully painted on its surface is an emblem depicting a seated figure with two outstretched wings.

Opinions are divided over what this ancient emblem represents. Some say it is the personal crest of a mythical emperor
column2: whose deeds so moved the Sun God that he was granted wings to soar to the heavens. Others believe they are winged protector spirits called fravashis. These spirits watch over the good and do battle with evil
column3: safeguarding all who live in the material world."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819291_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A bronze chalice carefully crafted to house a representation of Atar
column2:
a holy fire sometimes described abstractly as both unseen and visible. It is filled with kindling and warm to the touch.

The concepts of fire and light are often entwined closely with one another; for the Zartosht
column3: it is no different. Fire symbolizes the warmth of hearth and home
column4: and light keeps the evil of the Dark One at bay. The Longest Night is said to be the most dangerous
column5: for it is when demons are at their full strength."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819292_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A beautifully crafted chalice with a burning flame housed within it. A representation of the eternal flame Atar
column2:
its divine energy has gilded the formerly bronze chalice into shining gold.

In popular myth
column3: Atar is said to have once been a yazata\u2014a divine spirit\u2014who renounced physical form to become an ever-burning fire. The prolonged darkness of the Longest Night allowed demons to grow bold and threaten humans. Atar swore to burn throughout the days and nights to protect their mortal charges. In turn
column4: as thanks for their selfless sacrifice
column5: humans offered kindling and kept the fire fed."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819293_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A lavish purple cloak belonging to Lugina
column2:
one of the Summoners of Old. Its black pauldrons are polished to a neat shine.

The sight of this cloak whipping around is a common sight in the Survey Office
column3: where Lugina oversees expeditions to other worlds
column4: and his skills in combat and diplomacy are highly respected."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819294_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Lance of the great Summoner of Old
column2: Karl. This lance
column3: with its noble edge
column4:
pulses with a quiet power even at rest.

Karl
column5: the leader of the Summoners of Old
column6: is a formidable warrior thanks to his demonic heritage and peerless combat skills. In a way
column7: Lad Mirazh is an extension of that prowess."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819295_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A stunning shield featuring fine Elysian decor. The use of indigo steel in its main body enables magic to be broadcast like an aura around the caster
column2: making this a firm favorite among the few arcane-wielding knights in the royal Elysian army. This one in particular belongs to the brave commander Miriam
column3:
wife of Crown Prince Gortius.

Miriam's mixed Alethi heritage brought her arcane mastery into the spotlight
column4: forcing the army to reconsider their stance on magic-users. The highly polished surface is crisscrossed with numerous scratches and marks
column5: a testament to Miriam's long military career. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819296_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A handcrafted hairclip enchanted to mask one's aura. Cherished memento of Evie
column2: heir to the throne in the Echo of Elysia. When Evie was very young
column3: she displayed a stunning talent for Alethi arcane magic
column4: no doubt inherited from her mother Miriam. Though the steppe-dwelling Eiros peoples were no stranger to such magics
column5: Miriam knew that once they returned to Elysia
column6: they would come under the close scrutiny of the court sorcerers. This was Miriam's gift of love and protection to her
column7: and Evie has not gone without it ever since. Even after things had changed irreversibly between mother and daughter..."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819297_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A circlet wreathed in fine silver and accented with gold leaf
column2: proof of a warrior's achievements in the Echo of Athensphere. This one
column3: with its unique centerpiece reminiscent of divine edged wings
column4:
belongs to the young demigod Avyn.

Despite her status as a boundary-traversing demigod
column5: Avyn's spirit remained empathetic to the common people. She insisted that she earn her place among the warriors as they did
column6: refusing to use her powers during the trials. It is due to her grit and determination that the people ultimately rallied behind her during the upheaval."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819298_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A necklace of golden pearls
column2: featuring a large iridescent pearl prominently at the wearer's throat. This deep-sea treasure is worn by the seal-shifter Aoife
column3:
Maiden of Eyinhel.

Possessing a shapeshifter's totem grants one great power over them
column4: and most
column5: if not all
column6:
do not relinquish these items easily. But so taken was Aoife with her Pactbound that she presented this to them as a token of promise.

Following the tragedy
column7: the large pearl subsequently lost its original luster
column8: taking on a deeper
column9: darker hue. Peer at it long enough
column10: and streaks of red appear to cross its azure surface..."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819299_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A well-worn face mask of unknown origin. One of the relics excavated from the Frontier Spire
column2: this mask radiates some sort of otherworldly energy
column3:
empowering its wielder with heroic powers.

This relic possesses a great deal of beneficial effects
column4: a boon for Summoners conducting surveys of the Frontier Spire or other tasks. As much as the Akras Summoner's Hall would relish studying it in greater detail
column5: it was eventually decided that Summoners should continue using it in the field
column6: if only to better understand its powers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819300_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A well-worn bracer of unknown origin. One of the relics excavated from the Frontier Spire
column2:
it appears to be charged with explosive energies. Careful handling is recommended.

This relic possesses a great deal of beneficial effects
column3: a boon for Summoners conducting surveys of the Frontier Spire or other tasks. As much as the Akras Summoner's Hall would relish studying it in greater detail
column4: it was eventually decided that Summoners should continue using it in the field
column5: if only to better understand its powers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819301_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A well-worn cape of unknown origin. One of the relics excavated from the Frontier Spire
column2:
this cape has the distinct aura of a legendary hero from a faraway land.

This relic possesses a great deal of beneficial effects
column3: a boon for Summoners conducting surveys of the Frontier Spire or other tasks. As much as the Akras Summoner's Hall would relish studying it in greater detail
column4: it was eventually decided that Summoners should continue using it in the field
column5: if only to better understand its powers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819302_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A diminished jade of unknown origin. One of the relics excavated from the Frontier Spire
column2:
this unassuming item seems to contain an unthinkable darkness.

This relic possesses a great deal of beneficial effects
column3: a boon for Summoners conducting surveys of the Frontier Spire or other tasks. As much as the Akras Summoner's Hall would relish studying it in greater detail
column4: it was eventually decided that Summoners should continue using it in the field
column5: if only to better understand its powers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819303_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A diminished shard of unknown origin. One of the relics excavated from the Frontier Spire
column2:
this crystalline shard pulses with warm memories of friends from another world. Its odd name was contributed by a researcher fond of sentiment.

This relic possesses a great deal of beneficial effects
column3: a boon for Summoners conducting surveys of the Frontier Spire or other tasks. As much as the Akras Summoner's Hall would relish studying it in greater detail
column4: it was eventually decided that Summoners should continue using it in the field
column5: if only to better understand its powers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819304_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A worn jewel of unknown origin. One of the relics excavated from the Frontier Spire
column2:
this jewel appears to have been an important centerpiece of an ancient rite.

This relic possesses a great deal of beneficial effects
column3: a boon for Summoners conducting surveys of the Frontier Spire or other tasks. As much as the Akras Summoner's Hall would relish studying it in greater detail
column4: it was eventually decided that Summoners should continue using it in the field
column5: if only to better understand its powers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819305_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A dusty mirror of unknown origin. One of the relics excavated from the Frontier Spire
column2:
this mirror is said to reflect the darkest of desires in the hearts of men.

This relic possesses a great deal of beneficial effects
column3: a boon for Summoners conducting surveys of the Frontier Spire or other tasks. As much as the Akras Summoner's Hall would relish studying it in greater detail
column4: it was eventually decided that Summoners should continue using it in the field
column5: if only to better understand its powers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819306_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A notched sword of unknown origin. One of the relics excavated from the Frontier Spire
column2:
this blade radiates an impossible heat despite having no perceptible source.

This relic possesses a great deal of beneficial effects

column4: it was eventually decided that Summoners should continue using it in the field
column5: if only to better understand its powers."

though an odd feeling of emptiness permeates it.

this mask sports a unique design notorious for both concealing and identifying its wearer.
