column1: "MST_SPHERES_819311_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A brilliant medal featuring a mane of emerald and sapphire jewels. It brims with the strength of nature itself
column2: invoking the roaring seas and rumbling earth. Grants its bearer great power over Water and Earth."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819312_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A golden medal set with emeralds and sapphires. It thrums not only with the strength of the sea-dwelling spirits
column2: but those of the earth as well. Grants its bearer power over Water and Earth."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819313_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A silver Break Action Revolver that is Vash's weapon of choice. It has greater firepower than your ordinary revolver.

Crafted by Knives and possessing a powerful potential for destruction
column2: this gun is able to transform into an Angel Arm by resonating with Independent Plants."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819314_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Not one
column2: not two
column3:
but eight Grader 2043 pistols. One of the many weapons contained in the Punisher.

A 1911-style handgun that is specially made to be used one-handed. Wolfwood stores them in the side arms of the Punisher cross
column4: four on each side
column5:
and pulls them out two at a time in a fight.

When the pistols run out of ammunition
column6: Wolfwood simply grabs a new pair from the Punisher."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819315_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A black Break Action Revolver that is Knives' weapon of choice. The twin of the Silver AGL .45
column2:
albeit of a different color.

It has a high destructive power. It remained in the possession of Vash until Knives finally took it back to fulfill his quest to erase humanity from Gunsmoke. Similar to its twin
column3: this gun can also transform into an Angel Arm."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819316_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The final form of the Silver AGL .45 after activating the catalyst hidden above the barrel.

The Angel Arm is a natural ability found in Plants like Vash and Knives. When Vash's Angel Arm was first activated
column2:
the blast was so powerful that it destroyed an entire city and left him with fragmented memories.

The power of the Angel Arm depends on the will of its user."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819317_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A multi-purpose weapon. It is very heavy due to the large amount of mercy contained within.

The Punisher's main armaments are a machine gun in front
column2:
and a rocket launcher at the back. Wolfwood switches the position of the Punisher depending on the type of weapon used.

Wolfwood bears the weight of the Punisher during his final battle against his mentor\u2014the person who gave him the very weapon."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819318_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The final form of the Dark AGL .45 after activating the catalyst hidden above the barrel.

It resembles a large cannon
column2: with the face and wings of an angel on it
column3:
hence the name. Knives' Angel Arm was used in the fateful final battle where it was wielded with overwhelming expertise.

However
column4: it was ultimately defeated by the power of love and peace."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819319_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An unremarkable relic excavated from the deepest parts of the Frontier Spire. Its mundane nature was later confirmed by the fact that wielding it seems to provide no tangible benefit. Despite the initial findings
column2: some researchers in the Summoners' Hall continued to examine this \"useless\" trinket for any sort of secret it might have. During one such scientific jaunt
column3: a certain child prodigy and his assistant found\u2014quite by accident\u2014that while the relic does little for its user
column4: all allies near them report an increase in prowess. With this new breakthrough
column5: the Summoners' Hall decided to allow this relic to be brought into the field in order to better understand its effects upon the user's allies."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819320_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A one-handed warhammer with a snarling lion for its head. The iconic weapon of the paragon Deimos
column2: demigod of strength. Despite its fearsome appearance
column3: it has rarely seen bloodshed
column4:
for its wielder shuns unnecessary violence.

Where the legendary Forgebreaker
column5: Deimos' former weapon
column6: was built for destruction
column7: Paragon's Roar was built for creation. Indeed
column8: legends abound of the Golden City and their stunning metalcraft
column9: each a tribute to the glory of the old gods. It is said that only the noblest of spirits may wield this weapon

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819321_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A medal set with jewelled petals. It is said that the contrasting powers contained within
column2: unleashed to full effect
column3: can cause recurring nightmares in foes that survive the onslaught. Grants its bearer power over light and darkness."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819322_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A medal set with jewelled petal motifs
column2: reminiscent of a blooming flower. It lives up to its namesake
column3: harnessing the powerful
column4: yet contrasting pulses of both light and dark energy. Grants its bearer great power over light and darkness."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819323_LONGDESCRIPTION":"\"There are few words that can encapsulate the grief and anguish of losing a beloved parent. This pure
column2: concentrated fury drives the sisters Hilda and Ren\u00e9
column3: two of the Seven Demonlords
column4: to seek vengeance against the King
column5: whom they believed the perpetrator of their father's death. Spurred on by Elhaza
column6:
they bring down biting winds and piercing icicles upon all who stand in their way.

Revenge
column7: after all
column8: is a dish best served ice-cold.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819324_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Unlike most others
column2: Joshua never felt it necessary to bestow upon his sword some fanciful
column3: unnecessarily obscure name. As a practical man who lived\u2014and perhaps would someday die\u2014by the sword
column4:
he preferred actions to words.

For those who had already dubbed him \"\"Joshua of Sanjelo\"\"
column5: it was a crime not to name his blade something impressive. After hours of arguing over which of the increasingly verbose names the weapon deserved
column6:
Joshua interjected in his usual abrasive manner with his final verdict.
A Silver Knight armed with the Silver Blade is as apt as it gets
column7: he supposed."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819325_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A medal with jewel carved into the image of a fallen leave. The power contained in the artifact brings the withering of all life form. Granting its bearer power over Fire and Thunder."
"MST_SPHERES_819326_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A medal with jewels carved into the image of a fallen leave
column2: reminding all the presence of Autumn. The artifact harnesses the life force from the living in its surrounding. Granting its bearer great power over Fire and Thunder."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819332_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The result of a happy accident in Noel's laboratory.

There is immense power radiating from the orb
column2: but its boons have been sealed to all but the most worthy."

column1:
"MST_SPHERES_819333_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Bestowed upon the best to walk the Halls of Akras.

The gods themselves tremble before your fury."

"MST_SPHERES_819334_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Bestowed upon the best to walk the Halls of Akras.

The gods themselves submit to your infinite wisdom."

"MST_SPHERES_819335_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Bestowed upon the best to walk the Halls of Akras.

The gods themselves dare not speak out of turn in your presence."

"MST_SPHERES_819336_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Bestowed upon the best to walk the Halls of Akras.

The gods themselves rally around your banner unquestioningly."

"MST_SPHERES_819337_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Bestowed upon the best to walk the Halls of Akras.

The gods themselves could not hope to match your grace and beauty."

"MST_SPHERES_819338_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Bestowed upon the best to walk the Halls of Akras.

The gods themselves lack your tenacity and fortitude."
"MST_SPHERES_819339_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A powerful orb bestowed upon the best of the best in the 31st Division of the Demon Slayers. Despite its fiercely valiant origins
column2: it is surprisingly gently warm
column3:
much like the commander's personable nature.

Named for the fairy that follows the commander on his various adventures
column4: Sun Cuore's demure shyness makes her a rare sight even when Roy is around. However
column5: there is no doubt that she is his\u2014and by association
column6: the division's\u2014first source of inspiration and strength."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819340_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Teresa's fervent belief in justice was a function of deep-seated devotion to her faith. With the gods as her witness and her trusty shotguns by her side
column2: the wicked would cower before the righteous and repent for their sins
column3:
and all would be well.

But life was never that easy. No self-respecting ruffian would so willingly abandon their vices with mere words. No
column4: sometimes justice had to administered with iron."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819346_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An impossibly dark core pulsing in erratic patterns. Said to possess the essence of chaos
column2: a fundamental element of the Void.When Gazia distilled the madness from Draegar's mind
column3: he needed a mechanical husk to contain the entity. Every being
column4: no matter how nebulous
column5: must have a core\u2014so the Mad Tinkerer postulated. Though Kranus was every bit the perfect servant
column6: its burgeoning sapience ensured that it would someday seek the truth of its origin."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819347_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A powerful nova of a core
column2:
radiating pure chaos energy.
Once infused with memory fragments
column3: a Chaos core will begin to break them down
column4: releasing the essence within. The core then processes and attempts to understand them\u2014a feat normally only possible in sapient creatures. Over time
column5:
it can take on a will of its own\u2014more than the sum of its consumed memories.
This is but one of many theories on how some Slivers are born. However
column6: without a suitable host-body
column7: this core remains just that\u2014a core."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819901_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A glowing red blade infused with a Fire soul
column2: forged by a powerful elemental blacksmith. It empowers the wielder who too possesses the soul of Fire."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819902_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A scorching red blade infused with a vicious Fire soul
column2: forged by a powerful elemental blacksmith. It greatly empowers the wielder who too possesses the soul of Fire."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819903_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A glowing red shield infused with a Fire soul
column2: forged by a powerful elemental blacksmith. Due to its elemental nature
column3: the shield absorbs and diffuses explosive and fiery attacks
column4: protecting the bearer from much damage."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819904_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A fiery red shield infused with a vicious Fire soul
column2: forged by a powerful elemental blacksmith. Due to its elemental nature
column3: the shield absorbs and diffuses explosive and Fire based attacks greatly
column4: protecting the bearer from much damage."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819910_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A reward given to those who were unfailing in pledging loyalty to the Akras Summoners' Council."
"MST_SPHERES_819923_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A symbol of bravery and unrelenting courage awarded by the Akras Summoners' Council to those who have demonstrated feats of strength and battle efficiency."
"MST_SPHERES_819924_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The siege of Rehdoon was a victory for the Raug
column2: made possible by the tenous cooperation between the three demonic overlords. Malekhan contributed much to the events leading up to the invasion
column3: starting with a blight spread by his cultists that caused crops to fail and animals to slowly sicken. As death and starvation began to spread throughout the land
column4: the Raug overlords began the next stage of their plans. Master of decay
column5: disease and enfeeblement
column6: Malekhan was the oldest Raug overlord. Patient beyond human comprehension
column7: no one was safe from his influence."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819927_LONGDESCRIPTION":"As famine and plague enroached upon the land
column2: Malachus began the second phase of their preparations leading up to the invasion with a sudden burst of fertility and health in afflicated areas where the Inquisition was weak. The surge in food and health caused the already riotous peasantry to rise up in revolt
column3: forcing the nobility to supress the uprisings with force to reestablish order. His view of his rivals was thus: \"Plans are useful
column4: but Maestron's myriad schemes border on the overly complicated. Pointless.\""

column4: they had crushed the outermost defenses of the kingdom and began to lay siege to Rehdoon in earnest. His view of his rivals was thus: \"Plans are useful
column5: but Maestron's myriad schemes border on the overly complicated. Pointless.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819939_LONGDESCRIPTION":"As famine and plague enroached upon the land
column2: Malachus's demons rampaged throughout the city of Rehdoon with abandon
column3: its defenders having died or fled. As the city burned
column4: the Raug overlord ordered his remaining minions to burrow under the city
column5: contaminating the soil for ages to come with a mix of human remains and demonic ichor. Soon
column6: the city would spawn new demons even after it was long reclaimed by man. His view of his rivals was thus: \"Plans are useful
column7: but Maestron's myriad schemes border on the overly complicated. Pointless.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819945_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The siege of Rehdoon was a victory for the Raug
column2: made possible by the tenous cooperation between the three demonic overlords. Maestron organized much of the planning and was instrumental in gathering the necessary information to make the invasion succeed
column3: as well as enmeshing the agents of the Inquisition in false plans that eroded their usefulness. With the defenses of mankind subverted
column4: the Raug overlords began the next stage of their plans. Youngest of the three Raug overlords
column5: Maestron revels in manipulation
column6: deception and knowledge. The results of his plans are only secondary to the delightful joy of entwining mortal fates into one another against their will."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819948_LONGDESCRIPTION":"As suspicion and paranoia mounted
column2: Maestron continued to play cat-and-mouse with the Inquisition. Schemes within schemes caused no end of headaches for his opponents
column3: and more unwitting souls bargained with him through dark rituals to escape the worst of the famine. As his cultists sowed chaos and weakened the defenses from within
column4: his minions began to infiltrate the kingdom from within.  His view of his rivals was thus: \"Malekhan believes that all the pieces are inevitably his. That makes the poison pill all that more amusing.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819960_LONGDESCRIPTION":"As suspicion and paranoia mounted
column2: Maestron's minions emerged in force from their hiding places during the siege. His cultists sowed death and destruction in Rehdoon's homes
column3: each body heaped onto sacrificial pyres as reinforcements poured through portals opened in midair. As the defenders began their counterattack
column4: his demons withdrew from the city
column5: tainting the land in their retreat. His view of his rivals was thus: \"Malekhan believes that all the pieces are inevitably his. That makes the poison pill all that more amusing.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819966_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The siege of Rehdoon was a victory for the Raug
column2: made possible by the tenous cooperation between the three demonic overlords. While famine and revolt rampaged throughout the land
column3: Malachus hardened hearts and enflamed passions among the nobility and peasantry alike. With everyone save a few embracing death with hedonistic abandon
column4: the Raug overlords began the next stage of their plans. The desire to consume
column5: feel and live is something that Malachus knows all too well. And when one's desires are limited by boundaries and taboos
column6: the harbinger is only too happy to ensnare them in her schemes
column7: even if it means involving her siblings."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819969_LONGDESCRIPTION":"As corruption and hedonism rose within the kingdom
column2: Malachus's followers hardened hearts and sowed indecision throughout the land. Tempers grew short and arguments flared for the simplest of reasons
column3: adding fuel to the fire of revolution already overflowing at the seams. Meanwhile
column4: thousands of innocents were falsely condemned by her cultists as demon-worshippers
column5: further weakening the morale of the people. Her view of her rivals was thus: \"So pathetically boring. Malekhan likes to count his victories before they even come to pass - which makes his disappointment that much sweeter.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819975_LONGDESCRIPTION":"As corruption and hedonism rose within the kingdom
column2: Malachus stepped up her efforts to occupy the defenders and divert their attention. Poisoned foodstuffs made the peasantry suddenly fertile beyond belief
column3: and many families soon had several extra mouths to feed - a disaster in the wake of the famine that had plagued the land. Those whose bodies were already weakened by endless celebrations found themselves succumbing to disease
column4: leaving their weak-willed successors foundering in the chaos. Her view of her rivals was thus: \"So pathetically boring. Malekhan likes to count his victories before they even come to pass - which makes his disappointment that much sweeter.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819981_LONGDESCRIPTION":"As corruption and hedonism rose within the kingdom
column2: Malachus's armies finally arose from tainted groves and desecrated halls. They swarmed over the weakened defenders
column3: demons barely pausing to eat the weakened ones before moving on to their next targets. As the city burned to the ground
column4: Malachus ordered her troops to taunt the agents of the Inquisition
column5: slowing their return to the city as they harassed their rear guard and poisoned their minds long after the siege. Her view of her rivals was thus: \"So pathetically boring. Malekhan likes to count his victories before they even come to pass - which makes his disappointment that much sweeter.\""

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819990_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A glowing red crystal stone that contains the essence of Burny's fiery core. It feels hot and glows exceptionally bright where it is touched. Whoever holds it can still hear Burny's raging gnarls echoing in the distance \u201cS..Stop blaming me for down time..!!\u201d. The anger-filled stone strengthens its bearer with a bit of a temper."
"MST_SPHERES_819991_LONGDESCRIPTION":"In the distant past
column2: lost in the history of Grand Gaia.. The creator's of space and time forged a sword out of nothingness. A sword that is nothing
column3: but powerful as a something. Its blades cut through space
column4: slashes through time
column5: a tool for exterminating their own faulty creations."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819992_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A legendary aegis used by an ancient king centuries before the great war broke out. Few records of said king survived the trials of time
column2: thus little is known about him
column3: but it is said that he wore this aegis even in his sleep. He lived to be 326 years old. Some believe that the aegis held the power of immortality
column4: and that he only died because the aegis was taken from him
column5: though there hasn't been concrete evidence to prove this."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819993_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A gleaming aegis found deep in a cave up in the mountains. No one knew who it belonged to
column2: or why was it left in a cave
column3: but its discovery stirred up quite a buzz among Summoners as its appearance greatly resembled the Royal Aegis. It is believed that it was made by the same person who created the legendary aegis."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819994_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A crimson scythe said to have been forged by a craftsman who was well-versed in the dark arts. It's rumored that he infused the blood of a demon into the scythe when he crafted it. Viewed as an ominous object
column2: it was sealed away after its creator passed on
column3: but when the gods trampled across Grand Gaia
column4: it mysteriously appeared again as if it was thirsty for a fight."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819995_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Rumor has it that one night during a lunar eclipse
column2: when the lands were engulfed in a cloak of darkness
column3: a fanged beast with red glowing eyes
column4: skeletal claws and huge leathery wings mysteriously appeared and extinguished an entire village. By the time rescue troops rushed to the village
column5: all that was left was a broken fang the length of an adult's forearm. An exorcist used the fang to create a barrier to ward off beasts from disturbing the graves of the villagers."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819996_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Archives of the La Veda Republic wrote of a priestess who healed the weak and lifted the spirits of the masses with a unique healing magic that she imbued into her calming voice. Whenever she sang
column2: the entire town seemed to be enveloped in a magical aura. This jewel was from a pendant she used to wear. It is said that its wearer can hear her singing
column3: like a soft whisper
column4: when they are physically or spiritually weak."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_819997_LONGDESCRIPTION":"This amulet is said to be the heirloom of a clan of warriors. For many generations it protected the descendants of the clan
column2: bringing victory after victory. However
column3: the overwhelming strength of the gods was too much for the clan and they were wiped out. The amulet was found among the ruins of war
column4: and though the impact of battle had weakened its effects
column5: it was still respected by warriors across the land
column6: as it symbolized the clan's contributions during the war."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_828011_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Enhanced to perfection by a mysterious sect of nomadic Artificers that arrived through a dimensional gateway during the Great War with the Gods
column2: the Vestige Omega Series boasted impressive power-enhancing capabilities while greatly reducing the strain on the wielders' bodies. These special artifacts were personally graced with intricate energy weaves of the Grand Artificer himself and polished to emit a golden hue to represent their superiority. It is our greatest honor and privilege to award this treasure to you who have risen above the fiercest of challenges and earned your right to stand among the most legendary of Heroes."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_828012_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Meticulously crafted by a mysterious sect of nomadic Artificers that arrived through a dimensional gateway during the Great War with the Gods
column2: the Vestige Alpha Series boasted impressive power-enhancing capabilities while greatly reducing the strain on the wielders' bodies. Each artifact was engraved with the majestic Laurel Crown of Swords symbol and only commissioned to accomplished elite Heroes of the Human Army."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_828013_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Enhanced to perfection by a mysterious sect of nomadic Artificers that arrived through a dimensional gateway during the Great War with the Gods
column2: the Reign Omega series were imbued with the essence of a Greater Astral Beast
column3: granting unparalleled offensive and energy leeching capabilities. These special artifacts were personally graced with intricate energy weaves of the Grand Artificer himself and polished to emit a golden hue to represent their superiority. It is our greatest honor and privilege to award this treasure to you who have risen above the fiercest of challenges and earned your right to stand among the most legendary of Heroes."

column3: through a complex configuration of prisms
column4: that absorbs and dampens the impact of devastating attacks. It is our greatest honor and privilege to award this treasure to you who have risen above the fiercest of challenges and earned your right to stand among the most legendary of Heroes."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_829901_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A translucent blue blade infused with an Water soul
column2: forged by a powerful elemental blacksmith. It empowers the wielder who too possesses the soul of Water."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_829902_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A translucent blue blade infused with a vicious Water soul
column2: forged by a powerful elemental blacksmith. It empowers the wielder who too possesses the soul of Water."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_838001_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An ordinary looking fur cloak worn by Randolph. After a transformation
column2: the cloak expands into a shroud of dark red mist that grants the wearer rapid regeneration of flesh wounds. It is uncertain where Randolph obtained the cloak
column3: as he was not known to wear such a garment during his service as a Witch Hunter."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_838002_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An elegant plume from the extremely rare white raven
column2: and a gift that Randolph presented to Ravenna on her 20th birthday. After a transformation
column3: the plume transforms into a visor that enhances the wearer's visual and cognitive prowess. Ravenna has always called it her lucky plume."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_838003_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Sprigs of young clover - preserved by powerful blessings and arranged meticulously into a majestic wreath. Rumors held that those fortunate enough to discover and possess these had been blessed with protection against wounds
column2: ailments and evil. "

column1: "MST_SPHERES_839901_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An emerald green blade infused with an Earth soul
column2: forged by a powerful elemental blacksmith. It empowers the wielder who too possesses the soul of Earth."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_839902_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An emerald green blade infused with a vicious Earth soul
column2: forged by a powerful elemental blacksmith. It empowers the wielder who too possesses the soul of Earth."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_849901_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A blade infused with a Thunder soul
column2: forged by a powerful elemental blacksmith.  It empowers the wielder who too possesses the soul of Thunder."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_849902_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A crackling electric blade infused with a vicious Thunder soul
column2: forged by a powerful elemental blacksmith. It greatly empowers the wielder who too possesses the soul of Thunder."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_849903_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A shield infused with a Thunder soul
column2: forged by a powerful elemental blacksmith.  Due to its elemental nature
column3: the shield absorbs and negates Thunder based attacks
column4: protecting the bearer from much damage."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_849904_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A crackling electric shield infused with a vicious Thunder soul
column2: forged by a powerful elemental blacksmith. Its elemental nature absorbs and diffuses Thunder based attacks greatly
column3: protecting the bearer from much damage."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_849905_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A shield infused with an Earth soul
column2: forged by an elemental blacksmith. Its elemental nature diffuses Earth based attacks
column3: protecting the bearer from much damage."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_849906_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A jade green shield infused with a vicious Earth shield
column2: forged by an elemental blacksmith. Its elemental nature diffuses Earth based attacks greatly
column3: protecting the bearer from much damage."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_849990_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A glowing yellow crystal stone charged with electrical energy that gently jolts the bearer
column2: accelerating recovery rate of the body. It's electrical energy is rumored to stimulate the bearer to be more alert in battle."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_858930_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A beautiful crystal egg
column2:
a highly uncommon variant of the mystical eggs Egg Hunter Carrol collects.
Apart from looking like an overglorified paperweight
column3:
it doesn't seem to do a thing...
Oh
column4: what luck! A pouch of Zel on the ground! Finders keepers!"

column1: "MST_SPHERES_88700001_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Many legendary knights are said to have perished in their quest for this artifact. Rumor has it that only a certain few know how to truly manifest its blessings in this world. However
column2: there may be another way to draw out its immense power--for a dark price."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_88700002_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A weapon with a blade that has been forged from a river of infinite light. Only those who are worthy can bear its might
column2: for the weak-hearted will be plunged into eternal darkness."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_88700003_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A replica of Excalibur
column2: a legendary photon sword sought by many. It was discovered and enhanced by a vengeful renegade knight during his years of wandering."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_88700004_LONGDESCRIPTION":"An artificial arm that was enhanced further into a deadly weapon
column2: this prosthesis was wielded by an ambitious soldier. No one knows what happened after its master's last battle."

column1: "MST_SPHERES_88700009_LONGDESCRIPTION":"A powerful lance customized by the cyber masters of Avalon which can be used to summon the staggering strength of a cavalry charge."

"MST_SPHERES_899998_LONGDESCRIPTION":"The Omni Evolutions are just around the corner! But why not make things more interesting by facing a real challenge? Equip this Sphere and find out who is the Bravest of them all! Be a man!"
"MST_SPHERES_899999_LONGDESCRIPTION":"Feeling bored because contents are too easy for you? Be a real Brave and equip this sphere!"
"sgtext_spheresLongDescription":""
